  • INJURY PRONE PHIL JONES KICKED OUT OF MAN UTD’S TRAINING GROUND DRESSING ROOM TO MAKE SPACE FOR ERIK TEN H...

    https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/19691064/man-utd-phil-jones-blow-transfer-signings/

    09/04/2022, 09:55

    71.43% Shortened!

    INJURY PRONE Phil Jones has been kicked out of Manchester United’s training ground dressing room - to make space for Erik ten Hag’s new signings

    It’s the latest blow for hapless Jones and another twist in his bizarre United career that had hit the buffers even before he signed a four-year £110,000-week contract in February 2019

    United fans are astonished the former Blackburn defender is even still at Old Trafford after the transfer window closed on Thursday

    And Sir Alex Ferguson once predicted he could become United;s best-ever player

  • STAKEHOLDERS SHARE THEIR VIEWS ON THE PREMIUM VISA PROGRAMME

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/04/stakeholders-share-their-views-on-the-premium-visa-programme

    09/04/2022, 08:06

    80.65% Shortened!

    They say apart from the multilingual nature and warmth of Malaysians, the country’s diplomatic relations with countries such as China and Japan also provided opportunities to attract applicants to the programme

    CLICK TO ENLARGE Malaysia My Second Home Consultants Association president Anthony Liew said Malaysia was a favourable choice for both Malaysia My Second Home (MM2H) or PVIP applicants given the country’s diversity

    On Thursday, Home Minister Datuk Seri Hamzah Zainudin announced the PVIP to attract global tycoons to Malaysia

    The programme is open to foreign businessmen and tycoons, except those from countries with which Malaysia has no diplomatic relations

    Malaysia Premium Visa Programme

    Malaysia My Second Home

  • HISTORICAL STATE TO REWARD AARON FOR HISTORIC FEAT WITH WOOI YIK

    https://www.thestar.com.my/sport/badminton/2022/09/04/historical-state-to-reward-aaron-for-historic-feat-with-wooi-yik

    09/04/2022, 08:05

    57.14% Shortened!

    Chief Minister Datuk Seri Sulaiman Md Ali said the state government never forgets the services of those born in the state who make Melaka famous in any competition at the national or international level

    “Even though the federal government has given (incentives), and so too MSN (National Sports Council), the Melaka government will still give incentives (to Aaron)

    “We also gave a medal last year to Aaron (for his previous successes),” he told reporters after officiating the state flag handover ceremony to the Melaka contingent to the Malaysia Games (Sukma) at the Al-Azim Mosque Auditorium here today

    Last Sunday, Aaron, who hails from Batu Berendam, Melaka, and his partner Soh Wooi Yik, from Kuala Lumpur, created history as the first Malaysian players to win the world title, thus ending a 45-year wait, when they defeated seasoned Indonesian pair, Moha-mmad Ahsan-Hendra Setiawan, 21-19, 21-14 in the men’s doubles final in Tokyo

    A total of 613 athletes, coaches and team managers will represent Melaka at this edition of the Games

    In the mean time, Sulaiman said the Melaka contingent were targeting 20 gold medals at the Games, an increase of two from the previous edition

    ['aaron', 'world', 'melaka', 'government', 'state']

    Chief Minister Datuk Seri Sulaiman Md Ali said the state government never forgets the services of those born in the state who make Melaka famous in any competition at the national or international level

    “Even though the federal government has given (incentives), and so too MSN (National Sports Council), the Melaka government will still give incentives (to Aaron)

    “We also gave a medal last year to Aaron (for his previous successes),” he told reporters after officiating the state flag handover ceremony to the Melaka contingent to the Malaysia Games (Sukma) at the Al-Azim Mosque Auditorium here today

    Last Sunday, Aaron, who hails from Batu Berendam, Melaka, and his partner Soh Wooi Yik, from Kuala Lumpur, created history as the first Malaysian players to win the world title, thus ending a 45-year wait, when they defeated seasoned Indonesian pair, Moha-mmad Ahsan-Hendra Setiawan, 21-19, 21-14 in the men’s doubles final in Tokyo

    A total of 613 athletes, coaches and team managers will represent Melaka at this edition of the Games

    In the mean time, Sulaiman said the Melaka contingent were targeting 20 gold medals at the Games, an increase of two from the previous edition

    ['aaron', 'world', 'melaka', 'government', 'state']



  • LIVERPOOL NEWS: JURGEN KLOPP ISSUES INJURY UPDATE AS VIRGIL VAN DIJK DECISION EXPLAINED

    https://www.mirror.co.uk/sport/football/news/liverpool-klopp-injury-vandijk-carvalho-27902961

    09/04/2022, 07:06

    72.73% Shortened!

    Jurgen Klopp's bid to lead Liverpool to another quadruple charge is already faltering, as the Reds stalled again in the Premier League after a 0-0 draw with Everton in the Merseyside derby The summer transfer window is now behind us and Liverpool can fully concentrate on their football

    Liverpool couldn’t make it three Premier League wins on the trot as they were held by a plucky Everton side in Saturday’s early kick-off

    Brought off for Firmino at half-time on his first Premier League start for Liverpool, Fabio Carvalho’s bright start to life on Merseyside suffered a blow on the other side of Stanley Park

    Virgil van Dijk was labelled a lucky man by many after escaping a red card late in the game on Saturday

    If the force is used to the shin it could be elevated to a red card

    But in this instance Virgil van Dijk’s foot actually slipped down the shin and ended up on the foot which is why it’s a yellow card." More here

    ['klopp', 'liverpool', 'red', 'premier', 'league']

  • MONEY CHANGERS ARE FORCED TO GO WITH THE FLOW TO STAY RELEVANT

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/04/money-changers-are-forced-to-go-with-the-flow-to-stay-relevant

    09/04/2022, 07:05

    77.78% Shortened!

    A manager at a money changer company, known only as Saiful, said business had been affected by about 25%

    “Some people, especially young travellers, prefer cashless transactions over ewallets

    That’s not really affecting our business because ewallets have transaction limits

    But local money changers are also joining the cashless revolution

    He said the money remittance industry, which was not spared by the Covid-19 pandemic, was making a remarkable recovery

    “When Covid-19 hit us, we expected our business to be affected by more than 50%, but now, with the trajectory for recovery being implemented with the support of Bank Negara, I can say we have already recovered by more than 50%,” he said

    ['mobile', 'money', 'changer', 'cashless', 'transaction']

    A manager at a money changer company, known only as Saiful, said business had been affected by about 25%

    “Some people, especially young travellers, prefer cashless transactions over ewallets

    That’s not really affecting our business because ewallets have transaction limits

    But local money changers are also joining the cashless revolution

    He said the money remittance industry, which was not spared by the Covid-19 pandemic, was making a remarkable recovery

    “When Covid-19 hit us, we expected our business to be affected by more than 50%, but now, with the trajectory for recovery being implemented with the support of Bank Negara, I can say we have already recovered by more than 50%,” he said

    ['mobile', 'money', 'changer', 'cashless', 'transaction']



  • CASH IS NO LONGER 'KING' IN A CASHLESS SOCIETY

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/04/cash-is-no-longer-king-in-a-cashless-society

    09/04/2022, 07:05

    82.35% Shortened!

    “If I exchange a lot of money and not use all of it, then I have to exchange it to ringgit in Malaysia, which means I’ll lose value

    “Whereas the money inside my card remains, and when I go back to Malaysia I can just use it and the transaction is in ringgit

    We only use credit cards,” she said

    In hotels, we use credit cards and in small shops we usually use cash,” he said

    “For small things, we use cash but in hotels we use cards,” he said

    Cash is difficult because you have to withdraw money

    ['cashless', 'say', 'use', 'payment', 'card']

    “If I exchange a lot of money and not use all of it, then I have to exchange it to ringgit in Malaysia, which means I’ll lose value

    We only use credit cards,” she said

  • JURRIEN TIMBER SLAMS 'FALSE' LOUIS VAN GAAL CLAIM AS MAN UTD FAIL IN TRIPLE AJAX SWOOP

    https://www.mirror.co.uk/sport/football/transfer-news/manutd-transfer-vangaal-timber-ajax-27899784

    09/03/2022, 23:05

    68.42% Shortened!

    The Ajax star was linked with following a number of his former teammates in joining Man Utd this summer and has now come clean on suggestions that Louis van Gaal talked him out of a move to Old Trafford Ajax starlet Jurrien Timber has hit out at “false” claims that former Manchester United boss Louis van Gaal talked him out of making a move to Old Trafford this summer

    However, that only came after the Red Devils failed to agree a deal with Ajax, whilst former United boss Van Gaal was claimed to have advised Timber to reject a move to Old Trafford

    It is not so wise I think [to move to United]

    He has to play.” With the transfer window now shut and Timber set to stay as an Ajax player until at least January, he has refuted those suggestions that Van Gaal advised him not to move to Old Trafford

    Like when people say that it was Louis van Gaal who told me not to go to Manchester United

    Intriguingly, Timber is not the only Dutch-based player to have broken their silence on Van Gaal’s role in a potential move this summer

    ['van', 'gaal', 'move', 'old', 'trafford']

  • PETER CROUCH AND RIO FERDINAND AGREE IN VERDICT ON 'ARROGANT' LIVERPOOL PLAYER

    https://www.liverpoolworld.uk/sport/football/liverpool/peter-crouch-and-rio-ferdinand-agree-in-verdict-on-arrogant-liverpool-player-3830254

    09/03/2022, 22:07

    45.45% Shortened!

    Rio Ferdinand and Peter Crouch have heaped praise on Liverpool midfielder Harvey Elliott, with the former claiming that the emerging talent has a “real nice arrogance” to his game

    And speaking ahead of Saturday lunchtime’s 0-0 Merseyside derby stalemate, Crouch and Ferdinand both lauded Elliott for the impact he has made already in his fledgling career at Anfield

    I think this could be a really really big year for him

    “I think people forget, he was a first choice starter last year, he was just very very unlucky with injuries - that was the only thing that held him back

    Liverpool’s midfield has been industious under Jurgen Klopp in the main, really, but I think he can be the real key to unlocl defences

    I think all the top players have a certain amount of arrogance around them - he has that

    ['liverpool', 'derby', 'player', 'ferdinand', 'crouch']

    Rio Ferdinand and Peter Crouch have heaped praise on Liverpool midfielder Harvey Elliott, with the former claiming that the emerging talent has a “real nice arrogance” to his game

  • EVERTON VS. LIVERPOOL - FOOTBALL MATCH REPORT - SEPTEMBER 3, 2022

    https://www.espn.com/soccer/report?gameId=638255

    09/03/2022, 22:07

    80.0% Shortened!

    Janusz Michallik points the finger at Mohamed Salah & Trent Alexander-Arnold after Liverpool are held by Everton

    Everton were indebted to Pickford three times in the 64th minute as he turned away a stinging right-footed shot from Firmino and the striker's header from the resulting corner, before getting down well to keep out a low shot from Fabinho

    Everton kept pushing and Alisson had to be alert to tip over a deflected shot from Dwight McNeil in the 84th minute after the winger cut in from the right

    And Firmino was foiled by Pickford again in the 87th minute when he got on the end of a Salah pass and saw his shot palmed away by the Everton keeper

    Everton and Liverpool play out a goalless draw in the Merseyside derby

    Janusz Michallik points the finger at Mohamed Salah & Trent Alexander-Arnold after Liverpool are held by Everton.

    ['liverpool', 'everton', 'minute', 'pickford', 'time']

  • ZAHID KNOWS UMNO BETTER THAN YOU, PAS PRESIDENT HADI TOLD

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/03/zahid-knows-umno-better-than-you-pas-president-hadi-told/26336

    09/03/2022, 22:07

    60.0% Shortened!

    Abdul Hadi could not understand Umno members better their own leader, Shahril said after the PAS chief disputed Umno president Datuk Seri Ahmad Zahid Hamidi’s rejection of their political cooperation

    “So, of course it is the Umno president who can speak on behalf of the party

    “It cannot be that the PAS president knows more about Umno and should teach Umno members

    Earlier, Abdul Hadi claimed at the PAS Muktamar today that Ahmad Zahid’s dismissal of the two parties’ partnership in the Muakafat Nasional did not represent what the Umno grassroots wanted

    Shahril also shot back at Abdul Hadi and provided a list of 10 statements by the PAS president and the Islamist party’s other leaders openly criticising Umno

    Yesterday, Ahmad Zahid dismissed his party’s partnership with PAS in MN, saying the foundational trust was lost when the Islamist party chose Bersatu in PN over Umno.

    ['umno', 'shahril', 'say', 'pa', 'president']

    Abdul Hadi could not understand Umno members better their own leader, Shahril said after the PAS chief disputed Umno president Datuk Seri Ahmad Zahid Hamidi’s rejection of their political cooperation

    “So, of course it is the Umno president who can speak on behalf of the party

    “It cannot be that the PAS president knows more about Umno and should teach Umno members

    Earlier, Abdul Hadi claimed at the PAS Muktamar today that Ahmad Zahid’s dismissal of the two parties’ partnership in the Muakafat Nasional did not represent what the Umno grassroots wanted

    Shahril also shot back at Abdul Hadi and provided a list of 10 statements by the PAS president and the Islamist party’s other leaders openly criticising Umno

  • ZAHID: BN NOT DEMANDING GE15 FOR FEAR OF LEADERS' CONVICTION BUT TO SAFEGUARD MALAYSIA'S FUTURE

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/03/zahid-bn-not-demanding-ge15-for-fear-of-leaders-conviction-but-to-safeguard-malaysias-future/26327

    09/03/2022, 20:07

    50.0% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Sept 3 — Barisan Nasional was not seeking an early general election to protect its leaders but to “save” Malaysians from being manipulated by the coalition’s rivals, Umno president Datuk Seri Ahmad Zahid Hamidi said

    He insisted Umno’s increasingly persistent demand for the general election to be held how was wholly unrelated to the criminal cases against BN leaders, which coincidentally included him

    While he did not name these rivals, his reference to the 2018 general election indicated that he meant Pakatan Harapan

    Ahmad Zahid said the country has faced failure after failure since the May 9, 2018 general election and that this must be prevented from happening again for the country’s sake

    Ahmad Zahid’s Umno has repeatedly urged Prime Minister Datuk Seri Ismail Sabri Yaakob to call for an early general election, but amplified this when Datuk Seri Najib Razak was sent to prison last month after losing his final appeal against his SRC International conviction

    The juxtaposition has allowed critics to suggest that Umno’s growing desire for a general election now, before one is due next September, was to prevent more of its so-called “court cluster” from being convicted.

    ['general', 'election', 'umno', 'seri', 'ahmad']

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Sept 3 — Barisan Nasional was not seeking an early general election to protect its leaders but to “save” Malaysians from being manipulated by the coalition’s rivals, Umno president Datuk Seri Ahmad Zahid Hamidi said

    He insisted Umno’s increasingly persistent demand for the general election to be held how was wholly unrelated to the criminal cases against BN leaders, which coincidentally included him

    While he did not name these rivals, his reference to the 2018 general election indicated that he meant Pakatan Harapan

    Ahmad Zahid said the country has faced failure after failure since the May 9, 2018 general election and that this must be prevented from happening again for the country’s sake

    Ahmad Zahid’s Umno has repeatedly urged Prime Minister Datuk Seri Ismail Sabri Yaakob to call for an early general election, but amplified this when Datuk Seri Najib Razak was sent to prison last month after losing his final appeal against his SRC International conviction

    The juxtaposition has allowed critics to suggest that Umno’s growing desire for a general election now, before one is due next September, was to prevent more of its so-called “court cluster” from being convicted.

    ['general', 'election', 'umno', 'seri', 'ahmad']

  • STUDENTS WILL NOT NEED TO RETURN PERANTISISWA TABLETS, SAYS PM (UPDATED)

    https://www.thesundaily.my/local/students-will-not-need-to-return-perantisiswa-tablets-says-pm-updated-CC9774613

    09/03/2022, 19:06

    50.0% Shortened!

    “I am happy to announce, that the government has agreed to outright grant the branded tablets to PerantiSiswa recipients,“ he said during his opening speech at the launching ceremony of the PerantiSiswa Keluarga Malaysia initiative at Dewan Agung Tuanku Cancelor (DATC), UiTM Shah Alam here

    Perantisiswa Keluarga Malaysia is a government initiative in collaboration with selected telecommunications companies to supply tablets to B40 students

    Samsung branded tablets were selected for the programme in five zones, namely the Sabah and Sarawak Zone, the Northern Zone, the Central Zone, the Eastern Zone and the Southern Zone

    Meanwhile, the Prime Minister said the government had also agreed to extend the registration period for the Keluarga Malaysia Youth Package aimed at ensuring that more students and teenagers could get sufficient Internet access for online learning from home

    At the same event, Ismail Sabri said the government would expand the Keluarga Malaysia Sales Programme to campuses of higher education institutions

    “It is also hoped that with these initiatives from the government, we as ‘Keluarga Malaysia’, will continue to remain strong together and put aside our differences and celebrate togetherness as one big family,“ he said

    ['student', 'keluarga', 'malaysia', 'say', 'government']

    “I am happy to announce, that the government has agreed to outright grant the branded tablets to PerantiSiswa recipients,“ he said during his opening speech at the launching ceremony of the PerantiSiswa Keluarga Malaysia initiative at Dewan Agung Tuanku Cancelor (DATC), UiTM Shah Alam here

    Perantisiswa Keluarga Malaysia is a government initiative in collaboration with selected telecommunications companies to supply tablets to B40 students

    Samsung branded tablets were selected for the programme in five zones, namely the Sabah and Sarawak Zone, the Northern Zone, the Central Zone, the Eastern Zone and the Southern Zone

    Meanwhile, the Prime Minister said the government had also agreed to extend the registration period for the Keluarga Malaysia Youth Package aimed at ensuring that more students and teenagers could get sufficient Internet access for online learning from home

    At the same event, Ismail Sabri said the government would expand the Keluarga Malaysia Sales Programme to campuses of higher education institutions

    “It is also hoped that with these initiatives from the government, we as ‘Keluarga Malaysia’, will continue to remain strong together and put aside our differences and celebrate togetherness as one big family,“ he said

    ['student', 'keluarga', 'malaysia', 'say', 'government']

    This comes after media reports that the Pengerang MP had resigned from her post as a special advisor to the Prime Minister

    She had claimed that in other parts of the world, a prime minister would usually appoint "his own person" to be the Attorney General

    Azalina, during Umno's special briefing on Aug 27, had also questioned why the Federal Court rejected Datuk Seri Najib Razak's bid to postpone proceedings after the former prime minister changed his team of lawyers

  • INDONESIA HIKES FUEL PRICES TO REIN IN BALLOONING SUBSIDIES

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/money/2022/09/03/indonesia-hikes-fuel-prices-to-rein-in-ballooning-subsidies/26287

    09/03/2022, 16:06

    53.85% Shortened!

    From 2.30pm (0730 GMT), the price of subsidised gasoline will rise to 10,000 rupiah (US$67 US cents or RM3) a litre from 7,650 rupiah, while that of subsidised diesel will increase to 6,800 rupiah a litre from 5,150 rupiah, energy minister Arifin Tasrif said

    President Joko Widodo said the decision to adjust fuel prices was a difficult one and was his “last option”

    Finance Minister Sri Mulyani Indrawati said more money would still be needed despite the fuel price hike, the amount depending on international crude prices

    The August inflation rate was 4.69 per cent

    Bank Indonesia Governor Perry Warjiyo said last month monetary policymakers would re-assess the inflation outlook in response to the government’s fuel price policy

    The last fuel price hike was in 2014, months after Jokowi took office, aiming to free up fiscal space

    ['indonesia', 'subsidise', 'fuel', 'price', 'cent']

    From 2.30pm (0730 GMT), the price of subsidised gasoline will rise to 10,000 rupiah (US$67 US cents or RM3) a litre from 7,650 rupiah, while that of subsidised diesel will increase to 6,800 rupiah a litre from 5,150 rupiah, energy minister Arifin Tasrif said

    President Joko Widodo said the decision to adjust fuel prices was a difficult one and was his “last option”

    Finance Minister Sri Mulyani Indrawati said more money would still be needed despite the fuel price hike, the amount depending on international crude prices

    The August inflation rate was 4.69 per cent

    Bank Indonesia Governor Perry Warjiyo said last month monetary policymakers would re-assess the inflation outlook in response to the government’s fuel price policy

    The last fuel price hike was in 2014, months after Jokowi took office, aiming to free up fiscal space

    ['indonesia', 'subsidise', 'fuel', 'price', 'cent']



  • HIGHER EDUCATION MINISTRY TO LEAVE ALLEGED STOLEN PHD RESEARCH CASE TO UM, POLICE, SAYS MINISTER

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/03/higher-education-ministry-to-leave-alleged-stolen-phd-research-case-to-um-police-says-minister/26274

    09/03/2022, 14:07

    50.0% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise BAGAN SERAI, Sept 3 ― The Ministry of Higher Education (MoHE) will leave the case of a foreign PhD student who claimed that his research had been stolen by a Universiti Malaya (UM) superviser, which went viral on social media recently, to UM and police for further action

    She said this when asked to comment on the development of the viral issue of a foreign student lodging a police report against UM, claiming that his research was taken without his knowledge

    In a video clip lasting more than one minute, the student claimed that he had spent almost two years completing the study, and was disappointed when his study was stolen by the university

    UM also said that it had lodged a police report to refute the student's accusations, and appropriate legal action was being considered

    It also said that the university has provided opportunities and resources to help the said student complete his PhD, including the extension of the study period by three semesters after the maximum period of 12 semesters, with fees sponsored by the faculty

    “By offering these courses at community colleges and polytechnics, it will provide knowledge and skills to the community in various fields, regardless of age,” Noraini said in her speech

    ['student', 'police', 'say', 'university', 'community']

    About Us Advertise BAGAN SERAI, Sept 3 ― The Ministry of Higher Education (MoHE) will leave the case of a foreign PhD student who claimed that his research had been stolen by a Universiti Malaya (UM) superviser, which went viral on social media recently, to UM and police for further action

    She said this when asked to comment on the development of the viral issue of a foreign student lodging a police report against UM, claiming that his research was taken without his knowledge

  • HOW IS DAP ABLE TO INFLUENCE NON-MUSLIMS IN PAS-LED KELANTAN? GUAN ENG ASKS

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/03/how-is-dap-able-to-influence-non-muslims-in-pas-led-kelantan-guan-eng-asks/26270

    09/03/2022, 13:06

    57.14% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Sept 3 ― DAP chairman Lim Guan Eng today challenged political foe PAS to explain how his party is able to influence the non-Muslim minorities in Kelantan, which has been ruled by the Islamist party for decades

    He also expressed disbelief that there is 10 per cent of non-Muslims left in the north-eastern peninsular state that still backs PAS if the DAP were said to have such strong clout

    “How can DAP influence non-Muslim voters in Kelantan, unless they can see for themselves how racist and extremist PAS is? “What is surprising is that there are still 10 per cent of non-Muslims in Kelantan who still support PAS,” he said in a statement

    Mohd Amar is also deputy Kelantan mentri besar and was reported to have alleged that nearly 90 per cent of Chinese in Kelantan had rejected PAS candidates because they were swayed by the DAP

    “Mohd Amar should therefore not be surprised that non-Muslims have such a negative view of PAS that they will not vote the Islamist party in Kelantan,” Lim said

    He claimed that this was why Kelantan is the poorest state in peninsular Malaysia

    ['lim', 'pa', 'non', 'muslim', 'kelantan']

  • SINGAPORE RECALLS MALAYSIAN-MADE SOY SAUCE, HIGH BENZOIC ACID LEVELS DETECTED

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/03/singapore-recalls-malaysian-soy-sauce

    09/03/2022, 13:06

    45.45% Shortened!

    According to the Singapore Food Agency (SFA), the use of benzoic acid is not declared on the food packaging label of the product - Hand Flower Brand Soy Sauce

    "As a precautionary measure, SFA has directed the importer, Heng Yoon Trading Pte Ltd, to recall the implicated product

    The recall is ongoing,” SFA said on its Facebook page late Friday (Sept 2)

    Under the Singapore Food Regulations, SFA said only permitted food additives with levels within the maximum levels are allowed for use in food

    SFA said that a once-off consumption of the affected product is unlikely to be of food safety concern, especially because soy sauce is not a staple food consumed at high levels

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    ['singapore', 'recall', 'soy', 'sauce', 'level']

    According to the Singapore Food Agency (SFA), the use of benzoic acid is not declared on the food packaging label of the product - Hand Flower Brand Soy Sauce

    "As a precautionary measure, SFA has directed the importer, Heng Yoon Trading Pte Ltd, to recall the implicated product

    The recall is ongoing,” SFA said on its Facebook page late Friday (Sept 2)

    Under the Singapore Food Regulations, SFA said only permitted food additives with levels within the maximum levels are allowed for use in food

    SFA said that a once-off consumption of the affected product is unlikely to be of food safety concern, especially because soy sauce is not a staple food consumed at high levels

    Ta’awun is an Arabic term meaning co-operation

    PAS has said that it is open to political co-operation with any party in the next general election, despite being a component member of the Perikatan Nasional (PN) coalition

    In his policy speech, Hadi in his speech said that PAS rejects any racial unity agenda that is narrow and has limited vision

    “This is very important to overcome the great problems of the people, not just a narrow political agenda, short term and not in harmony with Islam,” he said

    "To date, Thai police issued arrest warrants to 153 individuals, including Thai Army officers and local officials who were allegedly involved in the human trafficking in 2015

    Similar graves were also found in Thailand

  • MP SPEAKS | GE15 A BATTLE BETWEEN RULE OF LAW AND CORRUPTION

    https://www.malaysiakini.com/columns/634411

    09/03/2022, 10:07

    60.0% Shortened!

    MP SPEAKS | With Rosmah Mansor’s conviction and jail sentence for corruption, a week after Federal Court’s unanimous dismissal of former prime minister Najib Abdul Razak’s appeal on his first corruption trial, there is more light at the end of the tunnel

    GE15 will be a battle between the rule of law and corruption

    Will the former win and bring even “more light at the end of the tunnel”

    There is no surety beforehand that Najib would be jailed or his wife Rosmah found guilty

    Umno and BN want to turn GE15 into a vote for Najib and Rosmah and against the nine judges who had unanimously adjudged Najib guilty of corruption and the High Court judge who found Rosmah also guilty of corruption on Thursday

    In the next general election, a vote for Umno and BN will be a vote for Najib and for corruption against the rule of law

    ['rosmah', 'corruption', 'former', 'najib', 'nation']

  • LIVERPOOL GOT £7.7M STEAL BUT MADE £25M OVERSIGHT AS FIRST JULIAN WARD TRANSFER WINDOW ASSESSED

    https://www.liverpool.com/liverpool-fc-news/transfer-news/julian-ward-liverpool-transfer-window-24916834

    09/03/2022

    85.0% Shortened!

    Julian Ward was flying solo for Liverpool for the first time in the summer transfer window

    The new Liverpool sporting director has had a comprehensive apprenticeship under Michael Edwards, having previously taken the lead in the January transfer window, but nothing could have prepared him for this

    But what is effectively a stop-gap deal is unlikely to define Ward’s first transfer window in sole charge

    There is nothing especially wrong with the fees Liverpool received for those players who have departed

    Between the pair of them, Ward could have hoped to raise somewhere in the region of £25m

    Even so, Ward has to be given credit for a very reasonable first transfer window at the helm for Liverpool

    ['ward', 'liverpool', 'transfer', 'window', 'sign']

    Julian Ward was flying solo for Liverpool for the first time in the summer transfer window

    The new Liverpool sporting director has had a comprehensive apprenticeship under Michael Edwards, having previously taken the lead in the January transfer window, but nothing could have prepared him for this

    But what is effectively a stop-gap deal is unlikely to define Ward’s first transfer window in sole charge

    There is nothing especially wrong with the fees Liverpool received for those players who have departed

    Between the pair of them, Ward could have hoped to raise somewhere in the region of £25m

    Even so, Ward has to be given credit for a very reasonable first transfer window at the helm for Liverpool

    ['ward', 'liverpool', 'transfer', 'window', 'sign']



  • SINGAPORE FOOD AGENCY RECALLS HAND FLOWER BRAND SOY SAUCE FOR UNDECLARED ADDITIVE BENZOIC ACID

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/singapore/2022/09/03/singapore-food-agency-recalls-hand-flower-brand-soy-sauce-for-undeclared-additive-benzoic-acid/26211

    09/03/2022, 08:07

    45.45% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise SINGAPORE, Sept 3 — The Singapore Food Agency (SFA) said yesterday that it has ordered the recall of a type of Malaysian-made soy sauce after it detected a type of additive that exceeded the regulatory limit for sauces here

    The additive — which it identified as benzoic acid — was not declared on the food packaging of the Hand Flower Brand soy sauce

    Only permitted food additives that are within the imposed maximum levels are allowed for use in food under the Singapore Food Regulations

    This is especially because soy sauce is “not a staple food consumed at high levels”, it added

    However, consumers should not take food containing high levels of benzoic acid over a long period of time

    “This is because even though benzoic acid is a common additive, which is safe when used in small quantities, studies in animals fed with high doses of benzoic acid have shown disorder of the central nervous system as well as changes in their brains,” SFA said

    ['food', 'sauce', 'additive', 'benzoic', 'acid']

    About Us Advertise SINGAPORE, Sept 3 — The Singapore Food Agency (SFA) said yesterday that it has ordered the recall of a type of Malaysian-made soy sauce after it detected a type of additive that exceeded the regulatory limit for sauces here

    The additive — which it identified as benzoic acid — was not declared on the food packaging of the Hand Flower Brand soy sauce

    Only permitted food additives that are within the imposed maximum levels are allowed for use in food under the Singapore Food Regulations

    This is especially because soy sauce is “not a staple food consumed at high levels”, it added

    However, consumers should not take food containing high levels of benzoic acid over a long period of time

    “This is because even though benzoic acid is a common additive, which is safe when used in small quantities, studies in animals fed with high doses of benzoic acid have shown disorder of the central nervous system as well as changes in their brains,” SFA said

    ['food', 'sauce', 'additive', 'benzoic', 'acid']

  • 10 MALAYSIANS ON DEATH ROW IN SINGAPORE, MOSTLY FOR DRUG OFFENCES

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/03/10-waiting-to-hang-in-singapore

    09/03/2022, 08:07

    83.33% Shortened!

    This was followed on July 7 by Kalwant Singh, 32, being executed in Singapore for drug trafficking

    Shanmugam said it was understandable that there would be people speaking out against the mandatory death sentence, but highlighted what he said were thousands of lives and families destroyed by drug traffickers

    “Nearly seven out of 10 Singaporeans or 70% of our people say that mandatory death penalty for drug trafficking is appropriate

    When talking about murder, nearly 80% say there must be the mandatory death penalty,” he said

    Malaysia imposed a moratorium on the death sentence in 2018

    The death sentence in itself will not be abolished

  • HER FAMILY'S ALL MALAYSIAN, BUT SHE CAN'T GET CITIZENSHIP

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/03/her-familys-all-malaysian-but-she-cant-get-citizenship

    09/03/2022, 08:07

    60.0% Shortened!

    Now a 52-year-old grandmother, she remains puzzled why she still holds a permanent resident (PR) status, despite both her parents being Malaysian

    “Yes, I was born in Brunei, as both my parents worked in a hair salon there, but at the age of five, I was brought back to Malaysia

    “My late father had applied for my PR status when we got back to Malaysia, and at the age of 12, I received my PR status

    “My younger brother is a Malaysian, my late husband is a Malaysian, my 25-year-old daughter is a Malaysian, my grandchild is a Malaysian, and I am now 52, and still holding a red identification card,” she told a press conference organised by state MCA Public Service and Complaints Bureau chief Low Guo Nan here yesterday

    Low said he is helping Hew by writing in to the Home Minister as well as to the secretary to the Prime Minister.

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    ['hew', 'low', 'press', 'apply', 'malaysian']

    Now a 52-year-old grandmother, she remains puzzled why she still holds a permanent resident (PR) status, despite both her parents being Malaysian

    “My late father had applied for my PR status when we got back to Malaysia, and at the age of 12, I received my PR status

    “My younger brother is a Malaysian, my late husband is a Malaysian, my 25-year-old daughter is a Malaysian, my grandchild is a Malaysian, and I am now 52, and still holding a red identification card,” she told a press conference organised by state MCA Public Service and Complaints Bureau chief Low Guo Nan here yesterday

    Low said he is helping Hew by writing in to the Home Minister as well as to the secretary to the Prime Minister.

  • SCEPTICAL OF UNITED OPPOSITION FRONT IN GE15, PSM SAYS WILLING TO JOIN FORCES UNDER ONE CONDITION

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/03/sceptical-of-united-opposition-front-in-ge15-psm-says-willing-to-join-forces-under-one-condition/25576

    09/03/2022, 08:07

    76.0% Shortened!

    He added what happened in the Johor state election might be repeated in the general election due to the lack of time and interest among the opposition parties to form a united front

    "Even within PKR, Rafizi who is now the deputy president is not into it, he is mainly on his way to building up the party by itself, so we think the big tent will not happen before GE15,” he said

    Speaking of the condition to join an electoral pact for GE15, Sivarajan said PSM's candidates must remain in the same party after winning seats in the election, and carry out their duties as PSM members in state assemblies and parliamentary meetings

    "But of course, we agreed that we are part of the opposition bloc, we sit in the opposition, and we will support the opposition in the voting process

    PSM had previously contested and won the Sungai Siput seat in the 2008 and 2013 general elections under PKR's ticket

    The party then decided to contest on their own in the 2018 general election but had lost their Sungai Siput seat to another PKR candidate

    ['party', 'psm', 'opposition', 'election', 'ge15']

  • 'NAJIB HAD RIGHT TO BE BRIEFED ON AUDIT REPORT'

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/03/najib-had-right-to-be-briefed-on-audit-report

    09/03/2022, 08:07

    62.5% Shortened!

    Malaysian Anti-Corruption Commission (MACC) investigation branch senior superintendent Haniff Lami, 34, also agreed with the suggestion of lawyer Tan Sri Muhammad Shafee Abdullah, who is representing Najib, that 1MDB was 100% owned by the Minister of Finance Incorporated and that Najib was the Finance Minister then

    “I started serving in MACC as an investigating officer in 2016, two years before I was assigned to investigate this audit report amendment case in 2018,” he said at the trial of Najib and former 1MDB chief executive officer Arul Kanda Kandasamy on alleged tampering of the 1MDB audit report

    Haniff said he was also aware of a statement by former auditor-general Tan Sri Ambrin Buang to the media in Parliament in December 2018 that no one could amend the 1MDB audit report without his (Ambrin) agreement

    Arul Kanda, 45, is charged with abetting Najib in making the amendments to the report to protect Najib from being subjected to action

    Report it to us

    Ahead of Saturday’s Merseyside derby, Jurgen Klopp had some positive news on the availability of two key players in Friday’s pre-match press conference

    You’re not wrong, Jurgen! The boss has expressed his delight at potentially being able to call upon both Darwin Nunez and Diogo Jota in Saturday’s Merseyside derby, in what would be the first time the Reds have had five attackers available this season

    And Klopp also had news of another forward that could make a comeback at Goodison Park, with Jota returning to training on Thursday

    “He trained yesterday [Thursday] with the team for the first time

    He will train today and we have to make a decision if it makes sense to incline him already or not

    “If we do, it’s the first time we have five attackers, it feels like Christmas! We will make changes, we will see.” There was also a positive update on the fitness of Thiago and Calvin Ramsay, who look to be next in line to make their returns

    The Serie A side say Liverpool can pay €37.5million (£32.3million) to tie Arthur to a longer-term deal

    Liverpool’s official statement on the signing made no mention of such an arrangement

    Liverpool will pay most of the player’s wages

  • MALAYSIAN FUGITIVE BUSINESSMAN TEDY TEOW TO BE DEPORTED TO CHINA, SAY THAI COPS

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/world/2022/09/02/malaysian-fugitive-businessman-tedy-teow-to-be-deported-to-china-say-thai-cops

    09/02/2022, 23:07

    62.5% Shortened!

    Teow Wooi Huat after his arrest in Thailand

    Malaysia and China were after Teow who was on the Interpol Red Notice list for questioning

    Teow was under Thai Immigration Police custody after his visa was revoked on July 22, and since then he had been awaiting deportation by the Thai authorities

    On July 25, the Royal Malaysia Police said it was in the process of applying for Teow to be repatriated to Malaysia to assist in investigations under Section 420 of the Penal Code for cheating

    On Aug 9, Teow was supposed to be repatriated to Malaysia but was stopped at the airport as Thai authorities also received an extradition request from the Chinese government

    The 55-year-old Teow founded the MBI Group and operated entertainment complexes, including a resort in Danok at the Thailand-Malaysia border, and also built a business empire from dubious online investment schemes that attracted investors from China, Thailand, Malaysia, Indonesia and Macau

    ['teow', 'malaysian', 'tedy', 'china', 'police']

  • GOVT NOT RULING OUT POSSIBILITY THAT DNB SHARES MIGHT BE OFFERED TO FOREIGN MNOS

    https://www.thestar.com.my/business/business-news/2022/09/02/govt-not-ruling-out-possibility-that-dnb-shares-might-be-offered-to-foreign-mnos

    09/02/2022

    80.0% Shortened!

    Will the 70 per cent be divided among the remaining MNOs? The government still holds to the principle that the 5G network needs to be jointly developed with local MNOs and maintains its decision to not be the majority shareholder in DNB

    This is in line with the request from domestic MNOs that they hold equity interest in DNB

    The government welcomes the decision by the four MNOs which are still committed to develop the 5G network with DNB

    As for the 70 per cent equity in DNB, we are considering whether it will be divided among the four MNOs, or for the remaining shares to be held by the government, but not at the level of a majority shareholding in DNB

    Government policy is that domestic MNOs will get priority, however, if there is a balance of outstanding shares to be subscribed, the government will not reject the possibility of offering DNB shares to foreign MNOs

    For the MNOs that did not subscribe to DNB shares, they can still offer 5G access via the 5G access agreement

    ['share', 'dnb', 'government', 'network', 'subscribe']

    This is in line with the request from domestic MNOs that they hold equity interest in DNB

    The government welcomes the decision by the four MNOs which are still committed to develop the 5G network with DNB

    As for the 70 per cent equity in DNB, we are considering whether it will be divided among the four MNOs, or for the remaining shares to be held by the government, but not at the level of a majority shareholding in DNB

  • ROSMAH FILES APPEALS AGAINST BRIBERY CONVICTION, RM970M FINE, JAIL TERM AND FAILURE TO REMOVE TRIAL JUDGE ZAINI

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/02/rosmah-files-appeals-against-bribery-conviction-rm970m-fine-jail-term-and-failure-to-remove-trial-judge-zaini/26167

    09/02/2022

    66.67% Shortened!

    In a notice of appeal filed today at the Court of Appeal, Rosmah said she wanted to appeal against Zaini’s decision yesterday which rejected her application to recuse or remove him from the case

    In the other notice of appeal also filed today at the Court of Appeal, Rosmah said she was dissatisfied with Zaini’s entire decision yesterday in her bribery case, where the judge convicted her and sentenced her to jail and to pay a fine

    In other words, Rosmah is appealing against both the conviction and sentence

    This means that the total jail time Rosmah could potentially have to serve is 40 years, if she does not succeed in her appeal

    As Rosmah’s lawyers yesterday asked for the 10-year jail sentence and RM970 million fine to be suspended while she pursues an appeal and as the prosecution did not object to the request, the High Court yesterday allowed the suspension or stay of sentence until the Court of Appeal decides on her appeal

    Rosmah did not have to pay additional bail to avoid being in lock-up while pursuing her appeal, as the High Court allowed the previous RM2 million bail already posted to be extended to serve as her bail until the Court of Appeal decides on her appeal

    ['rosmah', 'appeal', 'court', 'sentence', 'jail']

    Next week the Huawei Mate 50 series will introduce several new features to the family, which now enters its 10th generation

    What does Huawei have in store for us? CEO Richard Yu gave an interview in which he teased three major features

    First is the XMAGE imaging system, which will be exclusive to the Mate 50 series

    It is the result of years of experience of making some of the best camera phones on the market, even if Huawei no longer has access to Leica’s expertise

    Rumor has it that the XMAGE system is based on a custom NPU built by HiSilicon instead of relying on the Snapdragon ISP

    Finally, the Huawei Mate 50 series will introduce the new HarmonyOS 3 to the world

    Huawei will unveil the new Mate 50 series at its Autumn Product Launch Conference, which is scheduled for September 6 (Tuesday, which also happens to be the day before the iPhone 14 reveal)

  • BUNG MOKTAR AND WIFE ORDERED TO ENTER DEFENCE OVER FELCRA GRAFT CHARGES

    https://www.theedgemarkets.com/article/bung-moktar-and-wife-ordered-enter-defence-over-felcra-graft-charges

    09/02/2022, 18:07

    68.42% Shortened!

    Sessions Court judge Rozina Ayob made the ruling on Friday (Sept 2) after finding that the prosecution had established a prima facie case on the three graft charges Bung Moktar faces and three abetment charges Zizie faces

    Similarly, the judge said she is satisfied that a prima facie case has been established by the prosecution with regards to the charges under Section 28(1)(c) of the MACC Act against Zizie

    Rozina said the prosecution has also proven that the funds amounting to RM2.8 million were obtained via Zizie

    The judge gave Bung Moktar and Zizie three options — to testify under oath from the witness stand; to give testimony from the accused dock while not under oath, where they cannot be cross-examined; or to choose to remain silent

    Bung Moktar’s lawyer M Athimulan and Zizie’s lawyer Datuk K Kumaraendran, speaking on their clients’ behalf, said the pair will give sworn evidence from the witness stand with the prosecution having an opportunity to cross-examine them

    The court has fixed Sept 23 for the pair to begin their defence case

    ['bung', 'moktar', 'zizie', 'prosecution', 'charge']

    Similarly, the judge said she is satisfied that a prima facie case has been established by the prosecution with regards to the charges under Section 28(1)(c) of the MACC Act against Zizie

  • MACC OFFICER SAYS PROBE HINGED ON NAJIB'S INSTRUCTIONS TO AMBRIN FOR 1MDB AUDIT REPORT CHANGES, ARUL KANDA'S LAWYER CHALLENGES THIS

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/02/macc-officer-says-probe-hinged-on-najibs-instructions-to-ambrin-for-1mdb-audit-report-changes-arul-kandas-lawyer-challenges-this/26149

    09/02/2022, 18:07

    78.57% Shortened!

    Asked by Sivananthan, MACC officer Haniff reaffirmed his previous testimony that his investigation was focused on changes to the 1MDB audit report on orders from Najib to Ambrin

    Haniff agreed that this meant that the basis of his investigation was based on his understanding that Ambrin had been instructed to make changes to the 1MDB audit report, and agreed this was why he carried out investigations

    Haniff agreed that Ambrin’s testimony of making amendments at his own discretion and the claim of instructions being given to Ambrin to make amendments were two different things, also agreeing that Ambrin would have the right as auditor-general then to make any amendments

    Later when asked by Najib’s lawyer Tan Sri Muhammad Shafee Abdullah, Haniff agreed that the auditor in this case is the auditor-general Ambrin and his team and that 1MDB is the auditee and has to be represented by actual individuals as it is a company

    Najib’s and Arul Kanda’s lawyers have during the trial tried to suggest that this may not be the final exit conference

    But Haniff today insisted that the December 2015 exit conference was the actual one held, and said a subsequent February 24, 2016 meeting was not an exit conference

    ['audit', '1mdb', 'najib', 'ambrin', 'haniff']

    Haniff agreed that this meant that the basis of his investigation was based on his understanding that Ambrin had been instructed to make changes to the 1MDB audit report, and agreed this was why he carried out investigations

  • SIX QUESTIONS ABOUT NAJIB'S PEKAN SEAT (AND GE15 DREAMS) NOW THAT HE'S IN PRISON

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/02/six-questions-about-najibs-pekan-seat-and-ge15-dreams-now-that-hes-in-prison/26012

    09/02/2022

    88.24% Shortened!

    “Disqualification as MP will not take effect if petition for pardon is filed within 14-day period,” he told Malay Mail when contacted, referring specifically to Article 48(4)(c)

    Based on Section 36(a) that will exclude August 23 (the date of the Federal Court’s decision in Najib’s SRC appeal) from the calculation of the 14-day period, and based on Section 36(d) which would effectively mean the 14-day period covers calendar days (instead of just working days), the 14-day period from the date Najib’s conviction was upheld will be September 6

    Will there be a by-election if Najib is disqualified after 14 days? Khoo said there would not be a by-election for Najib’s Pekan seat if he were to be disqualified now and under the current circumstances

    No more GE15 dreams for Najib? Even if Najib pursues a review or pardon over his conviction, Khoo said Najib may not contest in the next general election, due to the constitutional provision of Article 48(5)

    Shanmuga also cited Article 48(5) when saying that Najib is immediately disallowed from becoming an election candidate after his conviction

    He won the seat

    ['najib', 'year', 'court', 'say', 'article']

    “Disqualification as MP will not take effect if petition for pardon is filed within 14-day period,” he told Malay Mail when contacted, referring specifically to Article 48(4)(c)

    Based on Section 36(a) that will exclude August 23 (the date of the Federal Court’s decision in Najib’s SRC appeal) from the calculation of the 14-day period, and based on Section 36(d) which would effectively mean the 14-day period covers calendar days (instead of just working days), the 14-day period from the date Najib’s conviction was upheld will be September 6

    Will there be a by-election if Najib is disqualified after 14 days? Khoo said there would not be a by-election for Najib’s Pekan seat if he were to be disqualified now and under the current circumstances

    No more GE15 dreams for Najib? Even if Najib pursues a review or pardon over his conviction, Khoo said Najib may not contest in the next general election, due to the constitutional provision of Article 48(5)

    Shanmuga also cited Article 48(5) when saying that Najib is immediately disallowed from becoming an election candidate after his conviction

    He won the seat

    ['najib', 'year', 'court', 'say', 'article']



  • TEENAGER KILLED, SEVEN HURT IN FOUR-VEHICLE CRASH

    “A family of five, including three children, in one car were injured

    “One of the two female occupants of another car – an 18-year-old – died, while the other was injured

    “Another man in a sedan was also injured, while the lorry driver escaped unhurt,” he said

  • UMNO PRESIDENT: HOW TO CONTINUE MUAFAKAT NASIONAL WHEN PAS HAS CHOSEN TO JOIN PERIKATAN?

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/02/umno-president-how-to-continue-muafakat-nasional-when-pas-has-chosen-to-join-perikatan/26139

    09/02/2022, 17:14

    45.45% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Sept 2 — Umno president Datuk Seri Ahmad Zahid Hamidi today seemingly dissolved his party’s partnership with PAS under Muafakat Nasional (MN), saying that it was based on trust, which was lost when PAS chose to join Perikatan Nasional (PN) under Bersatu

    “How can stability, confidence and strong cooperation be achieved if the most basic things like principles and trust are ignored? Even more with a party that clearly wants to destroy Umno from within and without,” he said on Facebook

    Commenting on a screenshot of a news report on PAS deputy president Datuk Seri Tuan Ibrahim Tuan Man’s statement that the Islamist party never declared that its partnership with Umno under MN was over, Ahmad Zahid said that the partnership was originally formed out of the urgent need of the two largest parties in Malaysia as a result of the people losing faith in the Pakatan Harapan (PH) government of the time

    “From what I can see, the cooperation that PAS conveyed is only a form of shallow political cooperation that does not take into account the needs of the people as the true spirit of MN,” he said, adding that the sincerity of PAS can only be seen if it returned to the original partnership

    He said that Umno needs to move forward and that his party has decided to proceed solo due to the actions and attitude of PAS

    Even if it’s not in a political context, we have many more issues to look at together, so that platform must exist,” he had explained

    ['umno', 'party', 'partnership', 'pa', 'say']

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Sept 2 — Umno president Datuk Seri Ahmad Zahid Hamidi today seemingly dissolved his party’s partnership with PAS under Muafakat Nasional (MN), saying that it was based on trust, which was lost when PAS chose to join Perikatan Nasional (PN) under Bersatu

    “How can stability, confidence and strong cooperation be achieved if the most basic things like principles and trust are ignored? Even more with a party that clearly wants to destroy Umno from within and without,” he said on Facebook

    Commenting on a screenshot of a news report on PAS deputy president Datuk Seri Tuan Ibrahim Tuan Man’s statement that the Islamist party never declared that its partnership with Umno under MN was over, Ahmad Zahid said that the partnership was originally formed out of the urgent need of the two largest parties in Malaysia as a result of the people losing faith in the Pakatan Harapan (PH) government of the time

    “From what I can see, the cooperation that PAS conveyed is only a form of shallow political cooperation that does not take into account the needs of the people as the true spirit of MN,” he said, adding that the sincerity of PAS can only be seen if it returned to the original partnership

    He said that Umno needs to move forward and that his party has decided to proceed solo due to the actions and attitude of PAS

    Even if it’s not in a political context, we have many more issues to look at together, so that platform must exist,” he had explained

    ['umno', 'party', 'partnership', 'pa', 'say']

  • BUNG MOKTAR, WIFE ORDERED TO ENTER DEFENCE ON CORRUPTION CHARGES INVOLVING FELCRA'S RM150MIL INVESTMENT

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/02/bung-moktar-wife-ordered-to-enter-defence-on-corruption-charges-involving-felcras-rm150mil-investment

    09/02/2022, 16:13

    70.0% Shortened!

    Bung Moktar, 64, who is also Kinabatangan MP, and Zizie Izette later said that they will be giving evidence under oath

    According to the first charge, Bung Moktar, who was then the non-executive chairman of Felcra, was accused of accepting bribes of RM2.2mil in cash from Public Mutual's investment agent, Madhi Abdul Hamid, through Zizie Izette, at Public Bank's Taman Melawati branch here between 12.30pm and 5pm on June 12, 2015

    For the second charge, Bung Moktar is accused of accepting a bribe of RM262,500 in cash from Madhi through the Public Islamic Treasures Growth Fund (PITGF) account number 044797816 registered in the name of Zizie Izette, for a similar purpose

    Athimulan represents Bung Moktar and lawyers Datuk K

    Kumaraendran and Ridha Abdah Subri are counsels for Zizie Izette

    Zizie Izette Abdul Samad

  • 'BILLION DOLLAR WHALE' AUTHOR CLAIMS PREVENTED ROSMAH FROM RECEIVING UNESCO AWARD IN 2016

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/02/billion-dollar-whale-author-claims-prevented-rosmah-from-receiving-unesco-award-in-2016/26110

    09/02/2022, 14:13

    66.67% Shortened!

    “In September 2016, the UN was going to honour Rosmah with an award at a gala dinner at the Met in New York for her work with a children’s charity

    “So we called Unesco and told them, but they still wanted to give the award

    @NickKristof of the New York Times was also an awardee, so we also emailed him, and to his credit he declined to accept an award alongside Rosmah

    “Eventually the UN pulled the ‘Lead By Example’ award for Rosmah, and thank heavens for them,” he said

    Rosmah was selected to receive Unesco’s 'Lead by Example' award in conjunction with the 71st United Nations General Assembly in 2016, before the organisation withdrew it

    However, the award was then withdrawn at the last minute as the committee were worried about the links between the organisation and Rosmah.

    ['award', 'rosmah', 'receive', 'unesco', 'say']

    09/02/2022, 14:10

    68.42% Shortened!

    Friday, 02 Sep 2022

    The junta has said Suu Kyi is being given due process

    The military seized power in February 2021 to stop Suu Kyi's NLD from forming a new government after the election that it said had instances of fraud that had not properly been investigated

    The NLD has denied fraud and said it won fairly

    Suu Kyi, 76, has been on trial for more than a year on multiple charges, ranging from corruption and incitement to leaks of official secrets, for which the combined maximum sentences is more than 190 years

    A gag order has been imposed on Suu Kyi's lawyers

    ['myanmar', 'suu', 'kyi', 'fraud', 'sentence']

    The junta has said Suu Kyi, 77, is being given due process

    The military seized power in February 2021 to stop Suu Kyi's NLD from forming a new government after the election that it said had instances of fraud that had not properly been investigated

    Suu Kyi has been on trial for more than a year on multiple charges, ranging from corruption and incitement to leaks of official secrets, for which the combined maximum sentences are more than 190 years

    A gag order has been imposed on Suu Kyi's lawyers

    In June, Myanmar military authorities transferred Suu Kyi to solitary confinement in a prison in the capital Naypyitaw from an undisclosed location

  • RPG MAKER UNITE DEBUT TRAILER; AUTO-GUIDE FEATURE AND ADDON MANAGER DETAILED

    https://www.gematsu.com/2022/09/rpg-maker-unite-debut-trailer-auto-guide-feature-and-addon-manager-detailed

    09/02/2022, 13:17

    64.71% Shortened!

    Gotcha Gotcha Games has released the first trailer for RPG Maker Unite, plus new information and screenshots introducing the role-playing game creation tool’s Auto-Guide feature and Addon Manager

    ■ Turning the Mundane Task of Game Balancing into a Breeze! When we talk about game creation, oftentimes most of us would first picture the arts and game play, essentially the catchiest parts of a game

    However, a good game title requires a good game balance to provide a satisfying gameplay experience

    Good News! RPG Maker Unite comes with a new feature called “Auto-Guide” that can alleviate this time constraint hurdle in the game creation process! ■ Convenient and Easy to Use! Simply Enter Some Parameters and Let the System Do the Hard Work! Aimed at helping game creators tuning game balance more easily, it is only natural that the Auto-Guide being super easy to use – and indeed it is! Initially, simply set some Common Settings parameters such as Max Level, Estimated Clear Level, Max EXP, and Max HP, and the user is largely ready to go! The system will use these values as basis to compute a suggested balance for many parameters common in RPG making! —Setting some initial parameters for the Auto-Guide to compute and auto-fill parameters such as Enemy Stats! —At the click of a button, enemy stats can be auto-generated using the Auto-Guide! ■ Auto-Guide is Also Available for Setting Class Growth Tendency and Equipment Stats! Auto-Guide also works for auto-setting the parameters for the classes assigned to party members

    Simply set some basic, common parameters, and check the box telling the system you want to use Auto-Guide, all values and multipliers are automatically filled for you! —Using Auto-Guide for battle related skill stats! ■ Addon Manager to Help Control and Manage Modifications! While RPG Maker Unite can be modified directly in the Unity editor via C#, many users have voiced that a feature similar to the Plugin Manager found in previous RPG Maker titles that can switch on and off modifications, is much more convenient and beginner friendly

    Instructions written by the addon authors are also displayed here too! ■ Developer Log #6 Now Available! In Developer Log #6, we will explain in more details on how to use Auto-Guide will work! If you are curious, please give it a read! RPG Maker Unite is due out for PC via Steam and Unity Asset Store in 2022 worldwide

    ['game', 'auto', 'guide', 'parameter', 'stats']

    Gotcha Gotcha Games has released the first trailer for RPG Maker Unite, plus new information and screenshots introducing the role-playing game creation tool’s Auto-Guide feature and Addon Manager

    ■ Turning the Mundane Task of Game Balancing into a Breeze! When we talk about game creation, oftentimes most of us would first picture the arts and game play, essentially the catchiest parts of a game

    However, a good game title requires a good game balance to provide a satisfying gameplay experience

    Good News! RPG Maker Unite comes with a new feature called “Auto-Guide” that can alleviate this time constraint hurdle in the game creation process! ■ Convenient and Easy to Use! Simply Enter Some Parameters and Let the System Do the Hard Work! Aimed at helping game creators tuning game balance more easily, it is only natural that the Auto-Guide being super easy to use – and indeed it is! Initially, simply set some Common Settings parameters such as Max Level, Estimated Clear Level, Max EXP, and Max HP, and the user is largely ready to go! The system will use these values as basis to compute a suggested balance for many parameters common in RPG making! —Setting some initial parameters for the Auto-Guide to compute and auto-fill parameters such as Enemy Stats! —At the click of a button, enemy stats can be auto-generated using the Auto-Guide! ■ Auto-Guide is Also Available for Setting Class Growth Tendency and Equipment Stats! Auto-Guide also works for auto-setting the parameters for the classes assigned to party members

    Simply set some basic, common parameters, and check the box telling the system you want to use Auto-Guide, all values and multipliers are automatically filled for you! —Using Auto-Guide for battle related skill stats! ■ Addon Manager to Help Control and Manage Modifications! While RPG Maker Unite can be modified directly in the Unity editor via C#, many users have voiced that a feature similar to the Plugin Manager found in previous RPG Maker titles that can switch on and off modifications, is much more convenient and beginner friendly

    Instructions written by the addon authors are also displayed here too! ■ Developer Log #6 Now Available! In Developer Log #6, we will explain in more details on how to use Auto-Guide will work! If you are curious, please give it a read! RPG Maker Unite is due out for PC via Steam and Unity Asset Store in 2022 worldwide

    ['game', 'auto', 'guide', 'parameter', 'stats']



  • THE XBOX GAME PASS FRIENDS AND FAMILY IS OFFICIAL, CURRENTLY NOW IN TESTING

    https://technave.com/gadget/The-Xbox-Game-Pass-Friends-and-Family-is-official-currently-now-in-testing-31573.html

    09/02/2022, 13:17

    68.42% Shortened!

    It was only recently that there was a leak about a new Xbox Game Pass Friends and Family package

    From the official Xbox webpage, the Xbox Game Pass Friends and Family package can add up to five individual accounts (including the primary holder) and each account has its own Xbox profile and games

    These five accounts don't need to be in the same household and everyone can play it at the same time, same game as well as playing together

    That said, this new Game Pass is only applicable for gamers who are living in the same country, though

    Currently, Microsoft is testing the plan in Ireland and Columbia at the price of €21.99 per month or 49,900 COP per month respectively

    In Malaysia, our currency may cost lower since we are paying RM15 per month for the Xbox PC Game Pass. The Xbox Game Pass Friends and Family plan is the same as the Xbox PC Game Pass, which allows gamers to play Xbox games on day one, EA Play membership and others.  For now, this seems to be for Xbox gamers but we hope that it can be implemented for Xbox PC Game Pass for Southeast Asia countries such as ours

    ['xbox', 'game', 'pas', 'play', 'plan']

    It was only recently that there was a leak about a new Xbox Game Pass Friends and Family package

    From the official Xbox webpage, the Xbox Game Pass Friends and Family package can add up to five individual accounts (including the primary holder) and each account has its own Xbox profile and games

    These five accounts don't need to be in the same household and everyone can play it at the same time, same game as well as playing together

    That said, this new Game Pass is only applicable for gamers who are living in the same country, though

    Currently, Microsoft is testing the plan in Ireland and Columbia at the price of €21.99 per month or 49,900 COP per month respectively

    In Malaysia, our currency may cost lower since we are paying RM15 per month for the Xbox PC Game Pass. The Xbox Game Pass Friends and Family plan is the same as the Xbox PC Game Pass, which allows gamers to play Xbox games on day one, EA Play membership and others.  For now, this seems to be for Xbox gamers but we hope that it can be implemented for Xbox PC Game Pass for Southeast Asia countries such as ours

    68.42% Shortened!

    Inti Creates will release Azure Striker Gunvolt 3 for PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4 on December 15 alongside the “Epilogue ATEMS” update, the developer announced

    ■ About Azure Striker Gunvolt 3 The Gunvolt series began in 2014 with the digital-exclusive 3DS game Azure Striker Gunvolt

    In 2016, Azure Striker Gunvolt 2 continued the story of hero Gunvolt alongside his rival Copen

    And now, in 2022, Azure Striker Gunvolt 3 finally picks up where 2 left off as an official sequel

    ■ Azure Striker Gunvolt 3 Coming to PlayStation on December 15 Azure Striker Gunvolt 3 will be coming to PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5 consoles on December 15th! The PlayStation 4 version will support upgrading the the PlayStation 5 version featuring fluid 120 frames per second gameplay

    “Epilogue ATEMS” will feature Zed-Omega as a brand-new playable character, complete with new story content taking place after the events of the main Azure Striker Gunvolt 3 story

  • THE VAR REVIEW: TOTTENHAM'S PENALTY, ISAK OFFSIDE, RAMSDALE FOUL

    https://global.espn.com/football/english-premier-league/story/4734387/the-var-review-tottenhams-penaltyisak-offsideramsdale-foul

    09/02/2022

    84.62% Shortened!

    In that match, referee Cuneyt Cakir was sent to the monitor by the VAR to give a penalty but he rejected the overturn and stuck with his original decision

    It means the VAR was correct to advise the penalty should be cancelled

    The VAR cannot go against the technology, which is mapped to each pitch individually

    The gap between the lines is even clearer on this decision; the attacker has to be offside (watch here.) As with Isak, the offside flag was raised by the assistant and the decision upheld by the VAR

    Then the VAR didn't advise a penalty when he probably should have, due to the shirt being pulled away from the body

    It's a classic example of the referee's decision on the pitch carrying the weight in VAR decisions -- whichever way the referee goes, the VAR wouldn't intervene

    ['referee', 'decision', 'var', 'penalty', 'review']

    In that match, referee Cuneyt Cakir was sent to the monitor by the VAR to give a penalty but he rejected the overturn and stuck with his original decision

    It means the VAR was correct to advise the penalty should be cancelled

    The VAR cannot go against the technology, which is mapped to each pitch individually

    The gap between the lines is even clearer on this decision; the attacker has to be offside (watch here.) As with Isak, the offside flag was raised by the assistant and the decision upheld by the VAR

    Then the VAR didn't advise a penalty when he probably should have, due to the shirt being pulled away from the body

    It's a classic example of the referee's decision on the pitch carrying the weight in VAR decisions -- whichever way the referee goes, the VAR wouldn't intervene

  • MEET NOTTINGHAM FOREST'S 21 SUMMER TRANSFERS: AWONIYI, HENDERSON AND MORE

    https://www.espn.com/soccer/soccer-transfers/story/4736065/meet-nottingham-forests-21-summer-transfers-awoniyihenderson-and-more

    09/02/2022

    87.76% Shortened!

    Welcome to Nottingham Forest, Taiwo Awoniyi

    1 spot, the 25-year-old opted for yet another loan at Forest in a bid to advance his chances of making England's 2022 World Cup squad

    Despite former club West Ham making their interest known, the 29-year-old England international opted to join Forest on a one-year deal

    The Greek club are also owned by Marinakis, Forest's majority owner

    He joins Forest on loan for the season

    Loic Bade (loan, Rennes) The final, record-extending signing of a hectic summer window for Forest saw right-back Bade join on a season-long loan from Ligue 1 side Rennes

    ['forest', 'club', 'make', 'back', 'year']

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/02/malaysian-fugitive-businessman-teow-to-be-deported-to-china-say-thai-police/26196

    09/02/2022

    53.85% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise BANGKOK, Sept 2 — Malaysian fugitive businessman Teow Wooi Huat is expected to be deported to China soon, though Malaysian police too had requested for his repatriation

    "Now, he (Teow) is under the custody of Immigration Police and (we are) preparing to send him to China,” he said

    Malaysia and China are after Teow who is on the Interpol Red Notice list for questioning

    Teow was under Thai Immigration Police custody after his visa was revoked on July 22, and since then he has been awaiting deportation by the Thai authorities

    On July 25, the Royal Malaysia Police (PDRM) said it is in the process of applying for Teow to be repatriated to Malaysia to assist in investigations under Section 420 of the Penal Code for cheating

    On August 9, Teow was supposed to be repatriated to Malaysia but was stopped at the airport as Thai authorities also received an extradition request from the Chinese government

    ['malaysian', 'teow', 'china', 'police', 'thai']

  • LEICESTER 0 MAN UTD 1: JADON SANCHO’S WINNER HEAPS MORE PRESSURE ON ROCK BOTTOM FOXES AND BOSS BRENDAN R...

    https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/19683446/leicester-man-utd-jadon-sancho-brendan-rodgers/

    09/02/2022, 08:43

    66.67% Shortened!

    FROM the depths of crisis to fifth in the Premier League in the space of ten days, Erik Ten Hag’s Manchester United’s have lift-off.  And after Jadon Sancho and Marcus Rashford continued to fuel this min-revival, can the United duo now earn a place on the plane to Qatar in November?  Sancho netted for the second time in United’s three-match winning run, after a classy assist from Rashford, as United deepened the air of despair around Leicester and piled further pressure on Foxes boss Brendan Rodgers.  Gareth Southgate had claimed that Sancho and Rashford had a long way to go to force their way back into his World Cup plans, as both suffered an alarming plunge in form last season.  Rashford enjoyed a bright first half here but struggled after the break and may still have a lot more convincing to do but he is a favourite of Southgate, who needs more goalscoring options.  And with £82million Antony newly arrived from Ajax, competition for places in the United forward is about to get stiffer.  Transfer deadline has now passed without Cristiano Ronaldo getting away from Old Trafford as well.  So Ten Hag has plenty of options and a certain level of optimism is creeping into a team which was humiliated in that horrific first half at Brentford last month.  The transformative victory over Liverpool, when Sancho and Rashford both scored, has now been followed up by back-to-back away wins.  Yet Leicester were poor, they are a team which looks to have had the lifeblood sucked out of them after a miserable transfer window.

    But United’s opener, midway through the first half, was sweet in its simplicity

    It was a mark of Leicester’s improved threat that Ten Hag brought on Casemiro, in place of winger Anthony Elanga, just before the hour mark.  Maddison, though, was beginning to cause United serious problems and he was wrestled over by Scott McTominay just outside the area but this time his dead-ball effort was charged down

    Ronaldo arrived in place of Sancho midway through the second half and he soon attempted a bicycle kick from an angle, yet duffed his effort wide across goal.

    "The Sun", "Sun", "Sun Online" are registered trademarks or trade names of News Group Newspapers Limited

    To see all content on The Sun, please use the Site Map

    09/02/2022, 08:12

    71.43% Shortened!

    The face mask mandate was initiated on Aug 1, 2020 at the height of the Covid-19 pandemic

    The reason for the government exploring the removal of the face mask mandate is for us to slowly transition back to our normal practices

    “The number of cases is coming down and the number of people who get severe infections, need hospitalisation or die from Covid-19 is also low.” Hoe said the risk of death from Covid-19 is approaching the level of influenza infection

    So, the move by the government to further ease the mask mandate is expected

    “People must understand that although the government will remove the mandate, those who still want to wear face masks can continue to do so

    “Mask use has resulted in pollution caused by the inappropriate disposal of masks

    ['health', 'face', 'mask', 'mandate', 'enclose']

  • NEXT UP FOR ROSMAH – THE APPEAL

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/02/next-up-for-rosmah---the-appeal

    09/02/2022, 08:12

    60.0% Shortened!

    Rosmah’s lawyer, Datuk Jagjit Singh, said the appeal would be filed “maybe tomorrow” and estimated the appeal process could take up to six months

    Rosmah, the wife of former Prime Minister Datuk Seri Najib Razak, has two higher courts to appeal against the verdict

    “Appeals at the Court of Appeal will be faster than trials at the High Court, as witnesses will no longer be called,” he added

    Rosmah’s former counsel, Datuk Geethan Ram Vincent, said the appeal would give Rosmah a chance to bring up issues that were not considered by the trial judge

    “The appeal is an opportunity for Rosmah to bring up various issues that were not adequately considered during trial.” He, too, said that appeals would generally be heard within six months

    Datin Seri Rosmah Mansor

    ['rosmah', 'appeal', 'high', 'court', 'say']

    Rosmah’s lawyer, Datuk Jagjit Singh, said the appeal would be filed “maybe tomorrow” and estimated the appeal process could take up to six months

    Rosmah, the wife of former Prime Minister Datuk Seri Najib Razak, has two higher courts to appeal against the verdict

    “Appeals at the Court of Appeal will be faster than trials at the High Court, as witnesses will no longer be called,” he added

    Rosmah’s former counsel, Datuk Geethan Ram Vincent, said the appeal would give Rosmah a chance to bring up issues that were not considered by the trial judge

    “The appeal is an opportunity for Rosmah to bring up various issues that were not adequately considered during trial.” He, too, said that appeals would generally be heard within six months

    Datin Seri Rosmah Mansor

    ['rosmah', 'appeal', 'high', 'court', 'say']

    09/02/2022, 08:10

    75.0% Shortened!

    MBSJ officers making their rounds during the first day of the two-hour parking limit implementation in six areas under the city council

    Under the new limit, the fee for the orange bays is 50sen for the first half hour with a maximum time limit of two hours

    The new limit is to free up parking space in high-traffic areas

    At the moment, payment of parking fees under this system can be done only via Smart Selangor and Flexi Parking apps

    Existing disabled parking spots are excluded from the new limit

    There will be a cooling-off period of an hour before motorists are allowed to re-park at any two-hour parking bays

    09/02/2022, 08:09

    71.43% Shortened!

    The suit, filed in March 2021, argued that Apple made it difficult for him to sell his app, Flicktype, on the App Store, after it seemingly lost interest in acquiring the tech

    Apple didn’t immediately respond to The Verge’s request for comment about the settlement

    However, he was able to offer some suggestions about what Apple could do to improve the App Store going forward

    (I didn’t say the company was moving in the direction we’d like to see.) Eleftheriou also suggested that Apple could be more publicly transparent about why apps were removed

    Eleftheriou has famously been finding and pointing out egregious scams on the App Store (something he’s still doing, according to TechCrunch), and he says that this sort of move would help the public get a sense of just how many scams were on the store, and how many get removed

    And while on first blush it seems like there’s not a lot of benefit to Apple, it could help the company prove that it’s getting better at stewarding the App Store

    ['eleftheriou', 'app', 'store', 'apple', 'say']
