  • SAMSUNG GALAXY TAB ACTIVE 4 PRO IS SUPER TOUGH, WATERPROOF AND HAS A REMOVABLE BATTERY

    https://www.pocket-lint.com/tablets/news/samsung/162460-samsung-galaxy-tab-active-4-pro

    09/01/2022, 15:10

    50.0% Shortened!

    (Pocket-lint) - Samsung has announced the Galaxy Tab Active 4 Pro tablet, designed to be tough enough to use outside of the office, wherever you might fancy working

    The tablet features MIL-STD-810H military-grade toughness and Samsung claims it is "tough enough to endure even the most demanding work environments"

    Did someone say beach working? - The Galaxy Tab Active 4 Pro offers a 10.2mm frame, weighs 674g and it features Corning Gorilla Glass 5 protection

    There's a replaceable 7600mAh battery on board, as well as fast charging, and there's also a No Battery Mode that allows the tablet to be used continuously at a kiosk or in a vehicle without the battery

    The Samsung Galaxy Tab Active 4 Pro runs on Android 12.0 out of the box and Samsung will offer five years of security updates and three years of OS updates

    The Galaxy Tab Active 4 Pro will be available starting September in parts of Europe, with availability in Asia, Latin America, North America and the Middle East to follow later this year

    ['samsung', 'galaxy', 'tab', 'active', 'pro']

    (Pocket-lint) - Samsung has announced the Galaxy Tab Active 4 Pro tablet, designed to be tough enough to use outside of the office, wherever you might fancy working

    The tablet features MIL-STD-810H military-grade toughness and Samsung claims it is "tough enough to endure even the most demanding work environments"

    Did someone say beach working? - The Galaxy Tab Active 4 Pro offers a 10.2mm frame, weighs 674g and it features Corning Gorilla Glass 5 protection

    There's a replaceable 7600mAh battery on board, as well as fast charging, and there's also a No Battery Mode that allows the tablet to be used continuously at a kiosk or in a vehicle without the battery

    The Samsung Galaxy Tab Active 4 Pro runs on Android 12.0 out of the box and Samsung will offer five years of security updates and three years of OS updates

    The Galaxy Tab Active 4 Pro will be available starting September in parts of Europe, with availability in Asia, Latin America, North America and the Middle East to follow later this year

    Google Play Store is receiving a new app update with a 29.6.20 version and package size of 24.25 Megabytes

    Google is sending a new app update for Google Play Store that comes with version 29.6.15 and an update package size of 47.66MB

    Google has started upgrading the Google Play Store app with the release of the latest 29.4.13 version

  • HOME MINISTRY ANNOUNCES PREMIUM VISA PROGRAMME FOR GLOBAL TYCOONS

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/01/home-ministry-announces-premium-visa-programme-for-global-tycoons/25904

    09/01/2022, 14:50

    60.0% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise PUTRAJAYA, Sept 1 — The Home Ministry has launched the new Malaysia Premium Visa Programme (PVIP) to attract global tycoons to Malaysia

    Home Minister Datuk Seri Hamzah Zainudin said the programme will commence on October 1

    He also said that PVIP, conducted in conjunction with the Immigration Department, will be based on the concept of “Residency Through Investment”, with one of the main criteria being that applicants must have at least RM1 million in a fixed deposit account

    He said that the programme will be available to citizens of all countries except Israel and those that have no diplomatic ties with Malaysia

    “The Cabinet meeting on August 17, 2022 agreed to the proposed creation of a new programme with the concept of Residency Through Investment called the Malaysia Premium Visa Programme (PVIP) to drive economic growth, generate national income and open up more job opportunities for locals,” he said during the programme’s launch at the Home Ministry here today

    According to Hamzah, the immigration department and the police will ensure regular enforcement of the programme’s policies and requirements

    ['home', 'malaysia', 'programme', 'pvip', 'say']

    About Us Advertise PUTRAJAYA, Sept 1 — The Home Ministry has launched the new Malaysia Premium Visa Programme (PVIP) to attract global tycoons to Malaysia

    Home Minister Datuk Seri Hamzah Zainudin said the programme will commence on October 1

    He also said that PVIP, conducted in conjunction with the Immigration Department, will be based on the concept of “Residency Through Investment”, with one of the main criteria being that applicants must have at least RM1 million in a fixed deposit account

    He said that the programme will be available to citizens of all countries except Israel and those that have no diplomatic ties with Malaysia

    “The Cabinet meeting on August 17, 2022 agreed to the proposed creation of a new programme with the concept of Residency Through Investment called the Malaysia Premium Visa Programme (PVIP) to drive economic growth, generate national income and open up more job opportunities for locals,” he said during the programme’s launch at the Home Ministry here today

    According to Hamzah, the immigration department and the police will ensure regular enforcement of the programme’s policies and requirements

    ['home', 'malaysia', 'programme', 'pvip', 'say']



  • YUGIOH CROSS DUEL GLOBAL RELEASE DATE ANNOUNCED

    https://www.gamerbraves.com/yugioh-cross-duel-global-release-date-announced/

    09/01/2022, 14:14

    45.45% Shortened!

    Konami has announced the global release date for YuGiOh Cross Duel, the third mobile game based around the YuGiOh TCG IP

    In a statement, they announced that the Global release for YuGiOh Cross Duel would be on September 6th, letting players engage in 4-way battles inspired by the original YuGiOh TCG

    Since the game’s limited release, YuGiOh Cross Duel has made over 35,870 USD, according to tracking site AppMagic, with the majority of its earnings being from Hong Kong and Canada

    That number should shoot up once the game gets its global release, with more powerhouse spending regions like SEA, South Korea and Japan getting involved with the game

    YuGiOh Cross Duels is a lane-based 4 player game, wherein players must summon monsters and play spell and trap cards in 4-way duels

    The game has alternate rulesets for its system, such as team battles as well as raid battles featuring big boss monsterss

    ['release', 'yugioh', 'cross', 'duel', 'game']

    64.71% Shortened!

    Last year, Sony announced the HT-A5000 soundbar

    This year, the company has announced another soundbar that looks to be its little sibling, the Sony HT-A3000

    If you make use of additional – and optional – speakers, then the soundbar will also take them into account during the calibration process

    The Sony HT-A3000 also has built-in dual subwoofers and three front speakers, giving it 3.1 channels

    This is where this new soundbar differs from the preceding HT-A5000, which is a 5.1.2 channel soundbar

    Sony Malaysia tells us that this soundbar will only be available sometime in December of this year

  • CHENGDU TO SHUT DOWN OVER NEW COVID OUTBREAK

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/world/2022/09/01/chengdu-to-shut-down-over-new-covid-outbreak/25898

    09/01/2022, 14:10

    50.0% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise BEIJING, Sept 1 — Around 16 million people in the Chinese city of Chengdu will be effectively under lockdown from Thursday as authorities race to snuff out a new Covid-19 outbreak

    China is the last major economy wedded to a zero-Covid policy, stamping out virus flare-ups with snap shutdowns, mass testing and lengthy quarantines

    Chengdu, in the southwest, has become the latest to announce a shutdown, saying in an official notice that residents must “stay home in principle” from 6pm on Thursday to combat a new wave of infections

    It said that all residents would be tested for the virus between Thursday and Sunday, and urged them not to leave the city unless “absolutely necessary”

    Chengdu recorded 157 new local infections on Thursday, of which 51 displayed no symptoms, the city government said in a separate notice

    Last month, travellers in the southern island province of Hainan protested after more than 80,000 tourists were stranded in a resort city because of a Covid-19 flare-up

    ['people', 'city', 'chengdu', 'thursday', 'new']

    About Us Advertise BEIJING, Sept 1 — Around 16 million people in the Chinese city of Chengdu will be effectively under lockdown from Thursday as authorities race to snuff out a new Covid-19 outbreak

    China is the last major economy wedded to a zero-Covid policy, stamping out virus flare-ups with snap shutdowns, mass testing and lengthy quarantines

    Chengdu, in the southwest, has become the latest to announce a shutdown, saying in an official notice that residents must “stay home in principle” from 6pm on Thursday to combat a new wave of infections

    It said that all residents would be tested for the virus between Thursday and Sunday, and urged them not to leave the city unless “absolutely necessary”

    Chengdu recorded 157 new local infections on Thursday, of which 51 displayed no symptoms, the city government said in a separate notice

    Last month, travellers in the southern island province of Hainan protested after more than 80,000 tourists were stranded in a resort city because of a Covid-19 flare-up

    ['people', 'city', 'chengdu', 'thursday', 'new']

  • IPHONE THROWBACK: THE ORIGINAL 2007 IPHONE STARTED THE SMARTPHONE REVOLUTION

    https://tech.hindustantimes.com/mobile/news/iphone-throwback-the-original-2007-iphone-started-the-smartphone-revolution-71662003477214.html

    09/01/2022, 13:14

    76.0% Shortened!

    The iPhone 14 will mark a big change for the future of conventional smartphones but ones that we have today can pay tribute to the original iPhone launched back in 2007

    The first iPhone was not perfect in any way – it lacked a lot of the modern niceties that you assume as a staple on the current-day iPhone 13

    However, the first generation iPhone was a big change from the previously classified smartphones from Nokia, Blackberry and Motorola

    The iPhone 1 allowed one to use their finger to control the device – a revolution at the time

    The iPhone also brought the concept of apps on your smartphone

    The successor also introduced 3G connectivity on the iPhone

    ['iphone', 'change', 'smartphones', 'one', 'device']

  • DEFENCE INSISTS BRIBERY CHARGES IN FOREIGN VISA CASE AGAINST ZAHID SHOW SELECTIVE PROSECUTION AS OTHER CASH RECIPIENTS NOT CHARGED

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/01/defence-insists-bribery-charges-in-foreign-visa-case-against-zahid-show-selective-prosecution-as-other-cash-recipients-not-charged/25880

    09/01/2022, 13:11

    68.42% Shortened!

    “The law requires the public prosecutor to act fairly

    It is not in the public interest if the prosecution were to practice discrimination

    Hisyam said Muhyiddin, who is described as being similarly circumstanced as Ahmad Zahid, was not charged in court despite both men having held the home ministry portfolio and received monies in the form of political donations from UKSB's representatives

    Reading out names of those implicated, Hisyam said evidence in court has clearly adduced politicians namely Khairy Jamaluddin, Datuk Seri Anifah Aman, Datuk Seri Hishammuddin Hussein, Datuk Seri Reezal Merican Naina Merican, Shahril Hamdan, Tan Sri Ong Ka Chuan, Tan Sri Chan Kong Choy, Datuk Seri Mohd Shafie Apdal Muhyiddin and Tun Dr Mahathir Mohamad were cash recipients of UKSB as well

    If they are unable to answer, it becomes the point of our submission that is selective prosecution," Hisyam said

    Ahmad Zahid was charged with another seven counts as home minister who obtained S$1.15 million, RM3 million, CHF15,000 and US$15,000 in cash from the same company for himself in connection with his official work

    ['datuk', 'seri', 'ahmad', 'zahid', 'receive']

    “The law requires the public prosecutor to act fairly

    It is not in the public interest if the prosecution were to practice discrimination

    Hisyam said Muhyiddin, who is described as being similarly circumstanced as Ahmad Zahid, was not charged in court despite both men having held the home ministry portfolio and received monies in the form of political donations from UKSB's representatives

    Reading out names of those implicated, Hisyam said evidence in court has clearly adduced politicians namely Khairy Jamaluddin, Datuk Seri Anifah Aman, Datuk Seri Hishammuddin Hussein, Datuk Seri Reezal Merican Naina Merican, Shahril Hamdan, Tan Sri Ong Ka Chuan, Tan Sri Chan Kong Choy, Datuk Seri Mohd Shafie Apdal Muhyiddin and Tun Dr Mahathir Mohamad were cash recipients of UKSB as well

    If they are unable to answer, it becomes the point of our submission that is selective prosecution," Hisyam said

    Ahmad Zahid was charged with another seven counts as home minister who obtained S$1.15 million, RM3 million, CHF15,000 and US$15,000 in cash from the same company for himself in connection with his official work

    ['datuk', 'seri', 'ahmad', 'zahid', 'receive']

  • DO STATELESS KIDS BORN IN MALAYSIA NEED TO PLAY FOOTBALL TO GAIN CITIZENSHIP? HANNAH YEOH ASKS GOVT

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/01/do-stateless-kids-born-in-malaysia-need-to-play-football-to-gain-citizenship-hannah-yeoh-asks-govt/25878

    09/01/2022, 13:10

    66.67% Shortened!

    Prominent child rights activist Datuk Hartini Zainuddin also weighed in on Tuck’s naturalisation as a Malaysian citizen

    Waiting and waiting to get citizenship

    Local media have frequently highlighted the struggles faced by those born domestically and those born overseas to Malaysian mothers in getting Malaysian citizenship

    In June, Malay Mail highlighted the case of Kedah-born Ummal Remiza Khaja Mohideen, who continues to face bureaucracy in gaining Malaysian citizenship for her daughter born in Doha eight years ago

    While Malaysian men have the automatic right to confer citizenship to their children born abroad through the simple process of registration under Article 14(1)(b) of the Federal Constitution, Malaysian women who give birth abroad must apply for Malaysian citizenship under Article 15(2) of the Federal Constitution

    It is then up to the Malaysian government to decide whether to register any person ― aged below 21 and who has at least one Malaysian parent ― as a Malaysian citizen under Article 15(2)

    ['malaysian', 'citizenship', 'born', 'child', 'year']

    Prominent child rights activist Datuk Hartini Zainuddin also weighed in on Tuck’s naturalisation as a Malaysian citizen

    Waiting and waiting to get citizenship

    Local media have frequently highlighted the struggles faced by those born domestically and those born overseas to Malaysian mothers in getting Malaysian citizenship

    In June, Malay Mail highlighted the case of Kedah-born Ummal Remiza Khaja Mohideen, who continues to face bureaucracy in gaining Malaysian citizenship for her daughter born in Doha eight years ago

    While Malaysian men have the automatic right to confer citizenship to their children born abroad through the simple process of registration under Article 14(1)(b) of the Federal Constitution, Malaysian women who give birth abroad must apply for Malaysian citizenship under Article 15(2) of the Federal Constitution

    It is then up to the Malaysian government to decide whether to register any person ― aged below 21 and who has at least one Malaysian parent ― as a Malaysian citizen under Article 15(2)

    ['malaysian', 'citizenship', 'born', 'child', 'year']



  • LENOVO THINKPAD X1 FOLD HANDS-ON: BIG UPGRADES, INSIDE AND OUT

    https://www.engadget.com/lenovo-think-pad-x-1-fold-hands-on-big-upgrades-inside-and-out-specs-price-040007760.html

    09/01/2022, 13:10

    76.92% Shortened!

    It was also very experimental

    The first major upgrade on the new X1 Fold is a bigger 16.3-inch OLED display from Sharp

    On top of that, Lenovo redesigned the X1 Fold’s Bluetooth keyboard

    And because there isn’t a space inside the system for the keyboard anymore, Lenovo was able to install a new fold-flat hinge, so everything is sleeker and more compact

    For the new generation, Lenovo also wanted to improve the Fold’s serviceability, so it's easier to replace things like its SSD, batteries and other components in the field

    Unfortunately, the X1 Fold still isn’t water resistant, but it should still be pretty rugged, as the Fold remains subject to the same mil-spec 810G testing required on other ThinkPads

    ['fold', 'also', 'lenovo', 'new', 'like']

  • PKR’S RAFIZI CLAIMS POLITICIANS IN ‘PANIC MODE’ INTERFERING WITH LCS PROBE

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/01/pkrs-rafizi-claims-politicians-in-panic-mode-interfering-with-lcs-probe/25865

    09/01/2022, 12:11

    52.94% Shortened!

    He said this was to avoid a negative public perception and to also uphold the good image of the judiciary, the police and enforcement agencies so that they can investigate the case freely

    Rafizi was responding to questions on his reaction to being called up by the police to give his statement following his accusation linking Minister in the Prime Minister’s Department (Special Functions) Datuk Dr Abdul Latiff Ahmad to alleged financial misconduct in relation to the RM9 billion LCS procurement

    He had earlier asked the police to launch an investigation into the scandal but was met with a counter-complaint filed by an aide of Dr Abdul Latiff, who is also the Mersing MP, yesterday for alleged defamation

    Rafizi then expressed his concern that this could mean the police might not record Dr Abdul Latiff’s statement or even investigate him in relation to his earlier police report

    He said that if that were to happen, it might give the public the perception that this was because the police are under the Home Ministry whose minister Datuk Seri Hamzah Zainudin is in the same party Dr Abdul Latiff

    Rafizi said action should be taken as even Umno president Datuk Seri Ahmad Zahid Hamidi, Umno deputy president Datuk Seri Mohamad Hasan and PAS president Tan Sri Abdul Hadi Awang had their statements recorded by police recently

    “During the course of the police taking my statement, I hope that the same action will be accorded to Dr Abdul Latiff at a police station

    Despite the counter-report made against him, Rafizi said he believes a thorough police investigation should be conducted on all parties over the LCS scandal

    ['president', 'rafizi', 'lcs', 'scandal', 'say']

    Arsenal emerged as the key candidates to snap him up, but the Gunners' hesitancy suggests that they may hold fire until next year when they could land him for free.  Liverpool still have time to punish them by meeting the Foxes' £25million asking price on deadline day with speculation ramping up that Tielemans could be on his way out of the King Power Stadium

    That could pave the way for Douglas Luiz to leave Villa Park if the right offer comes in, three years after signing from Manchester City.  The Brazilian would be welcomed by compatriots like Fabinho and Roberto Firmino if he moved to Anfield on deadline day with Klopp on the lookout for midfield options

    Talk of a £20m bid is yet to emerge into anything concrete although things could accelerate as the 11pm deadline closes in.  Klopp is generally keen to explore the best talent his homeland has to offer and many feel as though Laimer would be a good option for the Reds

    Transfer expert Fabrizio Romano is one of them and he claims that Liverpool are 'exploring' the possibility of a summer deal

  • YOODO BRINGS VOWIFI TO ANDROID PHONES

    https://www.lowyat.net/2022/283332/yoodo-vowifi-android/

    09/01/2022, 12:10

    46.15% Shortened!

    Despite the move being long overdue, only certain Android phones [PDF] from brands such as HONOR, Huawei, Xiaomi, Nokia, Samsung, and Vivo currently support the telco’s new feature

    The Celcom sub-brand had enabled Voice Over LTE (VoLTE) just earlier this year for both Android and iOS

    For VoWiFi though, Yoodo decided to roll out the feature for Android users first, saying that support for iPhones will be coming later on but the company did not give a timeline for when this might happen

    To enable VoWiFi on a supported phone, you need to go into the settings, tap on the Mobile Network, go into the Mobile Data section, and there should be a Wi-Fi Calling or VoWiFi option there

    Its parent company, Celcom, similarly took a while to roll out VoWiFi to its users, enabling the feature in June earlier this year

    Even though it is one of the country’s major telcos, Celcom also had a gap between implementing VoWiFi for Android and iOS, with iPhone support coming in almost two months after the feature’s initial debut on its network

    Unfortunately, Yoodo says that the feature currently cannot be used while roaming

    ['yoodo', 'enable', 'vowifi', 'call', 'support']

    09/01/2022, 12:10

    Not to be confused with their predecessors, Lenovo is launching the Tab P11 (2nd Gen) and Tab P11 Pro (2nd Gen)

    Despite the fact that the P11 (2nd Gen) won't arrive until early 2023, this is the first tablet to be announced with Android 12L onboard

    Considering that Lenovo's Tab P12 Pro was one of the only tablets available for the Android 12L developer preview and Android 13 Beta Program, it makes perfect sense to see at least one of Lenovo's latest tablets equipped with the tablet-centric operating system

    As for the P11 Pro (2nd Gen), you won't have to wait much longer as Lenovo states the 11.2-inch tablet will be available sometime in September

    Andrew Myrick is a Senior Editor at Android Central

    Get the best of Android Central in in your inbox, every day! Thank you for signing up to Android Central

  • KOBO FINALLY HAS A WORTHY BUDGET CHALLENGER TO THE KINDLE PAPERWHITE 5

    https://gizmodo.com/kobo-clara-2e-e-reader-amazon-kindle-paperwhite-5-budge-1849424571

    09/01/2022, 12:10

    66.67% Shortened!

    For just $30 more, the new Kobo Clara 2E brings better screen lighting that’s easier on the eyes, plus two important upgrades that should put a dent in the Amazon Kindle Paperwhite 5's dominance

    Feature for feature, it’s now well behind the Kindle Paperwhite 5 that Amazon released last October

    With the new Clara 2E, Kobo is finally playing catchup, and more or less matching the Kindle Paperwhite 5's best features, especially now that Amazon has restricted ebook downloads to a wifi connection only

    The other major upgrade for the Kobo Clara 2E is the addition of Bluetooth, allowing wireless headphones, a wireless speaker, or a wireless connection to a car’s stereo to be used for enjoying audiobook content, which can be downloaded right to the e-reader itself from Kobo’s online store

    Kobo also points out that the new Clara 2E’s housing is made from more than 85 percent recycled plastic; 10% of which is (was?) ocean-bound plastic

    The Kobo Clara 2E is available for pre-order now for $130, with official availability starting on September 22

    ['kobo', 'reader', 'feature', 'new', 'clara']

  • LENOVO UNVEILS UPDATED TAB P11, P11 PRO TABLETS TO COMPETE WITH IPAD

    https://www.pcmag.com/news/lenovo-unveils-updated-tab-p11-p11-pro-tablets-to-compete-with-ipad

    09/01/2022, 12:09

    87.5% Shortened!

    Lenovo wants it Tab P11 and Tab P11 Pro slates to serve as Android alternatives to Apple's iPad and iPad Air

    Lenovo on Thursday introduced a pair of midrange Android tablets that it hopes will steal market share from Apple's popular iPad

    The tablet runs Android 12, and Lenovo promises updates through Android 14

    Lenovo doesn't say how much battery life to expect from the 7,700mAh cell

    This slate ships with Android 12L, the tablet-specific version of Android 12, and should eventually get an upgrade to Android 14

    In November 2021, the iPad held about 59% of the market to Android's 41%

    ['lenovo', 'tab', 'p11', 'android', 'ipad']

    09/01/2022, 12:09

    Much of this new X1 Fold will be familiar to fans not just of the previous X1 Fold, but of the ThinkPad line in general

    The 2020 X1 Fold’s keyboard was well-made but had to fit horizontally across a 13.3-inch device, which meant it was really dang cramped

    That, interestingly, is the same price the 13-inch model had (and this is a bigger, thinner, and generally more usable device)

    I don’t expect this device to be perfect

    I think they understand exactly what the limitations of the 13-inch Fold were and were happy to have a larger foldable screen come along

    Maybe in this new form factor, Lenovo can finally make the groundbreaking device that they wanted the first X1 Fold to be

    Inside the hood, the Zenbook 17 Fold OLED is an Intel Evo-certified foldable laptop that offers two sizes of OLED display in one device

    Since it's foldable, it can be used in multiple usage modes - Desktop, Laptop (ASUS ErgoSense Bluetooth keyboard), Laptop (with virtual keyboard), Tablet, Reader and Extended

    As fragile as it looks, the Zenbook 17 OLED is quite durable (on paper) since it passed the MIL-STD-810H US military standard rating

    The Zenbook 17 OLED (UX9702) will be available in Malaysia in the fourth quarter of 2022

  • PREY GAME DIRECTOR CLAIMS BETHESDA FORCED ARKANE TO USE THAT TITLE

    https://comicbook.com/gaming/news/prey-game-director-bethesda-forced-title-arkane-studios/

    09/01/2022, 11:11

    60.0% Shortened!

    Prey (2017) was apparently not supposed to be a Prey game until Bethesda forced Arkane to call it that

    It never did as Bethesda ultimately decided a reboot was the way to go, despite not really having a ton to do with the original game

    As spotted by Kotaku, Prey director and Arkane founder Raphaël Colantonio noted on the AIAS Game Maker's Notebook podcast that he didn't want to use the name Prey, but was told to by Bethesda

    Colantonio believed that it was a "sales mistake" to call it Prey, stating that it didn't please fans of the original game and only made those who didn't like the original game avoid it

    "Our game had nothing to do with Prey," said Colantonio

    I think it's a mistake.'" Whether or not Prey will ever make a return either via the rebooted series from Arkane or as a sequel to the original game remains to be seen

    ['prey', 'game', 'bethesda', 'arkane', 'original']

    87.5% Shortened!

    Of the 26 Bollywood releases this year, 20 ― or 77 per cent ― have been flops, defined as losing half or more of their investment, according to the Koimoi website, which tracks industry data

    Christina Sundaresan, a 40-year-old mother of two teenage girls in Mumbai, used to see at least one Bollywood movie a week in the cinema before the pandemic

    ‘Storyline is the issue’ Fans of Bollywood, a century-old institution, say it can evolve to stay relevant

    The writing was on the wall last month when a pair of big-budget movies bombed despite starring two of Bollywood's box-office darlings, Kumar and Aamir Khan

    “The Hindi film industry is making films that are cut off from the masses

    There will be no immediate Bollywood overhaul though, Taurani cautioned

    Knowing the market in Malaysia, the iPhone 14 Plus could be as popular as the iPhone 14 Pro Max because customers like bigger phones

    09/01/2022, 10:09

    73.91% Shortened!

    With all this in mind, we want to know, what is your favorite solution for the potential notch replacement on the iPhone 14 Pro?

    This is how the company “invented” the notch, which is a cutout at the top of the screen where all these sensors, plus a microphone and speaker, are placed

    Last year, the company relocated the top speaker of the iPhone 13 to make the notch smaller, but it’s still there

    This new report claims that Apple will make the two separate cutouts on the iPhone 14 Pro’s screen look like a single cutout

    Regular iPhone 14 models are expected to keep the same notch as the iPhone 13

    Until then, what’s your favorite solution for the notch replacement on the iPhone? Tell us in the poll and comments section below.

  • SAMSUNG GALAXY TAB ACTIVE4 PRO IS NOW OFFICIAL - GSMARENA.COM NEWS

    https://www.gsmarena.com/samsung_galaxy_tab_active4_pro_is_now_official-news-55604.php

    09/01/2022, 09:14

    60.0% Shortened!

    Samsung Android Tablets Announcement

    Back in mid-August a bunch of certifications were issued for the Galaxy Tab Active4 Pro, signifying its imminent launch, and today Samsung has indeed made it official

    Samsung Galaxy Tab Active4 Pro official images The device has support for GPS, 5G, LTE, Wi-Fi 6, Bluetooth 5.2, NFC, hybrid dual-SIM functionality available in North America only for some reason, and a fingerprint sensor embedded in the Home key

    It runs Android 12 with Samsung's One UI on top.

    More Samsung Galaxy Tab Active4 Pro official images The Galaxy Tab Active4 Pro and its S Pen are IP68 rated as protected from dust, dirt, and sand, and can withstand being submerged in up to 1.5m of fresh water for up to 30 minutes

    The Galaxy Tab Active4 Pro will be available "in parts of Europe" in September, Samsung says, with Asia, Latin America, North America, and the Middle East to follow "later in 2022"

    ['samsung', 'android', 'galaxy', 'tab', 'active4']

    Samsung Android Tablets Announcement

    Back in mid-August a bunch of certifications were issued for the Galaxy Tab Active4 Pro, signifying its imminent launch, and today Samsung has indeed made it official

    Samsung Galaxy Tab Active4 Pro official images The device has support for GPS, 5G, LTE, Wi-Fi 6, Bluetooth 5.2, NFC, hybrid dual-SIM functionality available in North America only for some reason, and a fingerprint sensor embedded in the Home key

    It runs Android 12 with Samsung's One UI on top.

    More Samsung Galaxy Tab Active4 Pro official images The Galaxy Tab Active4 Pro and its S Pen are IP68 rated as protected from dust, dirt, and sand, and can withstand being submerged in up to 1.5m of fresh water for up to 30 minutes

    The Galaxy Tab Active4 Pro will be available "in parts of Europe" in September, Samsung says, with Asia, Latin America, North America, and the Middle East to follow "later in 2022"

    ['samsung', 'android', 'galaxy', 'tab', 'active4']



  • SERGINO DEST SET TO CLINCH MOVE TO AC MILAN AFTER MANCHESTER UNITED SNUB

    09/01/2022, 09:12

    60.0% Shortened!

    By Dan Coombs Sergino Dest is set to clinch a move to AC Milan after Manchester United backed away from a potential move

    However, The Athletic reported yesterday that United had decided not to move for Dest, electing to keep Aaron Wan-Bissaka as back-up right-back instead

    He says a loan deal with an option to buy is agreed, and Dest is now set to fly to Milan to seal the move

    Dest will sign until June 2027, one year loan plus potential four year deal

    It’s unclear whether United decided not to sign Dest simply because they did not want to, or because there was no buyer for Aaron Wan-Bissaka

    Even sending Wan-Bissaka on loan and then landing Dest on loan would have felt fairly pointless

    ['dest', 'move', 'milan', 'manchester', 'united']

    53.85% Shortened!

    Mikel Arteta has a big decision to make as Arsenal look to strengthen in midfield on the final day of the transfer window Sign up to the free Arsenal newsletter so you don't miss a breaking story, rumour or opinion We have more newsletters Arsenal's hopes of securing Youri Tielemans this summer have been given a slight boost after Leicester City reportedly lowered their asking price to around £25m ahead of deadline day

    Sky Sports News are claiming that Tielemans is available if that figure is met, with both Arsenal and Newcastle United retaining an interest in the midfielder

    Following initial talks with his representatives, Edu has been in no rush to wrap up a deal for Tielemans so far and there have even been suggestions that Arsenal could wait until he becomes a free agent next year if new terms with the Foxes are not agreed upon

    A new winger appeared to be at the top of Arsenal's to-do list following the loan departure of Nicolas Pepe last week

    The Brazilian is another long-term target of Arsenal's after Edu originally explored the possibility of signing him in January

    If Arsenal are unsuccessful in their attempts to sign the 21-year-old, then perhaps Tielemans represents a more feasible option should there be enough time to get something done

  • MICROSOFT FINDS TIKTOK VULNERABILITY THAT ALLOWED ONE-CLICK ACCOUNT COMPROMISES

    https://arstechnica.com/information-technology/2022/08/microsoft-finds-tiktok-vulnerability-that-allowed-one-click-account-compromises/

    09/01/2022, 09:10

    68.42% Shortened!

    Microsoft said on Wednesday that it recently identified a vulnerability in TikTok's Android app that could allow attackers to hijack accounts when users did nothing more than click on a single errant link

    Deeplinks must be declared in an app's manifest for use outside of the app so, for example, someone who clicks on a TikTok link in a browser has the content automatically opened in the TikTok app

    An app can also cryptographically declare the validity of a URL domain

    TikTok on Android, for instance, declares the domain m.tiktok.com

    Normally, the TikTok app will allow content from tiktok.com to be loaded into its WebView component but forbid WebView from loading content from other domains

    Read our affiliate link policy.

    ['vulnerability', 'tiktok', 'app', 'attacker', 'user']

    Microsoft said on Wednesday that it recently identified a vulnerability in TikTok's Android app that could allow attackers to hijack accounts when users did nothing more than click on a single errant link

    Deeplinks must be declared in an app's manifest for use outside of the app so, for example, someone who clicks on a TikTok link in a browser has the content automatically opened in the TikTok app

    An app can also cryptographically declare the validity of a URL domain

    TikTok on Android, for instance, declares the domain m.tiktok.com

    Normally, the TikTok app will allow content from tiktok.com to be loaded into its WebView component but forbid WebView from loading content from other domains

  • GOING FORWARD, OPPO WILL STOP INCLUDING CHARGERS WITH SOME OF ITS PRODUCTS

    https://www.xda-developers.com/oppo-will-stop-including-chargers-with-some-of-its-products/

    09/01/2022, 09:09

    75.0% Shortened!

    Set up a new account on the XDA Developers Forums Sign in to the XDA Developers Forums Add swipe gestures to any Android, no root Make your phone easier to use with one hand, no root The best way to access XDA on your phone A sweet, feature-filled launcher with a beautiful UX

    While Oppo was a long time hold out, the company has now confirmed that it will also abandon the charger, withholding it from some of its products that will be released over the coming year

    The news was shared during the company’s European launch event of the Oppo Reno 8 Pro, the Reno 8, and the Reno 8 Lite

    Billy Zhang, who is Oppo’s vice president of overseas sales and services, relayed the new strategy to press in attendance, stating, “We will take the charger out of the box in the next year for several products

    As Oppo aligns itself with other companies by removing charging adapters from its products over the coming year, Zhang didn’t explain why the company was shifting its strategy

    While it is a big move for the company, one can only wait and see how its customer will react

    ['xda', 'developer', 'adapter', 'oppo', 'company']

    “For now, AutoGen Plus covers mainly the car engine and transmission

    “Together with aggressive online campaigns by used car dealers, we are optimistic about the outlook of the Malaysian used car segment,” he said

    When considering the trend in developed countries, Khor said the ratio of used car sales versus new car sales is about two to one

    “This means that for every new car sold, two used cars are sold

    09/01/2022, 08:11

    56.25% Shortened!

    Hulu Selangor OCPD Supt Suffian Abdullah said in a statement that the body of the woman was found about noon yesterday by the son in a river 100m away from their house in Kuala Kubu Baru

    In KOTA KINABALU, a woman who was last seen walking back from a restaurant to her house in Inanam early yesterday morning had been found dead in a drain

    The 50-something woman was at the restaurant in Gaya Utama Inanam at about 2am

    Kota Kinabalu Deputy OCPD Supt Kalsom Idris said the restaurant owner told police that the woman had decided to walk home alone

    “A check on the victim’s body later found no (sign) of foul play,” Supt Kalsom said, adding that police are investigating the cause of death.

    09/01/2022, 08:09

    66.67% Shortened!

    Elden Ring wasn’t just a hit with fans of FromSoftware’s notoriously difficult action-RPGs

    Today’s announcement from FromSoft’s parent company Kadokawa revealed that Sony and Tencent are acquiring 14.09% and 16.25% of FromSoft, respectively

    The statement indicates that Kadokawa wants FromSoftware to be able to expand its development efforts; Kadokawa sees the “enhancement of capabilities for the creation, development and deployment of [FromSoft] game IP as one of the [Kadokawa] Group’s highest priorities.” One of the aims is to give FromSoft the resources needed to grow Elden Ring into a franchise that extends beyond just video games

    Elden Ring was a long time coming, built on a foundation first laid down in FromSoftware’s pioneering 2009 PS3 game Demon’s Souls

    It owns 5% of Assassin’s Creed and Far Cry publisher Ubisoft, completed an acquisition of League of Legends’ developer Riot Games, owns 40% of Epic Games, and has stakes in many, many, many, many other game companies

    Sony has also been on a spending spree too, though it looks a bit more modest compared to Tencent

    ['elden', 'ring', 'fromsoftware', 'tencent', 'sony']

    09/01/2022, 07:11

    81.82% Shortened!

    By 7am, the crowd swelled to some 100,000 people

    The National Day celebrations made a resounding comeback at Dataran Merdeka after four years

    As this was the 65th National Day, the number 65 was a recurring theme

    This was followed by seven shouts of “Merdeka” which reverberated throughout Dataran Merdeka

    The Keluarga Malaysia Teguh Bersama (Malaysian Family is Strong Together) song, which is synonymous with the National Day theme, was sung by Alif Satar & The Locos, together with the Keluarga Malaysia choir

    The feel-good factor and the Malaysian Family-themed celebration received an overwhelming response from the people

  • PREY DIRECTOR SAYS HE FELT ‘GROSS’ USING THAT NAME, WAS FORCED TO BY BETHESDA

    https://kotaku.com/prey-2017-2006-bethesda-imsim-name-arkane-colantonio-1849481519

    09/01/2022, 06:10

    76.92% Shortened!

    Prey (2017) is a very good game, one of my favorites from that year in fact

    It has no connection to the 2006 Prey or its never-released sequel

    Colantonio left Arkane shortly after Prey 2017 was released, and since then he’s made mention of how he didn’t want to use the Prey title for Arkane’s game

    “Our game had nothing to do with Prey,” said Colantonio

    I think it’s a mistake.’” Colantonio then said that he believed calling it Prey was a “sales mistake” because choosing that name “backfired” as Prey fans weren’t happy and the people who didn’t like the original, unrelated Prey didn’t even “look for [the] game.” As for the original Prey and the team behind that game, Colantonio felt bad that they had used that name and IP, feeling like it was a “kick in the face” to the devs behind 2006’s Prey

    This isn’t the first time Colantonio has spoken about his issues with Bethesda over Prey

    ['prey', 'game', 'name', 'bethesda', 'colantonio']

    I think it’s a mistake.’” Colantonio then said that he believed calling it Prey was a “sales mistake” because choosing that name “backfired” as Prey fans weren’t happy and the people who didn’t like the original, unrelated Prey didn’t even “look for [the] game.” As for the original Prey and the team behind that game, Colantonio felt bad that they had used that name and IP, feeling like it was a “kick in the face” to the devs behind 2006’s Prey

    https://9to5mac.com/2022/08/31/iphone-14-display-cutout-features/

    09/01/2022, 06:09

    77.78% Shortened!

    @ChanceHMiller The big Apple news of the day is that the iPhone 14 Pro will apparently use software to make the two new display cutouts look like one seamless cutout

    According to a source familiar with Apple’s plans, the company will use this space to make its privacy indicators for the camera and microphone more visible

    On the iPhone 14 Pro, Apple will move these indicators and make them far more visible

    This will also allow Apple to show both the green and orange dots at the same time when the camera and microphone are both in use

    Currently, Apple only shows the green dot, even if an app is accessing the camera and microphone both

    These optimizations for the new iPhone 14 Pro display cutout are ones that Apple has tested and currently plans to implement

    ['apple', 'news', 'iphone', 'use', 'display']

    Scott Parker has already lost his job at AFC Bournemouth, four games into the campaign, having guided the club to promotion from the Championship last season

    "We must also show belief in and respect for one another

    As the smallest club in the top division, the former Fulham manager would also have known that finances would be tight and combining bad results with criticism of the owner's blueprint was never going to make for a positive outcome

    But with Bournemouth already claiming the unenviable distinction of being the first Premier League club to dismiss their manager this season, it will make it an easier conversation in other boardrooms when a manager is under pressure

    70.83% Shortened!

    When we did that we were immediately really dangerous

    Liverpool levelled the score on the counter right at the hour mark when Roberto Firmino beat Nick Pope with a first-time shot after being picked out by Mohamed Salah in the centre of the penalty area

    Newcastle defended stoically, but Carvalho made the most of their failure to clear a corner, thumping his shot into the roof of the net to snatch a win that lifts Liverpool to fifth in the table on eight points, with Newcastle 11th on six points

    "Yes, they had pressure, they're long shots, but I thought we defended really well

    The last goal is really a heartbreaker for us." Information from Reuters was used in this report

    09/01/2022

    The 20-year-old construction technology student from Keningau Vocational College, Sabah, is now one step closer to the US$100,000 (RM448,400) award

    "I did not expect to be selected as one of the top 10 finalists, but I'm very happy," Alesyah said when contacted by The Star

    Alesyah is the sole Malaysian finalist of the prestigious student award given annually to exceptional students who made a huge impact on their peers and the society

    More recently, she received a Special National Day Award by the Sabah state government in conjunction with the state-level National Day celebrations here

    He said Alesyah was picked from among 50 Sabahan youths who made Sabah proud worldwide

    The winner of the Global Student Prize is expected to be announced later in the year

    72.73% Shortened!

    What’s more distressing, Penang heritage commissioner Rosli Nor appeared to be out of the loop when it happened, while Penang Tourism, Arts, Culture and Heritage Exco Yeoh Soon Hin displayed ultimate lack of urgency by only issuing a statement the next day claiming that the Penang Island City Council (MBPP) had given a stop-work order to the developers

    Hence, this incident shows that the Penang heritage commissioner and Penang exco member Yeoh both lack the diligence and care needed in such roles, and should be held responsible

    Penang is a land with abundant history, famous legends, and ancient heritage sites, with every inch of the island marked by the passage of time

    Therefore, this tragic incident has forever tarnished Penang’s tribute to history

    Hence, how can the developers deliberately destroy this historic grave? Shouldn’t the state government immediately take action against the developer in question? Penang has always held George Town as their prided Unesco World Heritage Site, yet they are simultaneously incompetent in dealing with threats to historic sites

    SAW YEE FUNG MCA spokesperson

    09/01/2022

    52.94% Shortened!

    He said this was to avoid a negative public perception and to also uphold the good image of the judiciary, the police and enforcement agencies so that they can investigate the case freely

    Rafizi was responding to questions on his reaction to being called up by the police to give his statement following his accusation linking Minister in the Prime Minister’s Department (Special Functions) Datuk Dr Abdul Latiff Ahmad to alleged financial misconduct in relation to the RM9 billion LCS procurement

    He had earlier asked the police to launch an investigation into the scandal but was met with a counter-complaint filed by an aide of Dr Abdul Latiff, who is also the Mersing MP, yesterday for alleged defamation

    Rafizi then expressed his concern that this could mean the police might not record Dr Abdul Latiff’s statement or even investigate him in relation to his earlier police report

    He said that if that were to happen, it might give the public the perception that this was because the police are under the Home Ministry whose minister Datuk Seri Hamzah Zainudin is in the same party Dr Abdul Latiff

    Rafizi said action should be taken as even Umno president Datuk Seri Ahmad Zahid Hamidi, Umno deputy president Datuk Seri Mohamad Hasan and PAS president Tan Sri Abdul Hadi Awang had their statements recorded by police recently

    “During the course of the police taking my statement, I hope that the same action will be accorded to Dr Abdul Latiff at a police station

    Craig Burley and Steve Nicol marvel at Erling Haaland's first five games in the Premier League

    "It was about keeping doing what we did in the second half against Palace, play, play, play -- it was nice

    The 22-year-old put City ahead in the 12th minute, latching on to a cross from Phil Foden to hook it past Forest keeper Dean Henderson

    Forest were unable to contain an excellent City who made it 4-0 shortly after the break with a fine Joao Cancelo drive from the edge of the box

    The Argentine's first Premier League goal came after some clever play from Riyad Mahrez with Alvarez driving home from a tight angle

    https://gizmodo.com/tiktok-hackers-microsoft-1849480953

    09/01/2022, 05:09

    66.67% Shortened!

    Security researchers revealed they uncovered a massive hole in TikTok’s security that affected every single user who has downloaded the app on Android devices worldwide

    But if there is any lingering hint that any users were impacted by this “high severity” security exploit, then TikTok isn’t telling

    Microsoft 365 Defender researchers reported Wednesday on a serious vulnerability in the Android version of the TikTok app, one that could have allowed bad actors to potentially gain access to all aspects of a user’s account

    The researchers said they revealed the exploit to TikTok back in February through its vulnerability reporting page

    This exploit would give malicious persons access to a persons account simply if they clicked on a special link

    Inside the system’s JavaScript, people with access could modify user information or profile settings

    ['researcher', 'tiktok', 'user', 'app', 'exploit']

  • WINDOWS SUBSYSTEM FOR ANDROID NOW HAS IMPROVED APP RESIZING

    https://www.xda-developers.com/windows-subsystem-for-android-improved-resizing/

    09/01/2022, 03:14

    68.42% Shortened!

    XDA’s official marketplace for buying and selling tech Premium videos Typically, we would have received a new build of Windows 11 in the Dev channel at this point in the week, but instead, Microsoft is rolling out an update to the Windows Subsystem for Android today

    While the changes in today’s update aren’t huge, they are welcome

    There’s a new compatibility shim, which allows apps to be resized while still maintaining their aspect ratio, instead of trying to stretch them to fit the aspect ratio of the window that contains them

    Still on the topic of compatibility, Microsoft has added some new educative dialog for game controls in games that have compatibility shims enabled

    Every other update is fairly minor, though there’s also a new security update for Android, and the Amazon Appstore itself has been updated to version 60.09

    However, if you’ve worked around that regional restriction, you should still get the update just fine

    ['new', 'xda', 'developer', 'android', 'window']

    Every subsequent update for iOS and iPadOS 15 has understandably reinforced our assumption that Apple had dropped iOS 12 support for evermore, and so we relegated the old iPhone to background duty, solely as an emergency device for maps or phone calls while on the road

    (We figured that another crash would be unlikely to wreck the screen any further, so it seemed a useful compromise.) But we’ve just noticed that Apple has decided to update iOS 12 again after all

    (Before iOS 13.1 and iPadOS 13.1 came out, iPhones and iPads used the same operating system, referred to as iOS for both devices.) We didn’t receive a Security Advisory email from Apple, but an alert Naked Security reader who knows we still have that old iPhone 6+ let us know about Apple Security Bulletin HT213428

    Remember that WebKit bugs exist, loosely speaking, at the software layer below Safari, so that Apple’s own Safari browser isn’t the only app at risk from this vulnerability

    It was simply down to the fact that an update wasn’t available yet

    As an avid biker and Apple device user and geek who observes life’s unassuming details, I expect you like that.

    Our second takeaway comes from our utilization of our Spellthief Midrange deck

    Some of the worst losses we got using the Weatherlight Aggro deck we used in the middle of our stream came against Mono-Red Aggro (also known as Big Red amongst some of the players of the last decade)

    When we made our own monocolor deck, a Mono-White Weenie deck, we won quite a bit but the same result occurred against Big Red

    ['magic', 'card', 'event', 'weatherlight', 'standard']

    This card is going to make a big splash in the format and likely others as well

    This is evidenced by the sheer mass of copies of this card that we encountered during the event

    Of course, our own Weatherlight Aggro deck, shown below, did well with the card too

    09/01/2022, 02:11

    62.5% Shortened!

    Apple is cutting one iPhone model (the mini) and adding one (the vanilla Max), so a shake-up in the pricing structure is to be expected

    Of course, last year there was the iPhone 13 mini for $700 as the cheapest new (non-SE) model

    This year you will be looking to spend $750 or $800 for a new mainline iPhone at the least, if the predictions pan out

    Analysts agree that the new iPhone 14 Max will cost $100 more than the vanilla model, which will put its price at $850 or $900, depending on exactly which analysts are right

    There is no consensus on whether it’s by $50 or by $100 (TrendForce says $50), but that new hardware doesn’t come cheap

    The vanilla iPhone 14 and 14 Max won’t even get the new chipset (if the rumors are to be believed)

    ['apple', 'iphone', 'model', 'vanilla', 'price']

  • DELL CONFIRMS SOME XPS 13 PLUS LAPTOP SCREENS MAY DETACH INADVERTENTLY

    https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2022/08/dell-confirms-some-xps-13-plus-laptop-screens-may-detach/

    09/01/2022, 01:14

    75.0% Shortened!

    The Dell XPS 13 Plus laptop released this year was billed as the fancier version of one of the most well-known thin-and-light laptops, the Dell XPS 13

    Dell's rep said that once the issue with the adhesive was discovered, Dell corrected its production process, so other units should not be affected

    Dell's spokesperson said the company is directly contacting customers who bought an OLED Dell XPS 13 Plus from Dell's website and may be impacted. Dell said it will also contact those who purchased a Dell XPS 13 Plus from a retailer and then registered the PC with Dell

    "If a customer has not registered their system, the first time they contact Dell technical support, the unique service tag associated with their computer will identify to Dell technical support that the system should be repaired or replaced," Dell's spokesperson said

    "For customers who believe their computer is affected or if you have any questions, please contact Dell customer support." Dell said it is also working with retail partners to replace units Dell sold to them

    As is typical for Dell laptops, the XPS 13 Plus has a one-year warranty in the US

    ['site', 'dell', 'xps', 'plus', 'laptop']

    "For customers who believe their computer is affected or if you have any questions, please contact Dell customer support." Dell said it is also working with retail partners to replace units Dell sold to them

    Google will also launch Diwali-themed ringtones from October 7 to October 28

    Asus Zenbook 17 Fold OLED And if you just fancy a tablet, the Zenbook 17 Fold OLED can be used in the hand, though at 17.3-inches it is a bit big

    The Zenbook 17 Fold OLED runs on Windows 11 and is powered by Intel's i7-1250U processor with 16GB of LPDDR5 RAM

    Asus Zenbook 17 Fold OLED Inside, there's a 75Whr 4-cell battery that's good for up to 9 and a half hours of screen-on time

    The Zenbook 17 Fold OLED weighs 1.5kg - huge for a tablet but very reasonable for a 17.3-inch device

  • GOOGLE NEST'S FALL-THEMED RINGTONES ARE COMING EVEN EARLIER THIS YEAR

    https://www.theverge.com/2022/8/31/23329855/google-nest-doorbell-fall-ringtones-halloween-oktoberfest-diwali

    09/01/2022, 00:11

    53.85% Shortened!

    It’s bringing seasonal ringtones to the Nest Doorbell (battery) even earlier this year, with the addition of a festive accordion jingle for Oktoberfest that’ll become available in the Google Home App starting September 5th

    Like last year, Google will also let you set your doorbell chime to some spooky sounds for Halloween, starting on October 1st

    We’ll also likely see (or hear, in this case) the return of ringtones for Thanksgiving, Christmas, Hanukkah, New Year’s, and Kwanzaa

    To switch to one of the seasonal ringtones, go to the Google Home app, select your Nest doorbell, and go to Settings

    From there, tap Doorbell Theme

    For Oktoberfest that’ll be on October 5th, and it’ll be October 28th and November 1st for Diwali and Halloween, respectively

    ['sound', 'oktoberfest', 'halloween', 'google', 'start']

    66.67% Shortened!

    First announced during CES 2022, Asus has now officially revealed the Zenbook 17 Fold OLED, a giant touchscreen tablet that can be folded down to a 12.5-inch ‘laptop’

    The Zenbook 17 Fold OLED will also come with Windows 11 Home out of the box

    Another thing worth noting is that, because there’s no actual physical keyboard on the Zenbook 17 Fold OLED, the device comes with the Asus ErgoSense Bluetooth keyboard and touchpad

    The Zenbook 17 Fold OLED weighs just 1.5kg without the keyboard, while with the keyboard it weighs 1.8kg

    The Asus Zenbook 17 Fold OLED will be available in Malaysia by the end of the year, and will be priced at an eye-watering RM14,999

    For more information about the Zenbook 17 Fold OLED, you can check out its product page here.

    09/01/2022

    66.67% Shortened!

    In ranked, a player getting Legendary, Maniac, or Savage will receive more star-raising points

    The MVP, usually the player with the most kills, will receive an extra 200 points for the effort

    Besides this, the game will also now automatically detect which roles are needed in a team during a ranked game

    Players who autofill a role in a ranked game will receive extra points, regardless if they win or lose

    The MVP of the losing team will also receive more points, depending on their KDA

  • HERE'S MAXIS' RESPONSE AFTER BEING CALLED OUT FOR ITS EXPENSIVE RM15 CALL PASS FOR INTERNATIONAL ROAMING

    https://soyacincau.com/2022/09/01/maxis-responds-rm15-unlimited-call-sms-voice-international-roaming-plan-pay-per-use/

    09/01/2022

    57.14% Shortened!

    As highlighted by our reader recently, Maxis postpaid customers are charged RM15 for making or answering a single voice call while travelling overseas

    This exorbitant charge is due to Maxis’ 1 Day Calls and SMS Unlimited Pass, which is activated automatically when you make or receive a call, or after sending more than 3 SMS in a day

    This mandatory auto-activation of RM15 per day is only applicable to customers of the current Maxis Postpaid plans while customers on older postpaid as well as Hotlink prepaid and postpaid, are still charged based on pay-per-use, which is more appropriate

    Our intention for the unlimited Call & SMS daily pass was for everyone to enjoy worry free unlimited calls and SMS capped at RM15, not just incoming calls

    Ideally, Maxis should charge users based on their current pay-per-use rate until the total usage reaches a specific threshold

    Since postpaid customers are already paying a premium, it would be nice if all telcos provide a decent amount of roaming data and voice minutes for a hassle-free and bill-shock-free experience.

    ['maxi', 'postpaid', 'customer', 'charge', 'call']

    As highlighted by our reader recently, Maxis postpaid customers are charged RM15 for making or answering a single voice call while travelling overseas

    This exorbitant charge is due to Maxis’ 1 Day Calls and SMS Unlimited Pass, which is activated automatically when you make or receive a call, or after sending more than 3 SMS in a day

    This mandatory auto-activation of RM15 per day is only applicable to customers of the current Maxis Postpaid plans while customers on older postpaid as well as Hotlink prepaid and postpaid, are still charged based on pay-per-use, which is more appropriate

    Our intention for the unlimited Call & SMS daily pass was for everyone to enjoy worry free unlimited calls and SMS capped at RM15, not just incoming calls

    Ideally, Maxis should charge users based on their current pay-per-use rate until the total usage reaches a specific threshold

    Since postpaid customers are already paying a premium, it would be nice if all telcos provide a decent amount of roaming data and voice minutes for a hassle-free and bill-shock-free experience.

    ['maxi', 'postpaid', 'customer', 'charge', 'call']



  • U MOBILE SAYS NO TO STAKE IN DNB, TO GO SOLO ON 5G

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/01/u-mobile-says-no-to-stake-in-dnb/25975

    09/01/2022

    68.42% Shortened!

    The telco’s decision not to invest in DNB does not affect its ability to provide 5G services to customers as access to DNB’s 5G network infrastructure is governed by a separate access agreement, which is not linked to the equity investment in DNB," it said

    It will offer 5G as a wholesale network service to other telcos

    U Mobile said that the company and other telcos are in discussions to finalise the 5G access agreement with DNB

    "Once it is finalised and signed, DNB’s 5G access when combined with U Mobile’s existing 4G network will enable U Mobile customers to enjoy a truly seamless connectivity experience

    U Mobile has full faith that DNB will be on schedule for the deployment of quality 5G network infrastructure and that it will carry out the government’s mandate to provide wholesale 5G coverage and capacity on an equitable and non-discriminatory basis via the 5G access agreement

    DNB yesterday said that the SSAs will be revised to accommodate just the four remaining major telecommunications firms, after being rejected by two mobile network operators (MNOs)

    ['mobile', 'say', 'telco', 'dnb', 'agreement']

    The telco’s decision not to invest in DNB does not affect its ability to provide 5G services to customers as access to DNB’s 5G network infrastructure is governed by a separate access agreement, which is not linked to the equity investment in DNB," it said

    It will offer 5G as a wholesale network service to other telcos

    U Mobile said that the company and other telcos are in discussions to finalise the 5G access agreement with DNB

    "Once it is finalised and signed, DNB’s 5G access when combined with U Mobile’s existing 4G network will enable U Mobile customers to enjoy a truly seamless connectivity experience

    U Mobile has full faith that DNB will be on schedule for the deployment of quality 5G network infrastructure and that it will carry out the government’s mandate to provide wholesale 5G coverage and capacity on an equitable and non-discriminatory basis via the 5G access agreement

    DNB yesterday said that the SSAs will be revised to accommodate just the four remaining major telecommunications firms, after being rejected by two mobile network operators (MNOs)

    And Ronaldo himself gave a thumbs up while reporting for duty at Carrington today ahead of United's trip to Leicester tomorrow evening

    An unnamed Saudi club are thought to be the only side to have bid for Ronaldo

    Ronaldo is desperate to continue playing in the Champions League, but is now set to turn out in the Europa League this season

    Publisher Sony recently announced a God of War Ragnarök release date of November 9, 2022, alongside four editions of the game

  • TENCENT AND SONY INTERACTIVE ENTERTAINMENT COLLECTIVELY ACQUIRE 30.34 PERCENT OF FROMSOFTWARE

    https://www.gematsu.com/2022/08/tencent-and-sony-interactive-entertainment-collectively-acquire-30-34-percent-of-fromsoftware

    08/31/2022, 23:08

    79.31% Shortened!

    FromSoftware has issued new shares of its stock to Tencent Holdings subsidiary Sixjoy Hong Kong and Sony Group subsidiary Sony Interactive Entertainment, FromSoftware parent company Kadokawa Corporation announced

    Through the third-party allotment, Sixjoy Hong Kong will own 16.25 percent of FromSoftware’s shares, and Sony Interactive Entertainment will own 14.09 percent

    In line with this policy, the Company has decided to have FromSoftware implement fund procurement by way of a Third-Party Allotment to Sixjoy and SIE, the scheduled allottees, for the reasons outlined below

    In February 2021, the Company conducted a third-party allotment with Sony as the allottee with the aim of strengthening its relationship with the Sony Group over the long term, and creating new IP of the Company and maximizing the utilization of its existing IP in anime and game fields

    Sony, the parent company of SIE, is listed on the Tokyo Stock Exchange

    Schedule for the Third-Party Allotment (Note) Payment for this third-party allotment is scheduled to be made on September 7, 2022

    ['fromsoftware', 'sony', 'group', 'company', 'third']

    FromSoftware has issued new shares of its stock to Tencent Holdings subsidiary Sixjoy Hong Kong and Sony Group subsidiary Sony Interactive Entertainment, FromSoftware parent company Kadokawa Corporation announced

    Through the third-party allotment, Sixjoy Hong Kong will own 16.25 percent of FromSoftware’s shares, and Sony Interactive Entertainment will own 14.09 percent

    In line with this policy, the Company has decided to have FromSoftware implement fund procurement by way of a Third-Party Allotment to Sixjoy and SIE, the scheduled allottees, for the reasons outlined below

    In February 2021, the Company conducted a third-party allotment with Sony as the allottee with the aim of strengthening its relationship with the Sony Group over the long term, and creating new IP of the Company and maximizing the utilization of its existing IP in anime and game fields

    Sony, the parent company of SIE, is listed on the Tokyo Stock Exchange

    Schedule for the Third-Party Allotment (Note) Payment for this third-party allotment is scheduled to be made on September 7, 2022

    ['fromsoftware', 'sony', 'group', 'company', 'third']



  • THE OPPO RENO 8 PRO, RENO 8, AND RENO 8 LITE ARE ON THEIR WAY TO EUROPE

    https://www.theverge.com/2022/8/31/23329591/oppo-reno-8-pro-light-marisilicon-x-80w-charging

    08/31/2022, 22:11

    60.0% Shortened!

    The Reno 8 comes next, with a smaller screen and different processor, and the Reno 8 Light is the most basic model with a lower IP rating and reduced fast charging

    The Reno 8 Pro ranks just below Oppo’s flagship Find X5 series, which also includes the Marisilicon X processor

    Oppo says the NPU enables 4K video capture in very low light situations that wouldn’t typically be bright enough to allow for recording at that resolution

    The Reno 8 sits just below it with a 6.43-inch screen, a 90Hz refresh rate, and a MediaTek Dimensity 1300 processor

    It does not have the Marisilicon NPU, but does offer most of the same features as the 8 Pro, including a 50-megapixel main camera and a 32-megapixel selfie camera

    The Reno 8 series will go on sale September 1st, with the Reno 8 at £419 (about $488) and the 8 Lite for £319 (about $371)

    ['reno', 'pro', 'light', 'oppo', 'processor']

    08/31/2022, 22:08

    64.71% Shortened!

    The Beosound Theatre is an all-in-one sound system containing 12 speaker drivers, including two custom-made, long-stroke 6.5-inch woofers

    You can also replace the soundbar later (as well as your TV) later if it suits you

    The Beosound Theatre interface bracket — most people would call it a TV stand — itself also includes a compartment where you can hide cables and TV boxes from view

    The Beosound Theatre will be available in a range of finishes and customizations, though details on these have not yet been provided

    The wall mount required is thankfully included with the Beosound Theatre, in addition to a separate stand for the soundbar to rest on a table or desk

    The aluminum “wings” are also extendable so that, according to Bang & Olufsen, almost any TV can be slotted into the Beosound Theatre

  • DIGITAL NASIONAL BERHAD CONFIRMS LAST MINUTE CHANGES TO TELCO SHAREHOLDER AGREEMENTS

    https://www.lowyat.net/2022/283320/dnb-5g-maxis-umobile-shareholder/

    08/31/2022, 21:12

    60.0% Shortened!

    The national 5G company, Digital Nasional Berhad (DNB) has confirmed that there were indeed some last-minute changes to its shareholder agreement that was supposed to involve six local telcos

    The report further added that Maxis and U Mobile did not see any benefits in having stakes in the national 5G company although both telcos apparently still want to obtain 5G access from DNB

    DNB generally confirmed this through its media statement [pdf] which said that one of the six telcos decided not to proceed with the shareholder agreement while another choose not to respond even though they have earlier confirmed their participation in the agreement

    At the moment, DNB is not able to confirm when this process will be concluded but the company is confident that all four telcos will continue to be on board

    Meanwhile, DNB also said that discussions on the 5G Access Agreements are still going on with all six telcos

    The company also clarified that telcos don’t have to take up any equity in DNB for them to sign up for 5G access

    ['company', 'dnb', 'confirm', 'agreement', 'six']

    The national 5G company, Digital Nasional Berhad (DNB) has confirmed that there were indeed some last-minute changes to its shareholder agreement that was supposed to involve six local telcos

    The report further added that Maxis and U Mobile did not see any benefits in having stakes in the national 5G company although both telcos apparently still want to obtain 5G access from DNB

    DNB generally confirmed this through its media statement [pdf] which said that one of the six telcos decided not to proceed with the shareholder agreement while another choose not to respond even though they have earlier confirmed their participation in the agreement

    At the moment, DNB is not able to confirm when this process will be concluded but the company is confident that all four telcos will continue to be on board

    Meanwhile, DNB also said that discussions on the 5G Access Agreements are still going on with all six telcos

    The company also clarified that telcos don’t have to take up any equity in DNB for them to sign up for 5G access

    ['company', 'dnb', 'confirm', 'agreement', 'six']

    08/31/2022, 21:11

    53.85% Shortened!

    Sony has announced European availability and pricing for the HT-A5000, a soundbar that it presented in September 2021

    Initially, Sony hoped to begin shipping the HT-A5000 in Europe from January 2022

    Based on Sony's press release, the HT-A5000 will land in the UK at the same time as the Eurozone

    According to Sony, the HT-A5000 supports the PlayStation 5-specific Auto HDR Tone Mapping and Auto Genre Picture Mode too, which arrived via a firmware update that Sony released this spring

    According to Sony, the HT-A5000 will now be available from October 2022

    The HT-A5000 will be available for €999 in the Eurozone, €100 more than when Sony unveiled the soundbar in September

    ['sony', 'a5000', 'soundbar', 'release', 'game']

  • NVIDIA BROADCAST SUPPORT WILL MAKE VIRTUAL GREEN SCREENS EASIER IN OBS STUDIO

    https://www.theverge.com/2022/8/31/23330379/nvidia-broadcast-virtual-green-screen-obs-studio-support

    08/31/2022, 21:10

    62.5% Shortened!

    The feature is far from perfect and won’t replace the quality of a physical green screen, but we can attest that it does a decent job

    Previously, it was possible to use a virtual green screen in OBS via plugins, but Nvidia Broadcast will make the feature much more accessible

    Those who use an Nvidia RTX graphics card could probably already have the software installed, and Nvidia Broadcast also integrates with lots of popular streaming hardware and applications

    For example, Corsair integrated Nvidia Broadcast tools into its iCue and Elgato software back in July 2022, allowing those who rely on Corsair or Elgato hardware to utilize certain features such as its impressive background noise suppression

    The Elgato Camera Hub also got access to Virtual Backgrounds at this time, allowing streamers to access Nvidia Broadcast tools without going to the app directly

    Virtual Backgrounds is the only Nvidia -specific feature added to the latest version of OBS (version 28.0) but there are other non-Nvidia Broadcast features coming to the service, such as support for high-efficiency video coding (HEVC or H.265) and high-dynamic range (HDR)

    ['ob', 'feature', 'virtual', 'background', 'nvidia']

    The feature is far from perfect and won’t replace the quality of a physical green screen, but we can attest that it does a decent job

    Previously, it was possible to use a virtual green screen in OBS via plugins, but Nvidia Broadcast will make the feature much more accessible

    Those who use an Nvidia RTX graphics card could probably already have the software installed, and Nvidia Broadcast also integrates with lots of popular streaming hardware and applications

    For example, Corsair integrated Nvidia Broadcast tools into its iCue and Elgato software back in July 2022, allowing those who rely on Corsair or Elgato hardware to utilize certain features such as its impressive background noise suppression

    The Elgato Camera Hub also got access to Virtual Backgrounds at this time, allowing streamers to access Nvidia Broadcast tools without going to the app directly

    Virtual Backgrounds is the only Nvidia -specific feature added to the latest version of OBS (version 28.0) but there are other non-Nvidia Broadcast features coming to the service, such as support for high-efficiency video coding (HEVC or H.265) and high-dynamic range (HDR)

  • 'SHOVEL KNIGHT' TO MAKE HIS RETURN IN ROGUELIKE PLATFORMER 'DIG'

    https://www.nme.com/news/gaming-news/shovel-knight-to-make-his-return-in-roguelike-platformer-dig-3301677

    08/31/2022, 21:09

    50.0% Shortened!

    Following on from 2021’s tile-puzzler Shovel Knight Pocket Dungeon, Shovel Knight is set to make his return in roguelike platformer Dig

    Shovel Knight Dig is due for release on September 23 via Nintendo Switch, Steam and Apple Arcade

    A co-development between Yacht Club and UK-based Nitrome, Shovel Knight Dig sees the plucky hero going up against a team of thieves led by Drill Knight, in a race through an “ever-changing chasm of mystery” made up of thousands of level chunks

    “Shovel Knight Dig levels have been meticulously crafted, then stitched together using proprietary generation techniques for infinite replayability,” reads a description of the game

    “Jump, slash, and dig your way down an ever-changing chasm of mystery in Shovel Knight Dig, an all-new adventure.” Earlier this year, Yacht Club launched a kickstarter for its latest project Mina The Hollower, which smashed its target in less than 24 hours.  Shovel Knight Dig is one of four new titles coming to Apple Arcade in September

    The entire game will be narrated by Hanks

    ['shovel', 'knight', 'dig', 'september', 'game']

    Following on from 2021’s tile-puzzler Shovel Knight Pocket Dungeon, Shovel Knight is set to make his return in roguelike platformer Dig

    Shovel Knight Dig is due for release on September 23 via Nintendo Switch, Steam and Apple Arcade

    A co-development between Yacht Club and UK-based Nitrome, Shovel Knight Dig sees the plucky hero going up against a team of thieves led by Drill Knight, in a race through an “ever-changing chasm of mystery” made up of thousands of level chunks

    “Shovel Knight Dig levels have been meticulously crafted, then stitched together using proprietary generation techniques for infinite replayability,” reads a description of the game

    “Jump, slash, and dig your way down an ever-changing chasm of mystery in Shovel Knight Dig, an all-new adventure.” Earlier this year, Yacht Club launched a kickstarter for its latest project Mina The Hollower, which smashed its target in less than 24 hours.  Shovel Knight Dig is one of four new titles coming to Apple Arcade in September

    The entire game will be narrated by Hanks

    ['shovel', 'knight', 'dig', 'september', 'game']

    This is a spinoff of the mobile gacha game Granblue Fantasy, and it's a partnership between that game's developer Cygames and legendary anime fighting studio Arc System Works

    Enjoy it while you can; after all, there won't be a Dragalia Lost fighting game on the way anytime soon

  • EXCLUSIVE MALAYSIA'S 5G PLANS HIT AS TWO CARRIERS DECLINE STAKES IN STATE AGENCY -SOURCES

    https://www.reuters.com/business/media-telecom/exclusive-maxis-u-mobile-decline-offer-take-stakes-malaysias-5g-agency-sources-2022-08-31/

    08/31/2022, 21:08

    80.0% Shortened!

    The government had wanted six of the country's mobile operators to agree on taking a combined 70% stake in the agency, Digital Nasional Berhad (DNB)

    Maxis and U Mobile could not see benefits in being a minority shareholder in DNB, said two of the sources, but added that the firms have told the government they want to remain in talks for access to DNB's 5G network

    Celcom, Digi and U Mobile declined to comment

    DNB did not respond to a Reuters request for comment but it confirmed to local media that two carriers had decided not to proceed with the stake purchases

    DNB did not identify any of the companies involved

    Reuters, the news and media division of Thomson Reuters, is the world’s largest multimedia news provider, reaching billions of people worldwide every day

    ['reuters', 'mobile', 'carrier', 'government', 'say']

    08/31/2022, 21:08

    81.82% Shortened!

    Publisher Vaka Game Magazine and developer ImCyan will release horror game Tsugunohi for Switch sometime between fall 2022 and spring 2023, the companies announced

    Finally, The Erosion Begins on Switch! ImCyan’s classic horror game Tsugunohi will also be released on Nintendo Switch

    The ability to play this film in a translated version is unique to the Switch version

    Playable in Six Languages! In addition to Japanese, the Nintendo Switch version of the game will also include English, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), Korean, and Spanish translations

    The world will be able to experience the gritty Japanese horror atmosphere that is the charm of Tsugunohi

    In addition to the existing Steam version and the new Nintendo Switch version, Tsugunohi is expanding into a new place to meet new people, and we hope you will not miss it

  • NETEASE GAMES ACQUIRES QUANTIC DREAM

    https://www.gematsu.com/2022/08/netease-games-acquires-quantic-dream

    08/31/2022, 21:08

    57.14% Shortened!

    As the Chinese company’s first studio in Europe, Quantic Dream will continue to operate independently, focusing on creating and publishing games for all platforms, as well as supporting and publishing third-party-developed titles, while also leveraging NetEase’s game development capabilities

    “We are thrilled to embark on an exciting new stage of growth with Quantic Dream, bound by our shared vision, mutual trust and respect,” said NetEase CEO and director William Ding in a press release

    “NetEase will continue to fulfil our promise to support Quantic Dream to realise its full potential

    We have highly differentiated games in the making and I truly believe that the best is yet to come from Quantic Dream

    It is a testimony to our continued commitment to reward all those who have made Quantic Dream the successful studio it is today.” Quantic Dream co-CEO and head of publishing Guillaume de Fondaumiere said, “NetEase Games first invested in Quantic Dream three years ago

    NetEase Games’ acquisition comes as a natural evolution in this process and creates a unique opportunity to boost Quantic Dream’s growth by giving our production and publishing teams all the necessary means to excel.” Quantic Dream is currently developing Star Wars Eclipse for unannounced platforms

    ['netease', 'game', 'studio', 'quantic', 'dream']
