  • 'PREY''S CREATIVE DIRECTOR CLAIMS BETHESDA FORCED THEM TO NAME THE GAME 'PREY'

    https://www.nme.com/news/gaming-news/preys-creative-director-claims-bethesda-forced-them-to-name-the-game-prey-3301646

    08/31/2022, 20:49

    68.42% Shortened!

    Speaking to the Academy Of Interactive Arts & Sciences Colantonio said (via TechRadar) “I was a little at odds with some of the management with the decision of calling Prey, Prey

    I did not want to call this game Prey, and I had to say I wanted to anyway in front of journalists.” “I hate to lie, and those are sales lies, not a personal lie, but it still felt bad,” he continued

    Not only me, but nobody in the team wanted to call this game Prey

    But there is a bit of the artist, the creative side, that is insulted when you tell this artist ‘Your game is going to be called Prey’

    “I hate to be right in this case, but I was right in 10 different ways that this name should never have been the name of the game.” “It was also a kick in the face to the original makers of Prey,” Colantonio added

    So everybody lost, and [Prey’s] sales were horrible.” Prey

    ['creative', 'prey', 'developer', 'colantonio', 'arkane']

  • INFRARED LASER THAT CAN POWER DEVICES 100 FT AWAY COULD CHARGE YOUR PHONE WHEN YOU ENTER A ROOM

    https://www.dailymail.co.uk/sciencetech/article-11164201/Infrared-laser-power-devices-100-ft-away-charge-phone-enter-room.html

    08/31/2022, 20:17

    82.86% Shortened!

    This means that it is comprised of a transmitter and receiver

    The cell can convert the light energy into electricity to power the device, and the receiver's ball shape lens also allows for it to pick up incoming beams from any direction

    This means that the transmitter does not need to track or lock in on the receiver

    If something obstructs the line-of-sight between the transmitter and receiver, it automatically switches to 'safe power transfer mode' and lowers the intensity of the beam

    45.45% Shortened!

    Asus introduced the Snapdragon 8+ Gen 1-powered ROG Phone 6 and ROG Phone 6 Pro last month, which will be joined by the ROG Phone 6D Ultimate on September 19

    The ROG Phone 6D and 6D Ultimate look similar to the non-D models

    The regular 6D - like the ROG Phone 6 - has an illuminated logo on the back, whereas the 6D Ultimate - like ROG Phone 6 Pro - sports a (possibly OLED) display.

    Asus ROG Phone 6D • Asus ROG Phone 6D Ultimate If the differences between the ROG Phone 6 and ROG Phone 6 Pro are anything to go by, then specs-wise, the ROG Phone 6D and ROG Phone 6D Ultimate will also be identical phones with different memory options

    Asus hasn't detailed the specs sheets of the ROG Phone 6D or ROG Phone 6D Ultimate, but the Taiwanese brand has already confirmed that the 6D Ultimate will be powered by the Dimensity 9000+ SoC

    In the meantime, you can read our detailed ROG Phone 6 Pro review here or watch its video review attached below

  • LG'S FIRST BENDABLE OLED TV LETS YOU PICK BETWEEN FLAT OR CURVED MODES

    https://www.theverge.com/2022/8/31/23330370/lg-oled-flex-tv-bendable-ifa-2022

    08/31/2022, 19:00

    72.73% Shortened!

    The LG OLED Flex (model LX3) is a 42-inch OLED TV that bends into a curved (900R) TV thanks to LG’s latest display technology

    There are two presets or owners can adjust the curve of the display in five percent increments through 20 different levels

    LG is really marketing its 42-inch bendable display towards gamers, thanks to a host of features that console or PC gamers will find appealing

    Gamers can also use LG’s Multi View mode to view content from two different sources at the same time

    LG is one of the first to introduce a truly bendable OLED TV

    The LG Flex will be on display at IFA in Germany this week

    ['bendable', 'oled', 'curve', 'display', 'flex']

    Variable aperture as the name implies is the size of the aperture that can be adjusted to support at least two stops of aperture change, to better match the use of scenarios, such as dark scenes opening a large aperture, and then reducing the aperture in bright light

    Later, the large bottom sensor began to popularize, and variable aperture is gradually abandoned

    According to several reports, the Huawei Mate 50 Pro camera will use the new variable aperture technology, and the lens aperture can be adjusted between F1.4 ~ and F4

    Variable aperture as the name implies is the size of the aperture that can be adjusted to support at least two stops of aperture change, to better match the use of scenarios, such as dark scenes opening a large aperture, and then reducing the aperture in bright light

    Later, the large bottom sensor began to popularize, and variable aperture is gradually abandoned

    According to several reports, the Huawei Mate 50 Pro camera will use the new variable aperture technology, and the lens aperture can be adjusted between F1.4 ~ and F4

  • SONY AND TENCENT ACQUIRE AN INCREASED SHARE IN ELDEN RING DEVELOPER FROMSOFTWARE

    https://www.gamesradar.com/sony-and-tencent-acquire-an-increased-share-in-elden-ring-developer-fromsoftware/

    08/31/2022, 17:00

    73.91% Shortened!

    GamesRadar+ is supported by its audience

    The two tech giants now own a combined 30% of the studio Sony and Chinese publishing giant Tencent are both set to increase their stake in Elden Ring and Dark Souls developer FromSoftware

    In an announcement this morning, FromSoft parent company Kadokawa Corporation - which remains the majority owner of the developer - confirmed that Sony now owns 14.09% of FromSoftware

    Beyond that, attention is likely to turn to Elden Ring - as well as hopes for upcoming Elden Ring DLC, FromSoftware and publisher Bando Namcai have discussed their desire for the title to act as the start of a new franchise

    While the future of Elden Ring seems in a better space than its more gothic older brother, it's far from clear at this point what we can expect from the deal, and Kadokawa Corporation suggests that the deal's impact on its 2023 financial results is likely to be "minor." This list of new games 2022 should prove a more reliable wishlist

    I'm GamesRadar's news editor, working with the team to deliver breaking news from across the industry

  • HOW TO FIND WI-FI PASSWORDS OF NETWORKS YOU HAVE CONNECTED TO ON YOUR ANDROID DEVICES

    https://www.firstpost.com/tech/how-to/how-to-find-wi-fi-passwords-of-networks-you-have-connected-to-on-your-android-devices-11143601.html

    08/31/2022, 16:19

    53.85% Shortened!

    On many occasions, you might not have noted down the Wi-Fi password or saved it

    But did you know that your phone saves all the Wi-Fi passwords for easy access

    So, if you want to connect your laptop or desktop to a Wi-Fi network saved in your Android phone, all you need to do is view the password on your phone and type in your system

    For people using Android 6 to 9, the Wi-Fi password is only visible as plain text if your device is rooted

    However, if you have received a QR code for the Wi-Fi network, you can scan it using Google Lens to view the password

    Did you find these steps useful? Let us know in the comments

    ['android', 'phone', 'network', 'password', 'step']

    On many occasions, you might not have noted down the Wi-Fi password or saved it

    But did you know that your phone saves all the Wi-Fi passwords for easy access

    So, if you want to connect your laptop or desktop to a Wi-Fi network saved in your Android phone, all you need to do is view the password on your phone and type in your system

    For people using Android 6 to 9, the Wi-Fi password is only visible as plain text if your device is rooted

    However, if you have received a QR code for the Wi-Fi network, you can scan it using Google Lens to view the password

  • JAPAN TO ALLOW NON-GUIDED GROUP TOURS FROM SEPTEMBER

    https://www.thestar.com.my/aseanplus/aseanplus-news/2022/08/31/japan-to-allow-non-guided-group-tours-from-september

    08/31/2022, 16:08

    76.92% Shortened!

    Japan had 353,119 foreign visitors last year, a far cry from the record 31.9 million in 2019

    Kishida said the daily entry cap would be raised to 50,000 people from the current 20,000

    Japan had about 246,000 foreign visitors last year, a far cry from the record 31.9 million in 2019

    The small trickle of foreigners allowed into the country last year spent 120 billion yen (US$866 million)

    In 2019, they spent 4.8 trillion yen, or forty times more, according to the Japan Tourism Agency

    Last week, Kishida said that from Sept 7 Japan would scrap a requirement to show a negative Covid-19 result to enter the country for travellers who have received three vaccine doses

  • MALAYSIA'S 5G PLANS HIT AS TWO CARRIERS DECLINE STAKES IN STATE AGENCY -SOURCES

    https://www.thestar.com.my/business/business-news/2022/08/31/malaysia039s-5g-plans-hit-as-two-carriers-decline-stakes-in-state-agency--sources

    08/31/2022, 16:08

    70.0% Shortened!

    The government had wanted six of the country's mobile operators to agree on taking a combined 70% stake in the agency, Digital Nasional Berhad (DNB)

    A counter-proposal by Maxis, U Mobile and two other major carriers, Celcom Axiata Bhd and DiGi Telecommunications, for the four of them to take a combined majority stake was knocked back by the government

    Maxis and U Mobile could not see benefits in being a minority shareholder in DNB, said two of the sources, but added that the firms have told the government they want to remain in talks for access to DNB's 5G network

    Maxis, DNB and Malaysia's finance and communication ministries did not immediately respond to requests for comment

    Celcom, Digi and U Mobile declined to comment

    The government rejected that proposal but said it would offer the carriers stakes in DNB to alleviate their concerns

    ['two', 'mobile', 'carrier', 'plan', 'maxi']

    The government had wanted six of the country's mobile operators to agree on taking a combined 70% stake in the agency, Digital Nasional Berhad (DNB)

    A counter-proposal by Maxis, U Mobile and two other major carriers, Celcom Axiata Bhd and DiGi Telecommunications, for the four of them to take a combined majority stake was knocked back by the government

    Maxis and U Mobile could not see benefits in being a minority shareholder in DNB, said two of the sources, but added that the firms have told the government they want to remain in talks for access to DNB's 5G network

    Maxis, DNB and Malaysia's finance and communication ministries did not immediately respond to requests for comment

    Celcom, Digi and U Mobile declined to comment

    The government rejected that proposal but said it would offer the carriers stakes in DNB to alleviate their concerns

    ['two', 'mobile', 'carrier', 'plan', 'maxi']

    72.73% Shortened!

    She is also seeking an order that with the self-recusal of the judge, the solar case should be heard, retried or decided by another High Court judge

    In a supporting affidavit filed with the notice, Rosmah said the solar case had gone through a full trial before Judge Mohamed Zaini after she was charged on Nov 15, 2018 and on Feb 18, 2021, she was ordered to enter her defence after the judge ruled there was a prima facie case against her

    “However, no decision was given and Judge Mohamed Zaini then set July 7 as the new date

    Rosmah claimed that last Aug 26, she read an article by Raja Petra Kamarudin, with the title, “Rosmah Mansor Will Be Pronounced Guilty on 1st September 2022” on the Malaysia Today portal

    As such, Rosmah said she lost faith in the judge, who is supposed to give the decision tomorrow

    Tomorrow, Judge Mohamed Zaini will give a decision on whether Rosmah will be acquitted or convicted on three charges of corruption

    08/31/2022

    73.91% Shortened!

    But the biggest to date is probably its brand new Talent System — a replacement for the existing emblem system that will arrive on the live server sometime in September

    According to the developers, the new talent system will give players even more customization options before entering the battlefield

    The new system will also introduce a new resource, eliminating the need to save up battle points and fragments for an upgrade

    In the new system, players will be able to change their loadout after they lock in a hero

    The new talents will comprise brand new and rehashed talents from the old system

    Lastly, magic dust and emblem fragments will be removed from the game and will be replaced with a new resource called talent essence

  • HOW TO FIND WI-FI PASSWORDS OF NETWORKS YOU HAVE CONNECTED TO ON YOUR ANDROID DEVICES- TECHNOLOGY NEWS

    https://www.firstpost.com/tech/how-to/how-to-find-wi-fi-passwords-of-networks-you-have-connected-to-on-your-android-devices-11143601.html

    08/31/2022, 15:08

    53.85% Shortened!

    On many occasions, you might not have noted down the Wi-Fi password or saved it

    But did you know that your phone saves all the Wi-Fi passwords for easy access

    So, if you want to connect your laptop or desktop to a Wi-Fi network saved in your Android phone, all you need to do is view the password on your phone and type in your system

    For people using Android 6 to 9, the Wi-Fi password is only visible as plain text if your device is rooted

    However, if you have received a QR code for the Wi-Fi network, you can scan it using Google Lens to view the password

    Did you find these steps useful? Let us know in the comments

    ['android', 'phone', 'network', 'password', 'step']

    On many occasions, you might not have noted down the Wi-Fi password or saved it

    But did you know that your phone saves all the Wi-Fi passwords for easy access

    So, if you want to connect your laptop or desktop to a Wi-Fi network saved in your Android phone, all you need to do is view the password on your phone and type in your system

    For people using Android 6 to 9, the Wi-Fi password is only visible as plain text if your device is rooted

    However, if you have received a QR code for the Wi-Fi network, you can scan it using Google Lens to view the password

    Did you find these steps useful? Let us know in the comments

    ['android', 'phone', 'network', 'password', 'step']

    08/31/2022, 14:08

    88.0% Shortened!

    New processors require a new motherboard AMD recently revealed the first four CPUs in its new AMD Ryzen 7000 desktop processor line during the company’s “Together we advance PCs” livestream event

    As stated during the event, the new chips feature TSMC’s 5-nanometer process and run on AMD’s new AM5 platform

    Since the Ryzen 7000 CPUs use a new AM5 socket, you’ll need to buy an entirely new motherboard

    Below, we'll detail everything AMD has detailed about the AM5 platform

    This means you won’t be able to use DDR4 RAM with your new motherboard

    AMD says it will support AM5 at least until 2025

    ['new', 'amd', 'cpu', 'ryzen', 'am5']

  • AIRPODS PRO 2 — 5 BIGGEST RUMORED UPGRADES

    https://www.tomsguide.com/news/airpods-pro-2-biggest-upgrade-rumors

    08/31/2022, 14:08

    85.0% Shortened!

    From lossless audio support to fitness tracking, these are the big upgrades we hope to see on the AirPods Pro 2 Apple's AirPods Pro 2 could well be one of the stars of the Apple September Event that's now confirmed for September 7

    While some people will be most excited about possible changes to the AirPods Pro 2's design, that's not how I roll.  As I'm a quality-audio enthusiast, the most exciting feature I'd like to see on the AirPods Pro 2's spec sheet is support for Apple's own ALAC (Apple Lossless Audio Codec) format

    However, a patent, spotted by Patently Apple (opens in new tab), could enable the AirPods to overcome that problem by instead using optical audio transmission tech.  Regardless of what happens there, the AirPods Pro 2 have been tipped to come with Bluetooth LE Audio support

    Any ANC improvement on the new model would be welcome

    This was first hinted at in a 2020 Apple patent, and the AirPods Pro 2 could potentially be the first to harness a new chip with more sophisticated smart processing to enable this functionality

    The current AirPods Pro manage around 4.5 hours of playback time, but the AirPods 3 can get to 6 hours playback from a single charge — albeit without ANC

    ['audio', 'airpods', 'pro', 'apple', 'could']

    However, a patent, spotted by Patently Apple (opens in new tab), could enable the AirPods to overcome that problem by instead using optical audio transmission tech.  Regardless of what happens there, the AirPods Pro 2 have been tipped to come with Bluetooth LE Audio support

    Any ANC improvement on the new model would be welcome

    This was first hinted at in a 2020 Apple patent, and the AirPods Pro 2 could potentially be the first to harness a new chip with more sophisticated smart processing to enable this functionality

  • CHAMPION RADUCANU OUT OF US OPEN AS NADAL SURVIVES SCARE

    08/31/2022, 13:09

    80.0% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise NEW YORK, Aug 31 — Emma Raducanu became only the third defending champion to exit the US Open in the first round on Tuesday while four-time winner Rafael Nadal overcame an early scare against a player ranked 198 in the world

    It’s a long time that I played here

    I thought that maybe I’d never be back,” said 36-year-old Nadal whose last appearance in New York saw him win the 2019 title

    World number one and French Open champion Iga Swiatek eased past Italy’s Jasmine Paolini 6-3, 6-0 in just 67 minutes

    However, she remains without a victory since Wimbledon last year

    Later Tuesday, Japan’s two-time champion Naomi Osaka faces 19th seed Danielle Collins, this year’s runner-up at the Australian Open

    ['third', 'champion', 'open', 'time', 'world']

  • AMD RYZEN 9 7950X3D, RYZEN 9 7900X3D & RYZEN 7 7800X3D ZEN 4 V-CACHE CPUS RUMORED TO DEBUT AT CES 2023

    https://wccftech.com/amd-ryzen-9-7950x3d-ryzen-9-7900x3d-ryzen-7-7800x3d-zen-4-v-cache-cpus-ces-2023-debut-rumor/

    08/31/2022, 13:08

    73.91% Shortened!

    AMD is rumored to launch three new Zen 4 V-Cache CPUs, the Ryzen 9 7950X3D, Ryzen 9 7900X3D & Ryzen 7 7800X3D at CES 2023

    The latest rumor regarding the Zen 4 V-Cache parts comes from Greymon55 who has put forward a cryptic tweet referring to the Ryzen 7000 3D V-Cache CPUs

    According to the tweet, three Ryzen 3D V-Cache CPUs have been rumored, the Ryzen 9 7950X3D, Ryzen 9 7900X3D & the Ryzen 7 7800X3D

    We can't say for sure yet if AMD will have a single CCD stacked with a 3D cache stack or if both Zen 4 CCDs will be stacked

    In any case, if AMD goes with the existing 64 MB SRAM (3D V-Cache) stack, we will get up to 104 MB cache on the Ryzen 7 7800X3D, up to 140 MB cache on the Ryzen 9 7900X3D, and a whopping 144 MB of cache on the Ryzen 9 7950X3D

    That's a 2.6x increase over Ryzen 7 7700X, an 85% increase over the 7900X, and an 80% increase over the Ryzen 9 7950X

    ['amd', 'zen', 'cache', 'ryzen', 'part']

    AMD is rumored to launch three new Zen 4 V-Cache CPUs, the Ryzen 9 7950X3D, Ryzen 9 7900X3D & Ryzen 7 7800X3D at CES 2023

    The latest rumor regarding the Zen 4 V-Cache parts comes from Greymon55 who has put forward a cryptic tweet referring to the Ryzen 7000 3D V-Cache CPUs

    According to the tweet, three Ryzen 3D V-Cache CPUs have been rumored, the Ryzen 9 7950X3D, Ryzen 9 7900X3D & the Ryzen 7 7800X3D

    We can't say for sure yet if AMD will have a single CCD stacked with a 3D cache stack or if both Zen 4 CCDs will be stacked

    In any case, if AMD goes with the existing 64 MB SRAM (3D V-Cache) stack, we will get up to 104 MB cache on the Ryzen 7 7800X3D, up to 140 MB cache on the Ryzen 9 7900X3D, and a whopping 144 MB of cache on the Ryzen 9 7950X3D

    That's a 2.6x increase over Ryzen 7 7700X, an 85% increase over the 7900X, and an 80% increase over the Ryzen 9 7950X

    ['amd', 'zen', 'cache', 'ryzen', 'part']



  • HOW TO QUICKLY START A VOICE RECORDING ON YOUR IPHONE

    https://www.pocket-lint.com/apps/news/apple/162434-how-record-voice-notes-on-your-iphone

    08/31/2022, 13:06

    68.42% Shortened!

    (Pocket-lint) - Let's say you're in a situation where you want to be able to quickly record a voice note on your iPhone

    - You won't have to do this every time, but in order to record a voice note on your phone, you'll need an app that offers an audio recording feature

    While Apple’s App Store is filled with third-party voice note apps, Apple’s built-in Voice Memos app is very user-friendly

    Again, you won't have to do this every time, but if you add the Voice Memos app to your Control Centre, you'll be able to quickly access it there every day going forward

    And that's it! You recorded a voice note in no time at all

    Check out Apple's support hub for Voice Memos to learn more about the app.

    ['quickly', 'record', 'voice', 'note', 'time']

    (Pocket-lint) - Let's say you're in a situation where you want to be able to quickly record a voice note on your iPhone

    - You won't have to do this every time, but in order to record a voice note on your phone, you'll need an app that offers an audio recording feature

    While Apple’s App Store is filled with third-party voice note apps, Apple’s built-in Voice Memos app is very user-friendly

    Again, you won't have to do this every time, but if you add the Voice Memos app to your Control Centre, you'll be able to quickly access it there every day going forward

    And that's it! You recorded a voice note in no time at all

    Check out Apple's support hub for Voice Memos to learn more about the app.

    ['quickly', 'record', 'voice', 'note', 'time']



  • 8BITDO LAUNCHES THE WIRELESS ULTIMATE GAMING CONTROLLER

    https://hypebeast.com/2022/8/8bitdo-wireless-ultimate-gaming-controller-release

    08/31/2022, 13:02

    45.45% Shortened!

    If you’re looking for a new controller to update your gaming setup, 8BitDo has now updated its sleek Ultimate Controller design with the introduction of new wireless models as well

    Now available in either Bluetooth or 2.4GHz wireless configurations or a traditional wired model

    The new lineup carries an Xbox-styled layout with a left analog stick and the A-B-X-Y buttons on either side while a right analog stick and left-handed D-pad sit lower in the center

    As for compatibility, the Bluetooth version will link up with Windows PCs and the Nintendo Switch while the 2.4GHz variant works with Windows, Android and Raspberry Pi platforms

    The wired version will then connect with Windows, Android, Raspberry Pi and the Switch

    Available in black, white and pink, prices for 8BitDo’s new Ultimate Controller range from $35 USD to $70 USD and deliveries are expected for October.

    ['new', 'controller', 'update', 'game', '8bitdo']

    The new lineup carries an Xbox-styled layout with a left analog stick and the A-B-X-Y buttons on either side while a right analog stick and left-handed D-pad sit lower in the center

    As for compatibility, the Bluetooth version will link up with Windows PCs and the Nintendo Switch while the 2.4GHz variant works with Windows, Android and Raspberry Pi platforms

    The wired version will then connect with Windows, Android, Raspberry Pi and the Switch

    Available in black, white and pink, prices for 8BitDo’s new Ultimate Controller range from $35 USD to $70 USD and deliveries are expected for October.

    Dr Mahathir tested negative again after the second scare, even though he said he did not have contact with the officer in Parliament

    The last time the Langkawi MP was admitted to the National Heart Institute (IJN) was in late January this year

    On January 22, Dr Mahathir was confirmed to be in IJN and having undergone a medical treatment

  • SAMSUNG ROLLS OUT ANDROID 13 BETA FOR THE GALAXY S21 & GALAXY S22 SERIES

    https://technave.com/gadget/Samsung-rolls-out-Android-13-beta-for-the-Galaxy-S21-Galaxy-S22-Series-31521.html

    08/31/2022, 12:11

    60.0% Shortened!

    As for other Android devices, they will only receive the update “later this year”, though many companies have already started rolling out Android 13 beta versions for their smartphones to customers, including Samsung with its popular Galaxy S22 and Galaxy S21 Series.  In fact, the Galaxy S22 Series had actually received Android 13 via One UI 5.0 beta even before Google officially released the final version of Android 13

    Well, it does make sense given how Android 13 beta has been around for ages and the One UI 5.0 is not utilising the final version of the latest Android OS.  Now, Samsung is rolling out the One UI 5.0 beta to the Galaxy S22 Series’ predecessor, the Galaxy S21 Series

    Available for download for Galaxy S21 Series users in South Korea and the United Kingdom, the update carries the firmware version G99xBxxU5ZVHE according to SamMobile.  Moreover, the 1957.47MB update is available for all unlocked models of the Galaxy S21 Series which include the Galaxy S21, Galaxy S21+ and Galaxy S21 Ultra

    Well, if you’re a Samsung Galaxy S22 or Galaxy S21 user and are interested to test the Android 13 beta when it’s available in Malaysia, make sure to install the Samsung Members app on your device and log in to the app using your Samsung account

    Here are 3 simple reasons to pick the Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra 5G as your next flagship device

    The recently launched Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra not only packed in a built-in S Pen, it also comes with the highest-end camera specs of the entire Samsung Galaxy S22 series so it’s safe to assume that the S22 Ultra is every bit a super cameraphone as it’s S21 Ultra predecessor

  • NEW PIXEL 7 SERIES TO SUPPORT BLUETOOTH LE AUDIO (LC3 CODEC) - GSMARENA.COM NEWS

    https://www.gsmarena.com/new_pixel_7_series_to_support_bluetooth_le_audio_lc3_codec-news-55590.php

    08/31/2022, 12:10

    64.71% Shortened!

    New findings by 9to5Google suggest that the new Google Pixel 7 series (and future Pixel 7a) may support a new Bluetooth codec

    Android 13 brought support for ‘Bluetooth LE Audio’ using the LC3 codec

    This exchange infers that the new Bluetooth LE Audio feature will be supported by the new Pixel phones

    The LC3 audio codec will be able to compress audio more efficiently and it can be configured to use more or less bandwidth such as when there’s suddenly a longer distance between the host device and connected audio

    Of course, for any regular consumer to be able to take advantage of this new codec, both the Android smartphone and audio device must support the same codec

    The Google Pixel 7 and 7 Pro (along with the Pixel Watch) will be released sometime in October

    ['google', 'new', 'pixel', 'support', 'codec']

    New findings by 9to5Google suggest that the new Google Pixel 7 series (and future Pixel 7a) may support a new Bluetooth codec

    Android 13 brought support for ‘Bluetooth LE Audio’ using the LC3 codec

    This exchange infers that the new Bluetooth LE Audio feature will be supported by the new Pixel phones

    The LC3 audio codec will be able to compress audio more efficiently and it can be configured to use more or less bandwidth such as when there’s suddenly a longer distance between the host device and connected audio

    Of course, for any regular consumer to be able to take advantage of this new codec, both the Android smartphone and audio device must support the same codec

    The Google Pixel 7 and 7 Pro (along with the Pixel Watch) will be released sometime in October

    ['google', 'new', 'pixel', 'support', 'codec']

  • HOW TO DELETE A SLACK ACCOUNT

    https://www.digitaltrends.com/computing/how-to-delete-slack-account/

    08/31/2022

    80.65% Shortened!

    There’s a process to completely deactivate your Slack profile

    If you are simply switching to a new email, you don’t have to delete your Slack account entirely

    Deactivating your account like this will only delete it from this particular Slack workspace

    If you want to delete yourself from Slack entirely, you’ll have to do it one at a time

    Slack can integrate with a variety of apps

    If you are a Primary Owner of a workspace, you can’t deactivate your account like this

    ['slack', 'workspace', 'account', 'deactivate', 'step']

    There’s a process to completely deactivate your Slack profile

    If you are simply switching to a new email, you don’t have to delete your Slack account entirely

    Deactivating your account like this will only delete it from this particular Slack workspace

    If you want to delete yourself from Slack entirely, you’ll have to do it one at a time

    Slack can integrate with a variety of apps

    If you are a Primary Owner of a workspace, you can’t deactivate your account like this

    ['slack', 'workspace', 'account', 'deactivate', 'step']

    So what are we going to do?” Hisyam replied that he would leave it to the court to decide

    He is still on the record as the lead counsel,” Tengku Maimun said

    In essence, even though Hisyam will not argue the case, in the eyes of the court, he remains Najib’s lead counsel, and therefore, as Najib has representation in the eyes of the court, the appeal can proceed

    Tengku Maimun told both parties to be in court on Tuesday; however, Hisyam still reiterated that he will not be submitting

    But you are counsel on record

    Before the chaos of Najib’s lawyers ensued, Tengku Maimun and the four other judges had heard an application by Hisyam to adduce further evidence in the appeal

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/08/31/at-dataran-merdeka-malaysians-turn-out-in-droves-to-celebrate-national-day/25681

    08/31/2022, 11:11

    80.65% Shortened!

    With the theme Keluarga Malaysia Teguh Bersama (Malaysian Family Strong Together), this year’s historic day celebration is meaningful in expressing the gratitude and pride of the country's pluralistic society who gathered at the main location of the National Day celebration, with most of them arriving as early as 4.30am to witness the event

    The celebrative atmosphere was enlivened when the theme song for the event, Keluarga Malaysia Teguh Bersama (Malaysian Family Strong Together) echoed in the air

    Leading the segment on nationhood was a parade by 60 cadet officers from the Military Training Academy, National Defence University of Malaysia (UPNM) and trainee cadets from the Royal Malaysia Police Training Centre carrying huge flags

    For the national security segment, the Malaysian Armed Forces (ATM) started the parade with a demonstration on rescuing hostages by the elite force, followed by ATM assets

    Air assets belonging to the Malaysian security forces were also displayed in an air show, including the A400M and C-130 Hercules belonging to the Royal Malaysian Air Force (RMAF)

    The theme song for Keluarga Malaysia, composed by Jerry and lyrics by Annuar, who is also the Chairman of the 2022 National Day and Malaysia Day Steering Committee, concluded today’s performance

    ['malaysian', 'national', 'day', 'malaysia', 'celebration']

    With the theme Keluarga Malaysia Teguh Bersama (Malaysian Family Strong Together), this year’s historic day celebration is meaningful in expressing the gratitude and pride of the country's pluralistic society who gathered at the main location of the National Day celebration, with most of them arriving as early as 4.30am to witness the event

    The celebrative atmosphere was enlivened when the theme song for the event, Keluarga Malaysia Teguh Bersama (Malaysian Family Strong Together) echoed in the air

    Leading the segment on nationhood was a parade by 60 cadet officers from the Military Training Academy, National Defence University of Malaysia (UPNM) and trainee cadets from the Royal Malaysia Police Training Centre carrying huge flags

    For the national security segment, the Malaysian Armed Forces (ATM) started the parade with a demonstration on rescuing hostages by the elite force, followed by ATM assets

    Air assets belonging to the Malaysian security forces were also displayed in an air show, including the A400M and C-130 Hercules belonging to the Royal Malaysian Air Force (RMAF)

    The theme song for Keluarga Malaysia, composed by Jerry and lyrics by Annuar, who is also the Chairman of the 2022 National Day and Malaysia Day Steering Committee, concluded today’s performance

    ['malaysian', 'national', 'day', 'malaysia', 'celebration']

    Therefore, you can have more than one player near a totem at a time, so long as one of them holds the buff

    Once the player in the middle has identified which plate is first, they should step off, and then start the sequence

    The person on the first plate relates the next plate to the rest of the team, and the remaining plate is last

    This is the only player who can claim the buff, and they need to head to the green platform along with another player, who has to stand on that pressure plate for the time being

    If your plate is not one of the active ones, be sure to stay off it, or everyone on a plate will take damage

    The first player detonates their bomb and then returns to the aura to do damage to Oryx

  • INCENTIVES GALORE FOR CIVIL SERVANTS

    08/31/2022, 08:11

    68.42% Shortened!

    “These initiatives are to recognise the contributions of civil servants to the government

    Ismail Sabri also announced that the maximum number of annual leave days that could be accumulated for cash awards in lieu of leave would be increased from 160 to 180

    “For the purpose of unrecorded leave, the definition of family members has been extended to the civil servant’s siblings and grandparents for deaths

    The Prime Minister also expressed his gratitude to the civil servants who had worked hard to ensure that the government machinery remained effective and that policies are executed to benefit the people

    “God willing, if productivity can be increased and the economy becomes stronger, the government will have a bigger capability to improve facilities - not only for the public but also for civil servants,” he added

    Among those present at the gathering were ministers, Chief Secretary to the Government Tan Sri Mohd Zuki Ali and some 4,000 civil servants

    It is a foregone conclusion that Umno will not change for the better and will never be able to provide a clean, fair and honest government

    Umno's stand after former prime minister Najib Abdul Razak has been imprisoned for his crime reveals a most disturbing and frightening prospect if it is allowed to rule again

    When a powerful party like Umno exerts control, as in this case, the political outcomes have to be what that party wants

    The possibility of a hung Parliament after the upcoming election, the possible party horse-trading and the possible ensuing instability will weaken the country

    After all, who are the grassroots of Umno? But I fear the worst

    If Umno forms the government after the 15th general election, I can say “game over” for Malaysia

    ['umno', 'country', 'government', 'party', 'minister']

    It is a foregone conclusion that Umno will not change for the better and will never be able to provide a clean, fair and honest government

    Umno's stand after former prime minister Najib Abdul Razak has been imprisoned for his crime reveals a most disturbing and frightening prospect if it is allowed to rule again

    When a powerful party like Umno exerts control, as in this case, the political outcomes have to be what that party wants

    The possibility of a hung Parliament after the upcoming election, the possible party horse-trading and the possible ensuing instability will weaken the country

    After all, who are the grassroots of Umno? But I fear the worst

    If Umno forms the government after the 15th general election, I can say “game over” for Malaysia

    ['umno', 'country', 'government', 'party', 'minister']



  • SACKING THREAT BY UMNO? NO SUCH THING, SAYS PM

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/08/31/sacking-threat-by-umno-no-such-thing-says-pm

    08/31/2022, 08:11

    70.0% Shortened!

    “There’s no such thing,” said the Umno vice-president

    Talk of Umno’s threat surfaced after the supreme council meeting on Saturday, which was held immediately after the special briefing on former party president Datuk Seri Najib Razak

    The briefing, chaired by Umno president Datuk Seri Dr Ahmad Zahid Hamidi, saw loud cries for the dissolution of Parliament and there were boos whenever the Prime Minister’s name was mentioned

    While the current parliamentary term ends in July, Umno has been pressuring for the polls to be held as soon as possible

    On Monday, fellow vice-president Datuk Seri Mahdzir Khalid also said claims that Ismail Sabri was given an ultimatum during the meeting was aimed at splitting Umno

    Umno deputy president Datuk Seri Mohamad Hasan, meanwhile, has said the Prime Minister has given his commitment to call for the election by the end of this year.

    ['prime', 'minister', 'datuk', 'seri', 'ismail']

    “There’s no such thing,” said the Umno vice-president

    Talk of Umno’s threat surfaced after the supreme council meeting on Saturday, which was held immediately after the special briefing on former party president Datuk Seri Najib Razak

    The briefing, chaired by Umno president Datuk Seri Dr Ahmad Zahid Hamidi, saw loud cries for the dissolution of Parliament and there were boos whenever the Prime Minister’s name was mentioned

    While the current parliamentary term ends in July, Umno has been pressuring for the polls to be held as soon as possible

    On Monday, fellow vice-president Datuk Seri Mahdzir Khalid also said claims that Ismail Sabri was given an ultimatum during the meeting was aimed at splitting Umno

    Umno deputy president Datuk Seri Mohamad Hasan, meanwhile, has said the Prime Minister has given his commitment to call for the election by the end of this year.

    Obviously, Bahasa Malaysia is our national language and we should know it, but we are a trading nation and English is the language of trade and commerce

    The perception is that corruption has now become endemic in this country

    Unless we seriously root out corruption, we are in trouble

  • BADMINTON: SCALPS ON THE LINE

    https://www.thestar.com.my/sport/badminton/2022/08/31/scalps-on-the-line

    08/31/2022, 08:08

    71.43% Shortened!

    It is a rare feat to secure the world title, the second most sought-after crown after the Olympics gold and Aaron realises the tough task ahead

    After numerous attempts at breaking the duck for their first international title, Aaron-Wooi Yik came good in Tokyo last week where they dropped just one game (against India’s Satwiksairaj Rankireddy-Chirag Shetty in the semi-finals) en route to the title

    “Once you are a champion, everyone will start analysing your game and we have to raise our game to face the challenges ahead

    Wooi Yik added that playing in a major final and winning it has helped boost their confidence tremendously which will help them achieve more honours

    We’ve been playing for almost four years as partners and sometimes, we think like it is impossible to become champions,” said Wooi Yik

    “We will just keep learning and focus on our strengths.” Aaron-Wooi Yik are bracing for a storm of challenges that would come their way with renewed confidence, something that was missing in their career.

    ['world', 'title', 'aaron', 'wooi', 'yik']

    If you're in the UK and want to try your hand at this, note that the beta is currently only available for SIM-free, unlocked units

    There will definitely be a bunch of further beta builds for One UI 5.0, and if you're registered into the testing program you'll receive each of those as it's released, as an over-the-air update

  • AMD RYZEN 9 7950X VS. INTEL CORE I9-12900K: SPEC COMPARISON

    https://www.digitaltrends.com/computing/ryzen-9-7950x-vs-intel-core-i9-12900k/

    08/31/2022, 07:11

    85.71% Shortened!

    When the Intel Core i9-12900K came out in late 2021, it was Intel’s first true flagship CPU since its 2018 Core i9-9900K

    Clock speed is also difficult to compare as AMD and Intel CPUs don’t boost the same way

    AMD did provide us with a Geekbench 5.4 benchmark, though only for single-thread

    Ryzen 7000 resolves all of that by bringing support for all of these features, and in some ways, AMD is actually doing it better than Intel

    AMD also has slightly better DDR5 support, with the highest supported clock speed being 5,200MHz on AMD boards, while Intel boards go up to just 4,800MHz

    Finally, AMD is adding AVX-512 support, which is an extended CPU instruction set that helps improve performance

    ['intel', 'core', '12900k', 'cpu', 'amd']

    AMD did provide us with a Geekbench 5.4 benchmark, though only for single-thread

    It comes after some sources claimed that Newcastle are pushing to sign Kone ahead of the September 1st deadline

    A Midfielder that has caught my eye is 20 year old 🇫🇷 Manu Koné

    Given the fact Kone only began to make people sit up and take notice of him last season, you may not know much about the Frenchman

    In our view, if Liverpool or Newcastle fail to sign the Borussia Monchengladbach wonderkid now, they should expect to pay much more for him in a year or two

    Keep an eye on this situation, as Liverpool are expected to work through their three-man shortlist ahead of the September 1st deadline

  • GOOGLE IS ONLY ALLOWING SOME TO DOWNGRADE FROM ANDROID 13 TO ANDROID 12

    https://www.androidauthority.com/android-13-downgrade-android-12-3202695/

    08/31/2022, 07:08

    60.0% Shortened!

    When Android 13 first started rolling out a few weeks ago, it was discovered that users wouldn’t be able to go back to Android 12 after updating

    Now, Google is allowing some Pixel owners to go back to Android 12

    As a result, once you updated to Android 13, you were stuck with it

    According to Android Central, Google is now correcting that mistake by releasing “Developer Support images” that will allow its Pixel 6 devices to safely downgrade to an image of Android 12 or 12L

    On Google’s developer site, the company explains Pixel 6 devices can be rolled back to an Android 12 Developer Support image, but can’t be rolled back to any other Android 12 images

    In addition to anti-rollback, Android 13 introduced a variety of other security and privacy improvements

    ['android', 'back', 'google', 'pixel', 'developer']

    The newest digital edition weighs 7.5 pounds (3.4kg) compared to the 8.6 pound (3.9kg) 2021 version

    News of this lighter console comes less than a week after Sony announced it was driving up the price of both the console’s digital and disc versions in most of the world’s hottest markets

    This isn’t the first time Sony has reduced the weight of its premier console

    Press Start noted that the disc version of the new PS5 model has a heft equivalent to the digital version of the 2020 launch PS5

  • IPHONE 14 CHIP NEWS: WHAT TO EXPECT

    https://9to5mac.com/2022/08/30/iphone-14-chip/

    08/31/2022, 05:10

    76.92% Shortened!

    The iPhone 14 chip will be different than the iPhone 14 Pro chip for the first time.

    The iPhone 14 and iPhone 14 Pro will feature a 6.1-inch display, while the iPhone 14 Max and iPhone 14 Pro Max will feature a 6.7-inch display

    For instance, the iPhone 12 lineup was powered by the A14 chip, while the iPhone 13 lineup is powered by the A15 chip

    That won’t be the case this year with the iPhone 14 chip

    The iPhone 14 Pro and iPhone 14 Pro Max, however, will see an upgraded processor

    Apple is expected to make a bigger jump from the iPhone 14 to the iPhone 15, but that won’t happen until 2023.

    ['apple', 'iphone', 'lineup', 'feature', 'chip']

    08/31/2022, 05:10

    British Prime Minister Boris Johnson, citing Putin's invasion of Ukraine, said Gorbachev's "tireless commitment to opening up Soviet society remains an example to us all"

    After decades of Cold War tension and confrontation, Gorbachev brought the Soviet Union closer to the West than at any point since World War Two

    Gorbachev won the Nobel Peace Prize in 1990

    Gorbachev - who was briefly deposed in an August 1991 coup by party hardliners - struggled vainly to prevent that collapse

    "The era of Gorbachev is the era of perestroika, the era of hope, the era of our entry into a missile-free world ..

  • LAST SOVIET LEADER GORBACHEV, WHO ENDED COLD WAR AND WON NOBEL PRIZE, DIES AGED 91

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/world/2022/08/31/mikhail-gorbachev-who-ended-the-cold-war-dies-aged-92--agencies

    08/31/2022, 05:08

    82.86% Shortened!

    Gorbachev, the last Soviet president, forged arms reduction deals with the United States and partnerships with Western powers to remove the Iron Curtain that had divided Europe since World War Two and bring about the reunification of Germany

    Putin said in 2018 he would reverse the Soviet Union's disintegration if he could, news agencies reported

    WESTERN PARTNERSHIPS After decades of Cold War tension and confrontation, Gorbachev brought the Soviet Union closer to the West than at any point since World War Two

    Gorbachev - who was briefly deposed in an August 1991 coup by party hardliners - struggled vainly to prevent that collapse

    TURBULENT REFORMS "The era of Gorbachev is the era of perestroika, the era of hope, the era of our entry into a missile-free world ..

    Vladimir Rogov, a Russian-appointed official in a part of Ukraine now occupied by pro-Moscow forces, said Gorbachev had "deliberately led the (Soviet) Union to its demise" and called him a traitor

    ['soviet', 'gorbachev', 'war', 'union', 'say']

    WESTERN PARTNERSHIPS After decades of Cold War tension and confrontation, Gorbachev brought the Soviet Union closer to the West than at any point since World War Two

  • LEAKED SWITCH-ESQUE PORTABLE FROM LOGITECH COULD BE GREAT FOR STREAMING, EMULATION

    https://arstechnica.com/gaming/2022/08/report-logitech-plans-portable-switch-like-android-console-with-google-play-support/

    08/31/2022, 04:11

    73.91% Shortened!

    There are many Nintendo-Switch-style, Android-powered gaming handhelds out there, usually available as imports on eBay or AliExpress

    Others, like the Retroid Pocket 2+, are less good, but they’re so cheap that they’re still worth buying for people who want a portable console for old-school game console emulators

    That's why the rumors of a Switch-like, Android-based portable from Logitech caught our eye

    A faster chip would make the console cost more, but it would also allow it to capably emulate newer consoles like the Dreamcast, GameCube, PS2, and Wii, whereas many cheap portables top out at the original PlayStation or the Nintendo 64

    The console could probably afford to be more expensive than some of the $100-ish no-name Android consoles out there, but it would ideally be quite a bit cheaper than x86-based handhelds like the Steam Deck

    © 2022 Condé Nast

    ['site', 'android', 'game', 'like', 'portable']

    There are many Nintendo-Switch-style, Android-powered gaming handhelds out there, usually available as imports on eBay or AliExpress

    Others, like the Retroid Pocket 2+, are less good, but they’re so cheap that they’re still worth buying for people who want a portable console for old-school game console emulators

    That's why the rumors of a Switch-like, Android-based portable from Logitech caught our eye

    A faster chip would make the console cost more, but it would also allow it to capably emulate newer consoles like the Dreamcast, GameCube, PS2, and Wii, whereas many cheap portables top out at the original PlayStation or the Nintendo 64

  • THE NEW BULGARI ALUMINIUM SORAYAMA SPECIAL EDITION

    https://www.hodinkee.com/articles/shine-on-you-crazy-bulgari-aluminium-sorayama-special-edition

    08/31/2022, 04:08

    87.23% Shortened!

    Watch Of The Week The Fine German Watch That Taught Me To Appreciate Asymmetry

    It would seem that Bulgari considers the Aluminum line ripe for collaboration

    It seems like only yesterday that the rubber-bezel watch was given the Ducati treatment

    But time marches ever onward and so do the folks at Bulgari, so here we are with a new collaboration that brings together the time-and-date Aluminum watch with the chrome-heavy aesthetics of Japanese artist Hajime Sorayama.  The watch features a silver-toned dial and "propeller-shaped" hour-markers that are designed to recall Sorayama's work that channels the design of cars and planes from the '30s and '40s

    Dial text reads "Bulgari" in the top half and "Sorayama" at the bottom half to ward off any confusion as to whether or not this is indeed a collaboration.  Sorayama said of the watch, "When I was asked to be part of this collaboration, I developed three main design elements

    Sorayama's dream-come-true watch is powered by caliber BVL 192, a mechanical self-winding caliber found in the Aluminum GMT

    ['protect', 'watch', 'second', 'policy', 'cover']

    Watch Of The Week The Fine German Watch That Taught Me To Appreciate Asymmetry

    It would seem that Bulgari considers the Aluminum line ripe for collaboration

    It seems like only yesterday that the rubber-bezel watch was given the Ducati treatment

    But time marches ever onward and so do the folks at Bulgari, so here we are with a new collaboration that brings together the time-and-date Aluminum watch with the chrome-heavy aesthetics of Japanese artist Hajime Sorayama.  The watch features a silver-toned dial and "propeller-shaped" hour-markers that are designed to recall Sorayama's work that channels the design of cars and planes from the '30s and '40s

    Dial text reads "Bulgari" in the top half and "Sorayama" at the bottom half to ward off any confusion as to whether or not this is indeed a collaboration.  Sorayama said of the watch, "When I was asked to be part of this collaboration, I developed three main design elements

    AMD did, however, state that it is expecting (at least) 15 kits of DDR5 memory with AMD EXPO at launch on September 27th, with rates of up to DDR5-6400

    AMD EXPO, on the surface, is essentially an X.M.P profile specifically designed for AMD's Ryzen 7000 (Zen 4) processors

    Still, AMD EXPO adds an additional layer of 'compatibility' with AMD systems, as EXPO DIMMs will be optimized for use on AMD platforms (as opposed to X.M.P

    AMD EXPO does have one caveat associated with it; AMD EXPO is classed as overclocking in AMD's own eyes, and according to its footnotes, it does void the warranty

    Logitech also lightened the scroll wheel to make free spinning easier but can also switch to ratcheted scrolling

    They can be played wired in a pinch but can also last on one charge for up to 140 hours for the Lightspeed or up to 120 hours for the Plus (with RGB off)

    You can also achieve unlimited battery life on both using Logitech’s magical Powerplay wireless charging mouse pad

    You can preorder the new G502 X line on Logitech’s G website now

    The iPhone 14 Pro and ‌iPhone 14 Pro‌ Max are expected to replace the iPhone 13 Pro and ‌iPhone 13 Pro‌ Max at next week's Apple event, but how different are the two successive "Pro" iPhone generations rumored to be? In 2021, Apple unveiled the ‌iPhone 13 Pro‌ as the successor to the popular iPhone 12 Pro, with ProMotion displays, improved rear cameras, the A15 Bionic chip, and more

    The larger camera plateau is naturally more noticeable on the 6.1-inch ‌iPhone 14 Pro‌ than it is on the 6.7-inch ‌iPhone 14 Pro‌ Max

    While the difference between the ‌iPhone 12 Pro Max‌ and ‌iPhone 13 Pro‌ Max's camera arrays are minor, the difference between the ‌iPhone 12‌ Pro and ‌iPhone 13 Pro‌ is significant

    Currently, the ‌iPhone 13 Pro‌ and ‌iPhone 13 Pro‌ Max feature 6GB of LPDDR 4X memory

    This is a reduction of 0.68µm compared to the ‌iPhone 13 Pro‌ and ‌iPhone 13 Pro‌ Max

    The ‌iPhone 13 Pro‌'s Ultra Wide features 1.0µm pixels, while the ‌iPhone 14 Pro‌ is expected to boast 1.4µm pixels

  • BARCELONA'S PIERRE-EMERICK AUBAMEYANG SUFFERS BROKEN JAW DURING ROBBERY - SOURCES

    https://africa.espn.com/football/barcelona-espbarcelona/story/4734297/barcelona-pierre-emerick-aubameyang-suffers-broken-jaw-during-robbery-sources

    08/31/2022

    50.0% Shortened!

    You have come to the ESPN Africa edition, for other ESPN editions, click above

    Barcelona striker Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang suffered a broken jaw during a robbery at his house earlier in the week, sources confirmed to ESPN

    Aubameyang was assaulted in the early hours of Monday morning when a gang broke into his home equipped with firearms and iron bars

    But sources have now confirmed to ESPN that the former Arsenal striker did break his jaw during the break-in and will be out for around three weeks, which could have implications on a proposed move to Chelsea

    The injury to Aubameyang's jaw has slightly changed the negotiations, however, with a loan to the west London club emerging as a possible solution

    Barca coach Xavi Hernandez is happy to keep Aubameyang, but the club's need to reduce their wage bill to fund other business before the transfer window closes this week has forced them to listen to offers

    ['espn', 'aubameyang', 'jaw', 'week', 'source']

    Barcelona striker Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang suffered a broken jaw during a robbery at his house earlier in the week, sources confirmed to ESPN

    Aubameyang was assaulted in the early hours of Monday morning when a gang broke into his home equipped with firearms and iron bars

    But sources have now confirmed to ESPN that the former Arsenal striker did break his jaw during the break-in and will be out for around three weeks, which could have implications on a proposed move to Chelsea

    The injury to Aubameyang's jaw has slightly changed the negotiations, however, with a loan to the west London club emerging as a possible solution

    Barca coach Xavi Hernandez is happy to keep Aubameyang, but the club's need to reduce their wage bill to fund other business before the transfer window closes this week has forced them to listen to offers

    ['espn', 'aubameyang', 'jaw', 'week', 'source']

  • HUAWEI CONFIRMS THAT THE MATE 50 PHONES WILL FEATURE CAMERAS WITH VARIABLE APERTURE - GSMARENA.COM NEWS

    https://www.gsmarena.com/huawei_confirms_that_the_mate_50_phones_will_feature_cameras_with_variable_aperture-news-55595.php

    08/31/2022

    53.85% Shortened!

    Huawei has officially confirmed one of the most interesting rumors about the upcoming Mate 50 series before the September 6 announcement – the phones will feature a variable aperture on their cameras (presumably only the main camera)

    This will give users control over the depth of field (the bigger the f-number, the deeper the DoF), but it will also allow the camera to slow down the shutter speed without blowing out the image

    The cameras will rely on Huawei’s in-house XMAGE technology for the image processing, which will include a HiSilicon NPU (the phones are expected to use 4G versions of Qualcomm’s latest flagship chipsets)

    Source 1 | Source 2 (in Chinese) | Via Don't be daft

    so you are not a fanboy? why should samsung be better than huawei just because it produces own parts? everyone knows how bad exynos chipsets are, while huawei's kirin chips were efficient and reliable

    huawei was the first to put decent cameras ...

    ['huawei', 'rumor', 'phone', 'aperture', 'camera']

    Huawei has officially confirmed one of the most interesting rumors about the upcoming Mate 50 series before the September 6 announcement – the phones will feature a variable aperture on their cameras (presumably only the main camera)

    This will give users control over the depth of field (the bigger the f-number, the deeper the DoF), but it will also allow the camera to slow down the shutter speed without blowing out the image

    The cameras will rely on Huawei’s in-house XMAGE technology for the image processing, which will include a HiSilicon NPU (the phones are expected to use 4G versions of Qualcomm’s latest flagship chipsets)

  • TNB AND MYSURI BIZ EV TAXI COLLABORATION - FIRST CABS IN TEKSIKU SERVICE DUE OUT IN NOV, 1,000 UNITS PLANNED - PAULTAN.ORG

    https://paultan.org/2022/08/31/tnb-and-mysuri-biz-ev-taxi-collaboration-first-cabs-in-teksiku-service-due-out-in-nov-1000-units-planned/

    08/31/2022

    68.42% Shortened!

    The service, which will eventually be introduced to other states, will be offered by the company under the TeksiKu banner

    Mohd Noor said that the EV taxis are aimed at transforming the public transport service, and the programme would enable taxi drivers to adopt new technologies without the need to fork out a large investment

    Mohd Noor said a deal for that is still being discussed

    In general, charging infrastructure support in the public domain will be provided by TNB, but Mysuri will also implement a network of chargers for taxi drivers to recharge their vehicles

    Bookings for the service, when it eventually kicks off, can be made via the TeksiKu app, but the company will also set up electronic kiosks in strategic locations (for example, in airports and stations within the rail network) to enable those without the app to easily secure a ride

    For me as same time to secured my daily income end needs also monthly house rental

    08/31/2022, 00:10

    @ChanceHMiller While there is quite a bit we already know about the iPhone 14 and iPhone 14 Pro, new details are emerging as we approach Apple’s September 7 event

    With that in mind, it seems the only change for the iPhone 14 and iPhone 14 Max will be the addition of the new purple color

    For the iPhone 14 Pro and iPhone 14 Pro Max, the source says that we can expect the same graphite, silver, and gold color options as the iPhone 13 Pro

    Speaking of that MagSafe Battery Pack, Apple is also reportedly planning a new MagSafe battery accessory that will be “exclusive” to the iPhone 14 and iPhone 14 Pro; more details on this are unclear as of now

    In terms of storage, the iPhone 14 and iPhone 14 Pro will both still start with 128GB of storage according to this leak

    The iPhone 14 and iPhone 14 Max will use the same A15 chip as the iPhone 13, as previously reported by 9to5Mac.

  • DIABLO IMMORTAL SEASON 4 UPDATE WILL TEASE GAME'S FIRST "MAJOR" UPDATE

    https://www.gamespot.com/articles/diablo-immortal-season-4-update-will-tease-games-first-major-update/1100-6506991/

    08/31/2022, 00:10

    73.91% Shortened!

    Players who participate in a new limited-time event will reveal a "hint" about the future of Diablo Immortal

    As outlined in a new blog post, one of those events, the Mists of Cyrangar, will see players taking on "unspeakable horrors" that "lie shrouded in the mist." As players progress the event, Blizzard says mist from the game's event page will slowly clear, revealing a "hint" about Diablo Immortal's first major update

    During the event, all players who are below their server's Paragon level will receive bonus experience until the event ends or they catch up, with Blizzard in the patch notes writing it wants to provide players with an opportunity to "catch up" in preparation for the game's first major update

    What that update will entail is still a mystery for now, but Blizzard has stated in the past that Diablo Immortal's "major updates" will introduce new gameplay features, events, and expand on the game's story

    Diablo Immortal proved controversial upon release for its various microtransactions

    The game has reportedly earned more than $100 million since launch, with Blizzard president Mike Ybarra defending Diablo Immortal's monetization model in a recent interview

    ['player', 'new', 'event', 'diablo', 'immortal']

    Players who participate in a new limited-time event will reveal a "hint" about the future of Diablo Immortal

As players progress the event, Blizzard says mist from the game's event page will slowly clear, revealing a "hint" about Diablo Immortal's first major update

    During the event, all players who are below their server's Paragon level will receive bonus experience until the event ends or they catch up, with Blizzard in the patch notes writing it wants to provide players with an opportunity to "catch up" in preparation for the game's first major update

    What that update will entail is still a mystery for now, but Blizzard has stated in the past that Diablo Immortal's "major updates" will introduce new gameplay features, events, and expand on the game's story

    Diablo Immortal proved controversial upon release for its various microtransactions

    The game has reportedly earned more than $100 million since launch, with Blizzard president Mike Ybarra defending Diablo Immortal's monetization model in a recent interview

  • SOME DELL XPS 13 PLUS SCREENS HAVE A GLUE PROBLEM

    https://www.theverge.com/2022/8/30/23328681/dell-xps-13-plus-oled-display-problems

    08/31/2022, 00:10

    66.67% Shortened!

    Dell has confirmed to The Verge that it is aware of a screen issue on some OLED models of the device

    A video has been circulating for weeks now of an XPS 13 Plus’ screen falling off in a Best Buy demo area (the video is incorrectly labeled as being of the larger XPS 15)

    XPS 13 Plus orders are up and running on Dell’s website as of this writing

    Dell is proactively reaching out to customers who may be impacted to replace the screen, ideally before it becomes loose

    Dell also noted that the problem is specific to OLED XPS 13 Plus models — non-OLED models, it seems, are not impacted

    The Verge did also experience issues with XPS 13 Plus’ display during our review process — a few days in, the screen died in a manner similar to those reported on Reddit

    ['dell', 'xps', 'plus', 'issue', 'screen']

    Huawei started to send the August 2022 EMUI update with Huawei Mate 40 Pro smartphones in the Middle east

    Until then, we recommend you download the August 2022 security update to your Huawei Mate 40 Pro smartphone that is now available in Europe

    Capcom revival, according to the SNK producer Yasuyuki Oda

    Speaking to VGC, Oda said that the collaborative promotional posters featuring both SNK and Capcom games sold at EVO 2022 in August “reconfirmed” the public’s interest in a potential revival

    Asked if he was interested in a revival himself, Oda said, “Definitely in the future, that’s something that I think everybody on all sides, in both parties, are interested in making a reality

    So that poster [at EVO], in our sense, was the first step towards maybe something like that happening in the future.” Asked if we will have to wait 20 years to see a new entry in the SNK vs

    Capcom series, Oda said, “20 years is definitely too long for me

    The controller is available to preorder in white and black models at Amazon

    This PC and mobile version of the Ultimate Controller--available in black or white--contains most of the features that the Switch model is equipped with

    The big difference with this 8BitDo Ultimate Controller is that it doesn't include a charging dock and needs to be physically tethered to your Switch, PC, or mobile device via USB

  • GALAXY Z FOLD 4 HOLDS UP TO DUST IN TORTURE TEST, BUT NOTHING HAS CHANGED FROM OLDER MODELS [VIDEO]

    https://9to5google.com/2022/08/30/galaxy-z-fold-4-dust-test/

    08/31/2022, 00:08

    73.91% Shortened!

    In a torture test putting the Galaxy Z Fold 4 through the worst of the worst, it holds up well to dust and dirt, but that’s not really a surprise.

    The Galaxy Z Fold 4 has the same IPX8 rating as its predecessor, meaning it has strong resistance to water, but no protection against dust

    In this torture test, the Galaxy Z Fold 4 is subjected to a pile of dust, dirt, and pebbles and comes out the other side without any problems

    The Galaxy Z Fold 3, Flip 3, and Fold 2 all survived this same test

    Samsung hasn’t changed anything in terms of dust resistance on the Galaxy Z Fold 4, or really any of its foldables since 2020’s Galaxy Z Flip

    Add 9to5Google to your Google News feed.

    ['samsung', 'test', 'galaxy', 'fold', 'dust']

    Samsung Electronics recently announced the global launch of SmartThings Home Life, offering consumers worldwide a more holistic smart home experience

    Samsung’s SmartThings Home Life, introduced at this year’s Bespoke Home 2022 virtual event, is currently available in Canada and integrates the SmartThings Cooking and SmartThings Home Care services

    SmartThings Home Life is a new addition to the SmartThings app[1] [2], which provides centralized and integrated control over your Samsung appliances[3]

    Connecting the convenience of SmartThings services, which includes SmartThings Cooking and SmartThings Home Care in Canada[4] [5], SmartThings Home Life expands the quality of your life at home and puts you in control, all from your smartphone

    In the SmartThings app, users can simply tap the “Life” tab to navigate to SmartThings Home to unlock a new level of home connectivity

    What’s more, the Family Hub also doubles as a home control for the SmartThings app

    It has been almost a full year since the GoPro Hero10 Black was unveiled, so it’s time for a new one

    This design dates back to the Hero9 generation, although last year’s model brought a larger sensor and a brand new GP2 chip, which enabled video capture at double the frame rate.

    GoPro Hero11 Black (leaked images) There has been some talk that the 11-series will feature 6K video recording (previous generations top out at 5.3K), but that is yet to be confirmed

    This will most likely require a new chip, which could also enable new video processing tricks (e.g

    the 10 Black introduced HyperSmooth 4.0 video stabilization)

    Don't change for change sake.

    Why change the design? Buy the fruit if design is everything!

    08/30/2022, 23:10

    80.65% Shortened!

    It was the second such price cut to that point

    Barely two years into the PlayStation 5’s reign, Sony has announced that the price of its hard-to-find console is going up

    “A price increase in the U.S

    In an email to Polygon, Ahmad noted that the United States is the largest console market, and one of the most competitive, which makes a price increase there riskier

    “If they have a chance to raise price in the U.S., [Sony] probably will do so, but raising price is SUCH a dumb idea,” Pachter said in an email

    “It’s likely that Sony increased the price of the console to keep hardware profitability stable and hit targets set for the [fiscal year],” Ahmad added

  • KARTRIDER: DRIFT ‘GLOBAL RACING TEST’ SET FOR AUGUST 31 TO SEPTEMBER 6

    https://www.gematsu.com/2022/08/kartrider-drift-global-racing-test-set-for-august-31-to-september-6

    08/30/2022, 23:10

    45.45% Shortened!

    The global test encompasses North America, Latin America, Europe, Japan, and Korea

    For iOS, only 10,000 people will be able to participate on a first-come, first-served basis

    iOS users who wish to participate will also need to download the TestFlight app

    The License System, which teaches players to learn driving skills according to a given mission, adds a new grade, L3—the highest difficulty level—to test your grit as the best of the best

    Nexon has added a variety of further improvements since the last closed beta, including an information page which provides at-a-glance views of your play history, plus the addition of an in-game achievement system that provides points each time you participate in an activity

    Further details, including links to download the game on your preferred platform, are available via the official website

    ['nexon', 'global', 'race', 'test', 'september']

  • THE NEW 8BITDO ULTIMATE CONTROLLER COMES IN OCTOBER

    https://www.theverge.com/2022/8/30/23326887/8bitdo-ultimate-pro-controller-bluetooth-preorder-nintendo-switch-wireless

    08/30/2022, 23:10

    50.0% Shortened!

    8BitDo’s older controllers like the SN30 Pro and Pro 2 have boasted a broad array of compatibility options thanks to their Bluetooth connectivity, but the Ultimate Controller will be available in three different configurations — Bluetooth ($69.99), 2.4Ghz ($49.99), or wired ($34.99) — based on your preferred console and connectivity method.

    However, the Ultimate Controller will offer a suite of premium features you’d typically find on a controller that costs twice as much

    Besides being offered in black, white, and pink colorways, the wireless models of the Ultimate Controller come packaged with their own charging dock

    Perhaps the coolest new feature coming with the new Ultimate controller, however, is 8BitDo’s new controller software suite, which will allow you to remap and tune your controls on PC, Android, and iOS devices

    You’ll be able to save your preferences to up to three separate profiles, stored independently on the controller's hardware

    We’re still waiting to get our hands on this controller, but based on its features, the Ultimate Controller seems poised to serve as a more capable alternative to the official Switch Pro controller and a worthy successor to the 8BitDo Pro 2

    ['pro', 'controller', 'switch', '8bitdo', 'ultimate']

    However, the Ultimate Controller will offer a suite of premium features you’d typically find on a controller that costs twice as much

  • 8BITDO'S XBOX-STYLE ULTIMATE CONTROLLER GOES WIRELESS, BUT NOT FOR THE XBOX

    https://gizmodo.com/8bitdo-xbox-style-ultimate-controller-wireless-switch-p-1849463094

    08/30/2022, 23:09

    64.71% Shortened!

    One of our few complaints is the controller’s symmetrical side-by-side joystick layout, which 8BitDo is finally addressing with a new version of its Xbox Ultimate wired controller that also finally goes wireless

    That makes its use of side-by-side analog joysticks a bit confusing, because Nintendo has been using an asymmetrical joystick layout since the GameCube WaveBird, and continues to use it on its Joy-Cons and Pro Controller

    Sure, the Wii U Pro Controller uses a symmetrical layout, but the stick placement on the 8BitDo Pro 2 is more like a Dualshock’s than that controller’s

    It’s now simply called the 8BitDo Ultimate Controller, and will be available in three versions that cater to pretty much everything except, ironically, the Xbox (and Playstation)

    It offers all the same features and functionality of 8BitDo’s wired Xbox controller and the wireless Pro 2, including compatibility with special software and apps for configuring the controller, the ability to store and easily switch between three different configuration profiles, and an extra pair of re-mappable paddle buttons on the back

    They won’t replace the wireless 8BitDo Pro 2 controller, however, as that controller’s side-by-side joystick layout will still appeal to some gamers.

    ['8bitdo', 'pro', 'one', 'controller', 'side']

    One of our few complaints is the controller’s symmetrical side-by-side joystick layout, which 8BitDo is finally addressing with a new version of its Xbox Ultimate wired controller that also finally goes wireless

    That makes its use of side-by-side analog joysticks a bit confusing, because Nintendo has been using an asymmetrical joystick layout since the GameCube WaveBird, and continues to use it on its Joy-Cons and Pro Controller

    Sure, the Wii U Pro Controller uses a symmetrical layout, but the stick placement on the 8BitDo Pro 2 is more like a Dualshock’s than that controller’s

    It’s now simply called the 8BitDo Ultimate Controller, and will be available in three versions that cater to pretty much everything except, ironically, the Xbox (and Playstation)

    It offers all the same features and functionality of 8BitDo’s wired Xbox controller and the wireless Pro 2, including compatibility with special software and apps for configuring the controller, the ability to store and easily switch between three different configuration profiles, and an extra pair of re-mappable paddle buttons on the back

    They won’t replace the wireless 8BitDo Pro 2 controller, however, as that controller’s side-by-side joystick layout will still appeal to some gamers.

    JBL built a very similar version of the soundbar called the Bar 9.1 in 2020 that also had the cool removable rear speaker hat trick

    But the new JBL Bar 1000 adds two more drivers for a 7.1.4 arrangement and bumps the power output to 880W compared to 820W in the Bar 9.1

    The JBL Bar 1000 will retail for $1,149, and the company is also releasing a cheaper $899 version called the Bar 800

    For those that just want something that’s better than the TV’s built-in speakers, JBL is also releasing the Bar 500 and Bar 300

    The Bar 500 includes a wireless subwoofer and will cost $649

    Like the Bar 1000 and 800, these will also ship this December

    https://www.theverge.com/2022/8/30/23328582/jbl-touchscreen-tour-pro-2-charging-case-one-m2-features

    08/30/2022, 22:10

    57.14% Shortened!

    The Tour Pro 2 earbuds themselves are Bluetooth 5.3 LTE compatible and come equipped with 10mm drivers, up from the 6.8mm that featured on the Tour Pro Plus

    This is an improvement on the claimed 32 hours total and six hours per usage claimed on the Tour Pro Plus when ANC is active, though a review from Rtings places real-world usage closer to 4.2 hours usage and 16.8 hours total battery life

    Aside from that, the Tour Pro 2 feature six built-in microphones like the Tour Pro Plus, which didn’t perform well according to this Tom’s Guide review

    We can only hope that the Tour Pro 2 earbuds provide better battery life and microphone performance to avoid the same disappointments as its predecessor

    JBL is also releasing the Tour One M2 over-ear wireless headphones, which the brand claims “combines JBL’s best-ever hybrid True Adaptive ANC with JBL Pro-tuned drivers.” This is a successor to the original JBL Tour One, offering improvements to battery life when ANC is active (from 25 hours to 30) and a connectivity upgrade to Bluetooth 5.3

    Overall battery life remains at 50 hours, though the Tour One M2 offers fast charging, giving you five hours of juice in just 10 minutes

    ['earbuds', 'jbl', 'tour', 'pro', 'hour']

    Aside from that, the Tour Pro 2 feature six built-in microphones like the Tour Pro Plus, which didn’t perform well according to this Tom’s Guide review

    Overall battery life remains at 50 hours, though the Tour One M2 offers fast charging, giving you five hours of juice in just 10 minutes

  • JBL'S FLAGSHIP TOUR PRO 2 WIRELESS EARBUDS HAVE THE WORLD'S FIRST SMART CHARGING CASE

    https://www.whathifi.com/news/jbl-tour-headphones-are-its-most-powerful-yet-and-has-the-worlds-first-smart-charging-case

    08/30/2022, 22:09

    81.82% Shortened!

    The Tour PRO 2 earbuds' party trick is the first-ever smart charging case, which sports a 1.45-inch LED touch display on which you can control music playback, choose ANC mode, customise the earbuds and even handle notifications and calls

    The earbuds themselves are 30 per cent smaller

    You get a huge 10 hours in the earbuds, with 30 in the case – that's 40 hours of total music playback with ANC off

    JBL has updated the design to look more premium than the previous Tour One headphones, furnishing it with better cushions on the headband and earcups

    Both Tour models also feature immersive JBL Spatial Sound (which can be adjusted when listening to music, movies or games), true adaptive noise cancelling with a customisable ANC slider, and a tailored sound experience with Personi-fi 2.0. All these options – and many, many more – can be tweaked using the updated JBL Headphones app

    The new Samsung Galaxy Buds 2 Pro were the first earbuds to feature Bluetooth 5.3, with LE Audio support coming later in the year

    ['jbl', 'headphone', 'tour', 'earbuds', 'feature']

    The Tour PRO 2 earbuds' party trick is the first-ever smart charging case, which sports a 1.45-inch LED touch display on which you can control music playback, choose ANC mode, customise the earbuds and even handle notifications and calls

    The earbuds themselves are 30 per cent smaller

    You get a huge 10 hours in the earbuds, with 30 in the case – that's 40 hours of total music playback with ANC off

    JBL has updated the design to look more premium than the previous Tour One headphones, furnishing it with better cushions on the headband and earcups

    Both Tour models also feature immersive JBL Spatial Sound (which can be adjusted when listening to music, movies or games), true adaptive noise cancelling with a customisable ANC slider, and a tailored sound experience with Personi-fi 2.0. All these options – and many, many more – can be tweaked using the updated JBL Headphones app

    The new Samsung Galaxy Buds 2 Pro were the first earbuds to feature Bluetooth 5.3, with LE Audio support coming later in the year

    ['jbl', 'headphone', 'tour', 'earbuds', 'feature']



  • SAMSUNG GALAXY Z FOLD 4: HOW TO GET THE MOST OUT OF ITS NEW TASKBAR

    https://www.zdnet.com/article/samsung-galaxy-z-fold-4-how-to-get-the-most-out-of-its-new-taskbar/

    08/30/2022, 22:09

    77.78% Shortened!

    Those apps are then mirrored on your taskbar in the same order

    You can add up to eight apps to the bottom row.  If you don't want to have your most recent apps cycling through on the right side of the taskbar, you can get rid of it by opening the Settings app on your Z Fold 4 and going to Display > Taskbar and and sliding the switch next to Show recent apps to the Off position

    When you're in an app and want to switch to another app that's in your taskbar, you can do so just by tapping on the app's icon

    Drag and drop the app's icon onto the Z Fold 4's display

    You can use two apps in split-screen view, or drag a third app onto the display to use three apps at the same time.  Even with the Fold 4's large display, three apps on the screen do get a bit cramped

    Open the Settings app on your phone and then go to Display > Taskbar and slide the On switch to the Off position.

    ['fold', 'display', 'taskbar', 'screen', 'apps']
